1b1: rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya badz+ra tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba rdo rje rgyud rgya
1b2: rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i
1b3: 'khor lo mi gsung ba/ / bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs// de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs//
1b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // gsang ba'i 'khor lo shin
1b5: tu zab/ / rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// khyod kyis don mdzad nga yis bshad// gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi
1b6: rgyal po las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gsang /
1b7: zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de yi rdo rje ji ltar lags// de yi pad ma ji
1b8: lnga lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang bzhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i pho brangabya Sh+ya shA

2a1: dang po ste/ de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i pho brang ste// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste// de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir// bzhi pa
2a2: gsang ba bde skyong ste/ / sdig pa spyod phyir bde skyong yin// de rnams don ni gsang ba ste// brtul zhugs byed cing gtong phod che// e ba ma zab cing chags la dga'// khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta 'bab// 'di la
2a3: ston gyis gzhan la gsang / / rdo rje pad ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnas pa'i rten yin te// dper na khang rten ka ba bzhin// rgyud kyi don ni rgyun yin no// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog pa sel ba'i le'u
2a4: ste gnyis pa'o/ / // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// re re'i dbye ba ma 'tshal bas// 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du ltung // 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi zad pas// bdag ni 'di nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan
2a5: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug/ 'dab ma'i grangs ni gnyis 'gyur ro// rta mgrin grangs ni dgu ru shes// gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no//
2a6: rig pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni me tog lta bu'o// b+ha ga rab 'bring gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snam gyi ri lu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bskus la// gzhang kha
2a7: nas ni phye mas bdug/ gsang ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug/ de nas rnal 'byor pho'am mos// rtsa de sor mos legs par btsal// ring thung tshad ni sor gnyis nas// sor brgyad par ni gar gnas pa// shes
2a8: rab b+ha ga che chung dang / / de bzhin b+ha ga grang dro dang // chu rnams che zhing bde ba chung // de la rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis// b+ha ga chen bde ba chung // b+ha ga chen chung ngu bya// chung na de bzhin bskyed par gsungs// grang na

2b1: de bzhin bsro bar bya/ / chu rnams chen chung bar bya// 'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la yod// bud med 'di la b+hag mnga'// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das// thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang // ring ba dang ni thung ba
2b2: ste/ / shes rab ji bzhin thabs la'o// de yi gnas su bzung bar bya// gsang ba rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// e baM rnam pa'i
2b3: dbus gang du/ / bde ba'i khyad par tshol ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin du dben pa'i gnas btsal la// bza' ba bcud can sna tshogs dang // btung ba
2b4: zhim po mang po dang / / gur gum la sogs dri zhim dang // shin tu 'jam pa'i stan ting la// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// dri zhim thig le re re bya// rnal 'byor pha yi gnas lnga ru// de bzhin thig le
2b5: lnga yang bya/ / de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// e las gru gsum gting ring bsam// de yi nang du paM las ni// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad du bsam// de yi dbus su 'khor lo bsam// 'khor lo'i dbus
2b6: su re mig dgod/ / de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang // hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga bsam// oM las rdo rje mgo bor bsam// phaT las rdo rje bu ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan thog du// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste/
2b7: yang lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa dgu la// chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byug/ bde ba skye ba'i zas zos nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya/
2b8: shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyis shes rab pad ma la// 'o byas pad ma rgyas su gzhug/ shes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no// chags pa skye ba'i rtags 'byung ste// de nas gcig

3a1: gis gcig 'khyud nas/ he ru ka dang phag mo rabs ma// shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas// thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas// nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir// shes rab ma la rtags/
3a2: gsum 'byung // lus 'dar 'phar ba sku yi rtags// mi bzod skad 'don dag gi rtags// shes pa rgyal ba thugs kyi rtags// 'di ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ste// 'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong // nad
3a3: kyi zug rngu thams cad 'joms/ / 'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa min// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la gnas// sbyin bsreg la sogs bya ba min// gsang ba'i rdo rje
3a4: rgyud 'di ni/ / kun gyis thos par mi 'gyur te// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis bya// glegs bam gsang ba'i gnas su sba// yongs su smin pa'i rnal 'byor ma// 'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la swa/
3a5: gsang ba ston pa'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nyid pas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas nas// lnga bcu nas bzung stong gi bar// rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang //
3a6: sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas// bcu gnyis mdang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mi shes sbyor byas pas// rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye// shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste// sbyor thabs mkhas pas shes
3a7: rab ma/ / thabs kyis rtag tu bsten par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rnal 'byor mo yi gsang la bsten// gsang la bsten pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming srid tshul
3a8: lam rje 'bangs tshul/ / pha spang tshul lam mkhan slob tshul// gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tsha bsrung // dben pa'i gnas su sbyor ba bya// gal te ma bsten dam tshig nyams// tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar ltung // lha mos

3b1: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / thabs med rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// bde ba khyad med ji ltar lags// phyag rgya ma bsten ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas
3b2: gsang ba'i don/ / khyod kyis ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// sbyor thabs mi shes rnal 'byor dang // bstan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya// gal te de 'dra bsten gyur na// 'jig
3b3: rten phal ba'i 'dod chags te/ / shi nas mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'dod chags spyod bshal ma ri// lcags kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// yar la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab// thabs med rnal 'byor 'dra ba
3b4: 'bod/ / de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bsten// sbyor thabs las ni bde ba skye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba khyad med lus zungs nyams// rlung mkhris bad kan kun nas skye// las kyi phyag
3b5: rgya rtag tu bsten/ / phyag rgya ma bsten dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya bsten pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor ming srid brda yis mtshon// gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa na// 'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin// sor mo
3b6: gnyis ni ston pa dang / / mthe bo drang por ston pa dang // de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bol zhes bya ste// pad ma ka ko la zhes bya// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// brda yi bye brag ma lus pa//
3b7: sam bu Ta ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje pang ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru bzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyi
3b8: dbugs dang shes pas bzung / / dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas bzung // sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru bzung // gcig ni sbom po khro mos bzung // bzung ba'i rten ni rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya//

4a1: gal te de ru ma zin na// 'khor bar ltung bas rang gis su// ting nge 'dzin gyis haM la bsdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams
4a2: lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / shes rab bskyod thabs 'ba' zhig gam// thabs kyis bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gam// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo rje
4a3: ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod// sbyor thabs kyang ni thabs kyis bya// de las bde ba khyad par 'phags// dper na ngar dang sAl ma bzhin// thabs kyis
4a4: sna la ma'i cha tsam myong / / shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam// do phyir rnal 'byor ma'i rgyudo// rnal 'byor ma yi 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // mchod/
4a5: dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus dang bsrung ba la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// ye shes lnga yi spros dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu
4a6: med pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongasu zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ras gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar
4a7: gyur to/ / gsang ba'i yang gsang bags / rje rgyal po/ 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// / gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho//
4a8: ban Di ta rang na badz+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dag slang shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin d+ha tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad

4b1: gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /
4b2: thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon gyi phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang /
4b3: gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de yi
4b4: rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bum dbang dang 'brel pa'i// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang rten par bsgom pa ni// snod
4b5: bcung gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams/ / spang phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang rten pa'i bye brag
4b6: la/ / dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang // thugs kha'i yi ge hUM las ni// mar me cig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag pa'i e 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin/
4b7: te// dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri med kyis// rang bzhin
4b8: gyis ni kun la khyab/ / de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting ring ba ru dgongs pas

5a1: bshad/ / de nas thugs kha'i hUM las yang // hUM 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang po tshe yi bar chad dang // gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chad de// bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis
5a2: yin te/ / phyi yi bgegs dang nang gi bigegs// phyi yis tshe yi bar chad de// nang gis thar pa'i bar chad byed// bar chad rnam pa gnyis bsrung ba// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// yaM las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyibs/
5a3: ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba la// dbang du byed pas dbang gis don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang // chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin par nga yis gsungs
5a4: raM las me yis dkyil 'khor ni/ / zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don// baM las chu yi dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros pa zhi par gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi//
5a5: laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de stengs ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni
5a6: g.yas dang g.yon/ / go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re re'i bye brag rnam rtog yang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// shing rnams rims bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dge
5a7: bcu'i don/ / 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod// 'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gi sems
5a8: can gyis/ / don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod// nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang // snyan nas brgyad pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang // b+h+rUM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de//

5b1: rtsi bas brgyad nam shes brgyad kyi dngas// yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sa// byi nas ltas pas nang drags la// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru ste// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don/ tsan chen sna ma sna lnga'i don// kha dog ldan
5b2: rigs lnga'i don/ gru ba ni tshangs pa gnas bzhir gsungs// logs pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer bzhag yin// kab brgyad ni rnamathar btud// gdung ba ni sa shes pa ni yod ni/ shAr na la sogs pa
5b3: kun/ / stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad ma'i sa bon dbyangs las skyes// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad ma'i gang na// de steng nyi
5b4: mazla ba ste/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda// dang po ro nang bdag gam// rnam rtog 'joms phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gang na// 'khor la rer gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag
5b5: yin pa'i phyir/ / dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yis/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung rdzus pa'i tshul// dper na chu gting las ni
5b6: 1/ / rkyen las skyes pa drod gsher skyes// dper na nyi mas pad ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu bsgor skyes tshul// dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// yang la sreg cing mar la gso/
5b7: dper na spra tshil las ni gzugs// pho brang rnam par snang mdzad de// rjes su bskyed pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa don yod grub pa'o// bdud rtsi
5b8: myang ba 'od dpag med/ / yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa'am bsgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma ste/ rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa yi// bsgom pa

6a1: 'am bzlas pa bya bar gsungs/ / 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin// tha ma'i dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum bcu rtsa bdun rdzogs par bsgom// 'bring po yis kyang
6a2: de bzhin te/ / gnas partsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di yis bstan pa shin du zab// gong du gsungs pa
6a3: thams cad kyang / / rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin du zab// phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de nyid/
6a4: gsang ba gsang ba'i don// las su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po skye mched khams rnams la// re re lha ru byin rlabs la// lnga'am/
6a5: drug gam sum bcu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun zhes bya bI// yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyed pa
6a6: zhes bya ji ltar lags/ / de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags// lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gso'o// bcom
6a7: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag r+b+ha// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// de pyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru kar gyur gcig la yang // rnarnams
6a8: yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ / gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyu nor pa los ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu mang

6b1: pa las ma yin te/ / nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyu de rkyen med pa las min// nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas
6b2: pas/ / bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang
6b3: du gsungs pa yin/ / 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin mtshan bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyu gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thun dang mtshams
6b4: ni mnyam par gsungs/ / mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor pa// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas la// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa
6b5: mnyam gzhag ste/ / rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa las// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la// rgyan dang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin
6b6: chen rigs/ / pad ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnad pa nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bas// gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnad// lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang //
6b7: spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam sri ste// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir lha med spyod pa spang // srin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o// spyod med lta ba'ang spang ba ste// dka' thub
6b8: kyis ni lus gdungs shing / / phung sogs rnam snang la sogs la// brnyas pa rtog ge skam po yin// des na lta spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par

7a1: bzhugs/ / rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung // rgyun la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la ba shang
7a2: gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dud rtsinam pa gsum du gsungs// dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bsten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si h+la mi bskyod
7a3: ludra skam blang / / bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he ru ka dang rnam snang dang // lud skam snying por blang bar bya// yar gyi ro dang mar gyi ro// brgyad dang bcu bzhi bcwa lnga la// thams cad bzang po'i dus su gsungs// sing
7a4: ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang / / lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi bsgrub pa'i rten// glang po glang po chen po ste// ke ta ke yi rgyu nyid las// gla rtsi la sogs 'byung ba'i sha// ba lang gi wang ldan pa'i sha// rta ni rta yi
7a5: rgyal po ste/ / kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyibs dang / kha dog mi 'gyur sha// mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha// lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring tha
7a6: ma'i mtshan ma ni/ / 'bar dang dud pa ldo ba rnams// mtshan ma gyi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel// skad ma phyin na dngos grub med// skad phyung bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin//
7a7: dril can drug dgu 'am nas// 'dzeg pa'i bdud rtsi rkun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba s+ho// a bad+hU tI dbugs chung pas// snying gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin// sih+la ga bur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pargyu ba yin// di na
7a8: gsang ba'i bdud rtsi te/ / skra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// skyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi

7b1: drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin/ / las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga pa goms par gyur pa yis// drug pa gzung bar
7b2: gsungs pa ste/ / kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbus su bzhug/ lte ba'i gnas su dbugs gnas pa// steng gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// sred pa med cing yang ba'o// 'dab chags rgyal
7b3: po ji bzhin du/ / nam mkhar 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad// gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// dril can bu ga 'gag/
7b4: bar byed// rgyan gyi dang po zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po si hA ling // ru du 'dul ba'i rim pa ste// bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// phrin las bzhi ni thun mong yin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/
7b5: rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// g.yas
7b6: g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni/ / lnga pa nam mkha' 'byung ba yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde
7b7: bachen po 'byung / / bde chen rang bzhin med pa dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang / bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po la// gser
7b8: 'gyur rtsi yis nus pa yis/ / zangs nyid gser du gyur pa ste// zangs las ma gtogs gser nyid dang // lnga pa las gzhan drug pa ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla ba zla ba byed// nyin//

8a1: zhag dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig re tsam drug pa 'byung // las dang po yi spyod yul min// dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa// chu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig shos
8a2: nyams su myong ba med/ / tshul rten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros byas lnga pa la// rten nas spros med drug pa 'byung // rlud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// mtshan ma lnga'am ro brgyad dam
8a3: sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan/ / las kyi phyag rgya yongs su spangs// ye shes phyag rgya la gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag mchog yin te// 'di yis drug pa zin par bshad// 'dod chags
8a4: zhes pa 'khor ba ste/ / rnam dag mya ngan 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don// dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya// ma' 'gro rtsa ru shes par
8a5: bya/ / dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang // de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin te/
8a6: sor gsum la ni 'khor lo re// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gis gnas kyi 'khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo me la gzhang kha rlung // sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas/
8a7: brtag/ gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o// sor bzhi rta mgrin gnas yin te// sor brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma'i// lus kyi rten gyi
8a8: bye brag las/ / sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad nyid las// brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu la ni 'khor lo gzhan// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams ca dan tshigs dbug ku ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas

8b1: pas brtag/ 'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis// dang por 'khor lo gnyis pa rtsa// rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi// rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni
8b2: gnyis/ / tsan Da li ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// bla ma tshogs na mthong na rgyab kyi phyogs// man ngag gzhan du spel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i
8b3: don la rgyab kyi phyogs shing skur pa 'debs/ / gsang sngags bar du gcod cing rnal 'byor gzhan la gshe/ 'di ni mnar med sems can dmyal ba chen por skye// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gcig rdzogs pa tshe yi tshad//
8b4: 'di la sras kyi thams cad la// nga yis sba bar ma gsungs te// de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sbas// rgyud 'dir nga yis rgyas par bshad// sum bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha// drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// sum bcu
8b5: rtsa gnyis las ni zung / / bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// sum bcu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas// bcu drug las
8b6: ni zung 'gyur ba/ / brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin// bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha// sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbas// mgrin pa
8b7: longs spyod 'khor lo ru/ / ro drug la ni longs spyod pas// ro ma longs spyod 'khor lor sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon cha gnyis cha// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// brgyad
8b8: las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi/ / sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha// drug bcu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// tshangs mdo'i me ni

9a1: me la sbas/ / snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo ru/ chos kun rig pas rig pa sbas// drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni zung // sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa
9a2: yin/ / drug bcu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// gzhang kha rlung ni rlung las sbas// gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo ra la 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud/
9a3: chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro cig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen sku// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying ga chos kyi sku yin
9a4: te/ / rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra// bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan rnams steng la stong pa 'og/ dang po'i bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og/ bde chen
9a5: kha sbyor gnyis pa yin/ / gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu// rlung ni sgrol ma'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te// zur rtsa gsum ni
9a6: drod kyis gang / / rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga yi mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad// lnga la kA li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rtam grin dbyangs yig g.yon dang
9a7: g.yas/ / a gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dgu yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lon// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang / (ngas stong phrag bdun bcu nyis
9a8: sha la gnas nas tshil bu bskyed/ / nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni// tshil la gnas nas rkang bskyed pa'o// gsang ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing ga bur bskyed// de kho na yi rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar gan

9b1: shing bde bskyed/ / khang pa stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa 'bum// / khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis te// grangs ni 'bum du shes par bya// nang dang gsang ba'i
9b2: rtsal yang / / srin bu'i rigs ni grangs su gsungs// de kho na'i rtsa gsum las// 'dod chags bskyed pa'i srin bu dgu// nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum// dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya// rtsa der
9b3: gnas pa'i ga bur yang / / bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me yi dkyil 'khor dang // de steng a las ka pA la// baM las pad ma
9b4: 'dab brgyad bsam/ / nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am// mtho gang tsam du bsam pa ni// yi ge go bzlog bsam par bya// sngon po dmar po dkar po ste// hUM
9b5: las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam/ / de stengs yi ge oM bsams la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i kha sbyor ro// sha lnga las ni gdan lngar gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi rlung gis
9b6: pa lags na/ / khamal pa'i 'dud na men/ migags ma dang a/ 'du cigs ni / 'od par gyis sa/ bdu gyiy-in pa pa sa gas // na sa ma
9b7: don smra la / / ga // / ga nga sa shes pa / nas
9b8: rnam kyi nga/ matam pa'i rdza dang gdu tsho bas// mi shes pa ni yang bar gyur/ cig pa myod nam snang ste// ga pa'i mtha' gro mnyam pa nyid/ cig bya pa ta te/ sri dbulas kyi mkha' 'gro mchod/

10a1: cha cig rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ste// so sor kun rtog ye shes mchod// cha cig rang bzhin med pa ste// me long
10a2: lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// u0f7f ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// ga bur sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// gzhan yang rtsal sogs pa la//
10a3: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// thugs ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// gzhan yang
10a4: 'khor lo dbus gnas ni/ / mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// mchog dga' sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gre'o// dpa' bo zla
10a5: ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o// tsan Ta li ni nyi shu bzhi// sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru nges// bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang //
10a6: thig le la ni thams cad 'dus// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cig nyid la// nyi ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor cig du 'dus// dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gdugs//
10a7: shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang // nyi zla yi dkyil na tsan ka yi tshad// de yi dbus su thig le yungs kar tshad// / sngags thod phreng ba ba spu nyag ma tsam
10a8: gyis ni/ / g.yon bskor g.yas bskor dbu mags la sbrul ltar 'khyil// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di la sems ni brtan 'gyur nas// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom// zla ba kA li kA li a/ A li nyi ma la

10b1: thim nas/ / nyi ma zhabs su la thim bsam// zhabs kyu la sogs rim par thim// yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te// de nas nAd phra mo la// sems ni rim par bsgom pa'o// de nas rang /
10b2: rig ye shes te// chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yini 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba
10b3: ste/ / nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi snga rje nas// sor bzhinas ni rtsa gsum gcig/ dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin pas// dang por de ru gzung bar bya//
10b4: de nas sprul pa'i gnas su bzung // yang na zad par shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// gzhang kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // dga'
10b5: ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa/ / bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// byang chub sems rgyu mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga// gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang // lhan cig skyes dga'
10b6: mi dmigs pa/ / chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'// de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// dgongs
10b7: pa dang bcas rim pa'o/ / skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang // sgra can lta bur gnyis su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// skar ma'i
10b8: tshogs ni ji lta bu/ / zung du 'jug pa ji lta bu// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sum bcu rtsa bdun ni// rgyu'i khyad par spros pa'o// sku gsum dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras

11a1: bu'i khyad par spros pa yin/ / rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par bya// chos kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni
11a2: stong pa'i rang bzhin yin/ / thams cad stong par ro gcig pa// 'di ni blang dor med pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga// phyag rgya chen po ye shes gnyis// dam tshig chos
11a3: dang las phyag rgya/ / 'di la rten pa shin du zab// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse e la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang ba yin/
11a4: rig pa la sogs de bzhin te// bsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin bde tshon 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po sa rol gang ba// til dang til mar ji bzhin no// dper na shing sna bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no//
11a5: bde ba chen po de nyid las// skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong dang // khri dang 'bum gyis sgom pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// 'di dag kun gyi rim
11a6: pa yang / / sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni// a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu 'chi ba yis/ haM gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su med par bar//
11a7: mdo'o// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'angar ba la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang // shes rab ye shes 'brel ba ste// dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang /
11a8: gzhad lam g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdo rje rtsa lam nas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba snyam// mchog dga' yi ni ngo bo ste// rdo rje pad ma'ags pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i

11b1: ngo bo yin/ / bde ba'i rgyun chad bde bsnyam// bral ba dga' ba'i nga ba yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub sems phyogs la sogs pa// gong du gsungs par shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste/
11b2: mchog dga' snang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal ba'o// ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i nges pa yin// rigs pa bzhi ni gsang bar 'joms//
11b3: phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyis/ 'khor lo bzhi ru 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la rten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la rten drug gsum ni// nyon
11b4: mongs pa pa bdud yin te/ / 'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdung // rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbas pa bzhi ni lha yi bdud// rig
11b5: pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'jom/ / skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med 'chi bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba
11b6: bzhi dang yum bzhi dang / / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes bzhi po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang // chos tshul
11b7: du ma'i bye brag gis/ / sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yi thams cad bya bar gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge
11b8: slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags/ / de yi bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang /

12a1: bzhi dang bcu dang ldan// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i ga ram chis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtang ba chen po dang // shin du gtod dang rnam par gas ldan
12a2: gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang / / dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste// de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // bum
12a3: pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste/ / de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin// dge ba shes rab ye shes te//
12a4: de nyid slong bas dge slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin pa 'khor lo dang // theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba gsum ni go
12a5: rims bzhin/ / theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing // rigs 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'di gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// cha lugs su ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas
12a6: la sogs bya/ / theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba spyad par ma gsungs te// dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur// zangs las gser gyi rnam par ro// zangs kyi dus na rngo med do// gser du gyur pas rngom snang //
12a7: rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis la gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// de nas pasang ba bzhi pa yang // bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rtag
12a8: g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid/ / gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas ni// sgom byar lhan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te bsgom par bya// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi// dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// sems/

12b1: nyid bsam du med pas na/ mir yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcu gnas su// stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur// rten yod
12b2: ma yin rten pa med/ / dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas kyang rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal pa// khro tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du ma shes
12b3: par/ / phyag rgya chen por yang dag sgoms// dur khrod rgyal po drags pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang minos nas// bsgom
12b4: dang bzlas pa la sogs med/ / gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gshe/ rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs// rdo rje spun tshig slob la phyir// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la smod rnam smin gyis// mnar med sems
12b5: can dmyal bar skye/ / rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs// lugs kyi sor ni bcu drug pa// 'jog pa ru ni nga yis bshad// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis//
12b6: thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes pas rang gi rang rig dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa// rang rig shel
12b7: sdong lta bu dang / / dbyings dang ye shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i don nyid bcad pa'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo d+hu mi srud// gsang ba'i rna tse thabs kyi spyad// gas dab bde skyong 'bras bu'i byung // bum pa/
12b8: chu yi chung du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud yin te// / shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu 'i rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma don 'bras bu'i rgyud// rgud ces pa ni rgyun yin te//

13a1: rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum pa las dang po la gsang // gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye shes gsang bar gsang // rang rig shes rab ye shes
13a2: gsang / / gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang // mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to// //
13a3: dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paNi Da ta gA ya d+ha ra dang // lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
13a4: @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM ba ra gu h+ya A tsin+ta tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
13a5: bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun
13a6: rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to/ / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba// kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso bos bdag la bshad du/
13a7: gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// slu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang // de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa
13a8: bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyis/ / dbye ba mi 'thun grangs dag na// dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dang yang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang // gnas pa'i tshad dang rim pa dag/ gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol//

13b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag chags nyon mongs ye shes sku// ris drug rtsa shing 'khril bcug gi/ rang bzhin dag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo
13b2: yin/ / bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// rtag chad skye 'gag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig cing // gdod nas spros bral bden pa nyid// de don bsam gyis mi khyab
13b3: des/ / de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab// yi ge
13b4: bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ / mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// yi ge dam pa
13b5: bsam mi khyab/ / phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gcer bu thal gos sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi sha dang yang // / ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs/ rol pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i/
13b6: mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chad sgro skur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
13b7: 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha bsgom rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rang rig nam mkha'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam/
13b8: gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu 'bras tha dad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha' ltar ma bcos pa'i// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shing dang sbrul sogs kyi//

14a1: bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni sdug dang mi sdug sogs// bcu dgu phra rab rdul gyi bar// sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya
14a2: bcu gcig chos de bzhin/ / gang zhig 'dus byas rgyas sa byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang // je snyed 'du shes yod kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam//
14a3: mthong lam bsgom lam mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags bdud rtags 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod
14a4: ba'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ / rtag dang chad dang sgro skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mtha pi bar// mtha' yi dbye bas rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang // tshig stong rtsa ba nye ba dang //
14a5: zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // 'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs// rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems dang nam mkha' ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal
14a6: zung 'jug sogs/ / rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang // rim min mos pa khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang /
14a7: sgrub byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar ltung ltu bde// rang rig gzhan rig sems ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge skam po dang // mthar ltung dbu mar khas len pa// de
14a8: ni sems nyid rang rig dang / / brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mi mthun pa yi phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang // rang rig/

14b1: spyi yi rnam pa yis// rang rig ye shes chen po la// thabs dang thabs las byung ba 'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rang 'byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang /
14b2: de la sgrib pa ma yin te// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no// rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su dbye// rang rig sprin mad nam mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar mtshungs// sprin tshogs
14b3: rlung gis gtor byas te/ / sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dper na skyes bu nam mkha' lta ba la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig
14b4: la bsgribs pa las/ / nam mkha' de la ma sgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o//
14b5: kun kyang nyon mongs rnam par byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las// rnam thar stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam
14b6: gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o/ / byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang
14b7: lnga/ / bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgyad sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig bzhan rig gnyis// thog/
14b8: ma med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas// rang rig med par gzhan rig dag/ so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spangs rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan

15a1: !/ / 'das// kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ rig pas p+lang dor gnyis su rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la ba d+hartsa ban// theg chen mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis/
15a2: khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen po ros gang ba// mas gsum 'khor ba kun shes na// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba
15a3: la/ / 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i don dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig med// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs// sems med nam mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa
15a4: med cing rim pa med/ / dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// ye shes med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa// bsam mi khyab du gnas pa ste// 'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsom pa//
15a5: rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu bo ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de slab// rig 'dzin sa
15a6: la gnas par bya/ / rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te// bcwa lngas yi bdag nyid las// sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam
15a7: stobs/ / de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang // rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du
15a8: byas pa'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yis// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag nyid de nyid tshul gyis ni//

15b1: mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyu gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon// bral te dben par gnas pa
15b2: ni/ / snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te// rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to// snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// bya ba rtsal med cing bgrod pa med// rang byung lhun gyis grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan
15b3: nyid la/ / mthar phyin nga yi tshad yin no// 'dod chags ro yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyal po'i dus// khyad par can du gsungs
15b4: pa'o/ / gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi// gzugs la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa'i rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyan bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// sgral
15b5: sogs pa'i de bzhin no/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mangs rjes nas rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no// gzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam gyis mi khyab sgyu yi dus// bla ma'i zhal nas
15b6: shes par bya/ / sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams dang snying rje la sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang / gzo dang rgyu rtsal la sogs dang // bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa'i rim pa kun// skye ba gcig gam du mas
15b7: ni/ / yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed dang rdzogs sogs mi gnas shing // rdzogs pa chen por gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud
15b8: rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ / bar mchod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs ni bco brgyad de// mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang // yul drug dug gsum rten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la brten// sa chu

16a1: me rlung sgra brten no/ / chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i// rang rig bsgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla ma'i sems bzung dang por gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin ste// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa/
16a2: gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro// sems ni gzod nas rang rig pa// gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de brten sems bzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags
16a3: zhesdang dang / / gti mug rjes su mkhas pas bzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par bsgom// bye brag sems bzung bsam mi khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg chen la// man ngag yod pa ma yin te/
16a4: lha bskyod pa sems gzung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu la ma dang yod// dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal dub mtha' spangs tshogs chung dang // tshegs so sra ba yi khyad par dang // khyad par
16a5: rnam pa bcwa lnga yis/ / rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab pa la// sbyin dang byams sogs dgongs paci// sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung // bsam mi khyab la
16a6: legs pa nas papa/ / de nyid kyi lags phyi u0f7f// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas// gzhon rig rnam rtog pagags pa dang // sgra gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can rnams
16a7: desangs rgyas sa/ / byung ba'i byen du nges pas na// bas ma mi khyab la mi gnas byung // sbyin sogs yang de bsgrub par bya// de la bas pa mi khyab 'byung // sgra gnyis slobs dang mi 'jig sa dang // gsum du cing 'dzin lag
16a8: kur/ / sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas nas// bsam mi khyab pa 'byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang //

16b1: bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sems kyi yi ge mgo ga dag ces// rang sems las su rung ban// de ni phyi rtags nang du ste// de nyid nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // lus la dri med srid
16b2: bu maud/ / skra dkar gnyer ma sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang // sprin med mkha' ltar gang snang ba// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag
16b3: thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ / dpal 'khor li sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzog
16b4: paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba shA kya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI khA sa ma tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dpal
16b5: bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dris gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
16b6: pa de dag gi nang nas mkha' spyod ma dang / / sa spyod ma dang // sa 'og na spyod pa ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de// gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa// dang ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems// lum ngag
16b7: gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan/ / 'jigs med rtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// la ma la spro bar gyis la legs par nyon// mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// nga yis khyod la bshad pa byas pa' spyong steng sgo'i rlung
16b8: yin te/ / sa spyod bar du thig le'i sgo/ sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi

17a1: mtshan nyid ye shes rlung / / mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang // lte ba lus
17a2: kyis khyab pa ru/ / rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de// thun re la ni 'pho ba gnyis// rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'pho ba gcig
17a3: la chu tshod gnyis/ / chu tshod re la dbyu gu gnyis// rlung gi dbyu gu drug cu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri cig stong drug brgya sogs// sems dang sems min 'dres pa'i rlung // rags pa dang ni pra ba la// mkhas pas
17a4: sems kyi bzhon par gzung / / rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang
17a5: bzhin te/ / de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyis// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon ma dang // 'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas// bems
17a6: po rlung gi lam yin te/ / dbang po mngon sum la ma yin pas// sna yi ri rab gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang chub lhor rgyug gis// thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la// 'bad pas sems ni bzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag
17a7: gnas/ / mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyis ni lam gyur pa// ro ma dang ni rkyang ma'o// sbrul 'khyil lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i
17a8: yul/ / gnas der rnam rtog rlung 'gag go/ rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // kun 'dar ma yi rtsa la rten// tsan Da li ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas der 'bad de rang rig

17b1: gzung / / mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin no// de nas sa spyod bshad bya ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsaN Da li yi bye brag brtag/ dang por rang bzhin tsaN Da li// gnyis pa gtum po caNar
17b2: li/ / gsum pa kha sbyar raN Da li// de bzhin gcer bu'i tsan Da li// de nyid la yang dbye ba ste// gcer bu gtum mo shin du gtum// yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu
17b3: dang / shin tu gcer bu gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya// dbyen rnam pa bcu gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs// gzhan skyes
17b4: kyi ri khro ma tsag pra ba de la bzlog pa'o/ / brgya dang nyi shu skra yi rtse// sum cu rtsa gnyis skra yi rtse// lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon pra sbom dang / gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes
17b5: par bya/ / dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i rtsar// rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po che//
17b6: 'di la brten nas thams cad 'byung // rigs 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang // dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol pa las ni dngos grub min// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod ma'i dngos grub ste// thams
17b7: cad kun gyi rten yin no/ / sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum// dang po chos nyid sems yin te// 'di ni shes brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang rig byang chub
17b8: sems/ / dper na rkyen gyis shel sgo bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems// si h+la dang ni ga pur ste// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gnas// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems//

18a1: ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las
18a2: kyi me yis mi mdzag par/ / kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las// mi shigs haM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la mtsher dang gzi ma dngas snum// bde ba chen po'i skur byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems//
18a3: dmar la gdangs pa'i rang bzhin la// khyad par bzhi ni thun mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing srid pa skye// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam
18a4: kun rdzob kyis/ / sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'chol pa las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba las de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul min// kun rdzob tshor ba bde ba'i/
18a5: yul// sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum bsgom mi phyed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthor thug dor// sna tshogs sems las
18a6: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / nor bu dang ni mal snyan bzhin// rtog med rten las sna tshogs 'byung // A la~M kA li ma ning dang // drug tu sbyor brtag par bya// sgra mtha'i yig bas ma mi khyab// yan lag rnam pa gsum yin te//
18a7: 'bras parda dang brda can dang // brjod pa dang ni rjod byung ngo // de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las gzhan// thun mau spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// skas pa dbang dang
18a8: sngags su dbye/ / sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// snod dang snod min bye brag kyang // bla mas legs par brtag bya ste/

18b1: de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs pa// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor/
18b2: dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya med rnal 'byor de lta ga la// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang ba de lta ga la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po rtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab
18b3: bsrub shing la/ / gnyis med thugs kyis bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ron nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ma dkrogs /
18b4: ma las// 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi ro 'dra seng ge'i gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku gsung thugs
18b5: kyis byin rlabs te/ / mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad// phyag brgya bzhi yis rgyas btab po// dam du sra zhing dam du spel// rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag ni// sku gsung thugs kyi
18b6: rang bzhin te/ / de yi ngo bo rgyud kun brtag/ sngags la gnyis te chos la gnyis// dbyibs kyang de bzhin shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug bzhi// rlung
18b7: kun phyag rgya bzhi yin te/ / de nyid bye ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyi ni NaN Di la// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas
18b8: ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ / mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad// bu ru rab gtum gsang rdo rje// dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod// so ru 'od ldan bsam mi khyab// a ru sA rtsen ma mkha' mnyam// go ru

19a1: bstan blonam mkha' che/ / ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin chen phreng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru er stobs po che// oM ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang // tri ru rlung shugs ye shes phreng //
19a2: ru chang 'thung ye shes 'bar// ka ru ShA ma zla ba'i phreng // la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar// ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i 'khor// he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal// pre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'grogs // gri ru khaN Da gsang me 'bar// so ru shon
19a3: ti gsang bdud rtsi/ / su ru 'khor lo dur khrod rgyan// na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal// su ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom// de dag gtad do legs par spos//
19a4: nang du tsaN Da li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni gtang ba ste// dang po gsang ba gnyis pa'ang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang // rkyen ni tha mas gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin//
19a5: dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pas// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi ro yi ra li las// bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub
19a6: blang / / yid la zung la dran par gyis// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs skye
19a7: pa Ni ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar skad du/ shA mahA ShA tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen
19a8: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro

19b1: mgrangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' tshe rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te// phyen gsang pa'i
19b2: mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ / kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang // bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
19b3: bka' stsal pa/ / bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang // kha dog dbyibs la log rtog gis// bskyed pa'i
19b4: gzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// yang dag lam ston bla ma med// zhe sdang ru drar skye ba yi// rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha 'i bu yi/
19b5: bdud yin te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus// srog 'chad pa ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas nas// lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom// log rtogs du ma'i rtog pa 'gag/ des na phung po'i bdud bco mo//
19b6: rten dang rten pa ro mnyam pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dus min 'chi dang tshe zad pas// 'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe yis 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud 'joms
19b7: bye brag ni/ / phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len// grub na 'tshe bdag bdud 'joms so// de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste// rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan/
19b8: de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ru dum phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi

20a1: 6/ / pra yi bdud// byi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ni// sgo gsum 'khrul bar gang ston pa// bla ma lha yi bu la bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i
20a2: de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud/ / de nyid 'bar de bsgrub byas kyang // 'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo//
20a3: de nyid sgyu mar shes par bya// de nyid shes pas phung po dang // nyon mongs pa yi bdud btso mo// dngos po'i mthar lhung skye bas 'chi// rgyu med las skye 'chi ba ste// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas// sgyu mas 'chi bdag
20a4: bdud bcom mo/ / tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes bdud bzhi yang // rtsa dang shu kra la sogs pa'i// dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud// de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud// de sgom
20a5: rang bzhin nyon mongs pas/ / nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// kha dog dbyibs ni skyes pas 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang // 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'o// bla maN+Da'i/
20a6: bu'i bdud// dga' ba bzhin du ma ste// rgyud la srungs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems nyon mongs nyon mongs bdud// 'khor ba ltung bas skye ba ste// skye ba las byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa bye bas so//
20a7: 'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud// ma spangs sum bcu drug nyid dang // nges pa sum bcurtsa drug gi/ lam ba rten thams lha bdud bcom// dga' bzhi snam rang bzhin med// bde chen ror 'gyur phung po bcom//
20a8: 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// de yis 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi//

20b1: dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste// rgyal po dmangs srababs pa bzhin// de nyid las gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal po rgyalas shor ba bzhin// bzhi pa dang 'brel badrud bzhin// gsum pa'i gnod dang ldan pa la/
20b2: bzhi pa'i lab stod bla ma ni// lha yi bA yi bdud yin te// bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal nas shes// sdod mi na gsang bsgrogs pa dang // mar dang khar la sogs pa// 'thungs te ma'u drag 'gyur bzhin// 'ad par bdud
20b3: kyis zin pa ste/ / rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbang dang gdam dag 'brel bcas pa'i// bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag du rab tu grags// bla ma gcig
20b4: la snong gcud gnyis/ / thob na de nyid dam pa ste// bla ma gcig la dbang thob nas// bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya// bla ma rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// byi yi bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma bdag po'i lha// bdud dadang
20b5: dgra yi sde rnams kun/ / thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsung
20b6: de'i tshe 'khor 'das pa de dag dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang // thams cad chud la dag shing mgranas rjes su yid rang bar gyur to// dpal nam mkha' chen po'i drung kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
20b7: rta ga dag mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang // lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya garaHda d+ya/ shI kA ya thA ga tan rdza dang / bod skad du// dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po//
20b8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mchog gyur 'di la yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas

21a1: bka' stsal ba/ / sku ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo ba ste// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI// dam tshig sgron mgos dkar po// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad ga ni/
21a2: rgyud kyi don la rim goms shing // sme ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs la// gzhan gyi rtsod pas mi rdzi yang // dbang dang man ngag ma thob par// dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs// sngags spyod ngal ba don med yin// shrI nas sem
21a3: can dmyal bar skye/ / de phyir gtso bos dbang bskur gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang por bum dbang rim pa yang // gnas ni shin du bsngags pa btsal// bkra shis yid dga'
21a4: shin du snum/ / bkra shis bya rnams snyan par sgrogs// dpag bsam shing rgyas yod par 'dod// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod
21a5: yon gyis/ / sa bslang phyir ni tho rnams gzugs// de nas dang po bsnyen pa 'bul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring ste// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang
21a6: sgra/ / grangs ni stong dang khri dang 'bum// dus ni bcwa lnga bcu gsum dang // bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams mnyes pas bsnyen byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya/
21a7: bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi// bu mos sa yi phyogs 'thun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtag/ so shing rtse mor me tog dri// bsrung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor
21a8: slob ma rab 'bring tha/ / ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgra ma// kham par yi sngags kyis kyang // de la rdo rje khyab par bya// de la ku sha la sogs pa/ dkyil ba'i cho ga dang

21b1: ldan mapa sa/ / sa pa sa/ ra// da / k+Sha sa / //
21b2: stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs// byin rlabs tshogs bsag phyi ru dgod// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lag dri yis byug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten sprul pa las sad na// he ru kar
21b3: grags chen po yi/ / dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam// dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis// rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen por lung bstan pa/
21b4: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la bstsol// pad ma las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba dgyes pa bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog du// mgon po bdag
21b5: ni 'jug par 'tshal/ / legaso legs so rigs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'jigs byed pas// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi
21b6: non khyod kyis blangs/ / dam tshig spyod pa spyad pa yi// mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du spel// nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam gtan la// 'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya//
21b7: chang ni rtag bdud khro mi bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// thun mong sdom dang sems bskyed sbyin// bskor ba lan
21b8: gsum phyag gsum bya/ / yol bas bar du bcad nas ni// mig la sogs pa lnga bkab la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis gsang dag bya// me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang // de yi snying la gzhag la bsgom//

22a1: slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya// byi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab// sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas b+hA dang snga yis dr-i// lce yis/
22a2: ro dang lus kyis reg/ dngos grub 'phrin las so so ru// mkhas pas brtag par shes par bya// me tog dor te lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtsob yan lag yin// gtso ba'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis/
22a3: dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis// mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// pad ma
22a4: mdab ma brgyad pa ru/ / bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// chu khams mi bskyod me long gis// rdo rje rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te// mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi
22a5: phrin las 'grub/ / 'od dpag med pa'i rdo rje'i dbang // so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad ma rigs kyi 'phrin las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//
22a6: rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang // rdo rje dang ni rdo rje sems// rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su// rig byed slob dpon
22a7: dbang sbyin bya/ / bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgyal chen bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan gzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab// gdugs kyi steng nas dgab par bya// rdo rje dril bu rtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya dam tshig
22a8: gsum po yin/ / dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang // rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldog/ brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yin par nga yis

22b1: gsungs/ / bum pa'i dbang gi las rnams te// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yin// gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems
22b2: kyi gnas bcas nas/ / bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su// gsang ba'i dbang gis rten gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang // dkyil
22b3: 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang / / bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // bsrung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri yi thig le du ma bya// g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang // bsrub dang bsrub bcas sbyor byas dang // srub las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis//
22b4: lus kun khyab nas gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i 'khor lor b+hU bsams la// lce de pad mar byin brlabs te// lce yi rtse mor b+hAms pas la// sid+d+ha ga bur 'dres
22b5: ba yis/ / b+hU la bzhag te de la bstim// so gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyar la// dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje rtse mor byon pa dang // sbom po khro mos sbyin pa dang // rdo rje gro tshangs sbyin
22b6: pa'o/ / shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang por shes rab brtag pa ni// lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tshe longs spyod dang // rgyan dang
22b7: gzugs kyi khyad par lnga/ / phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba rdo rje yi// lang tshe'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas brgyan shes pa
22b8: ste/ / de rje'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin// de nyid gsum du mi 'gyur ba// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de yi rol longs spyod pa// rdo rje'i longs spyod

23a1: khyad par ro/ / kun dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o// de nyid mda' ltar mkhrid pa ni// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la gdang ba dang // byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas/
23a2: gnyis su med par gsal ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// dar la bzlas pa ji bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la lA na dang ra sa na// a ba d+hA tIr gnyis med la// thugs kyi longs spyod khyad par ro// dang
23a3: bopor phyi la gnyis pa nang / / gsum pa gsang ba'i brtag pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag rtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid rtag thugs su 'gyur ba'o// sgyu ma tsam gyis dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyab par shes
23a4: par bya/ / lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por smi ga rgyu chur 'khrul dang // gnyis pa smig rgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya// tshul
23a5: bdun no mar la gcig/ dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis// sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams btsal ba'i rten gyur pa// lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs// ro ni gnyis te bu ram gcig/ chang ni gnyis su shes par bya//
23a6: rgyan ni bye brag sna tshogs so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha/ zhag gcig na ni bcu dang ldan// dbyar dang sgyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drong dang ldan na bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// 'dun pa byas nad mchig
23a7: nyams/ / rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no// de bas kun gyi bcud bskyed de// dngang ba kun gyis ro rtse byed// bcud skyed
23a8: sha ni gnon nu zhes/ / ro rtsa sha ni bcwa lnga yin// bcud bskyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsre// chang ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgo ngacha mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga

23b1: gnyis gtso bor bya/ / kha ra'i chang nga ma 'o ma'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya// 'di ni yan lag spos bcas so// de nas mtshams bcad bsnyen pa dang // dam tshig sa tshogs bya ba yang // spros pa med pa'i yan lag
23b2: yin/ / dbang bskur sngon du bsgoms pa'i don// dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma gtang dang man ngag sbyin// brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// brtag pa shin du spros pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas
23b3: 'khyud/ / dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyan mgul rgyan la sogs pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs pa cog pu gan rgyal dang // kha sbub 'phreng dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab//
23b4: dgongs med spyod pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod
23b5: mi lang / / dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// yan lag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman ni dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs//
23b6: gsum pa ting nge 'dzin yin te// sngags dang sman gyis kun da drang // rked bcing tshad dang gnas pa'i tshad// grang ba'i tshad rnams shes par bya// 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs 'thun pa'i// rkeng bcing rgod pa'i tshad dang mnyam//
23b7: sor gsum sor bzhi dngar ma men// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar gsang ba'i pho brang gnas// skye mched rig par gnas pa'o// stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas//
23b8: 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru kar ni ma gshegs cing // rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'i tshad ni sor bzhi 'byung // dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la// sman dang snum

24a1: dang dri dang gsum/ / sum cha sum gnyis stong skad du// lus la bslu zhing me la bdug/ rje gsum na ni shin tu zag// ba ba dang lci ba dang / rang mnye ba dang nye'u shing dang // ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas//
24a2: rdo la sogs pa lnga sbyar dang // gzhan yang sman dang sngam dang dri// dar la sogs pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas ni tho sngos bdug/ zab pa'i sngags btab bsgom byan// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan
24a3: sna tshogs 'byung / / tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur na// sngags dang sman dang khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa
24a4: bsam mi khyab/ / bdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang //
24a5: ye shes go zlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa go bzlog sbyor ba dang /
24a6: dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rtsa yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang // brda yi ge
24a7: bzlog sbyor ba dang / / rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams// kun mkhyen pas kyang ma gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting nge
24a8: 'dzin gyi khyad par ro/ / 'di yi khyad par ma dpags par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin// dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang // gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab
