46b5: rang gi mtshan nyid la/ / 'pho bam spangs rang rig pa sgom// phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las// phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dad med bla ma
46b6: ma rten dang / / bla ma dam pa ma rnyed dang // ma spangs ngo bo ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bcwa lnga yang // rgyu dang rgyan dang
46b7: gnas dang yang / / gtang bgo rims grangs dang rim// nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags ni spos bcas spros med des// na shi reg tu lus ni sati ga y-ini gong 'og khyad par nges// sun 'byor gnyen
46b8: po nges pa dang / / ngo bo nges dang dbye ba des// las nges pa dang bcwa lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag/ bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nab shes// ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongs su shes gyur na// 'khrul pa

47a1: dang ni 'khrul ba'i ga'i/ / thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // gong bu chu dang gzugs suganas/ de bzhin gzugs las 'das
47a2: ba ste/ gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang // rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste// rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes byas ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang // de yi man ngag
47a3: shes par bya/ / bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bad de nan tan bya// dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
47a4: rdzogs s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang // lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ shI dz+nyA na rA dza tan tA rA dzA/ bod skad du/
47a5: dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i
47a6: phyir/ / dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// bzod nas ma skyes ma grub la// skye dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul//
47a7: dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par brjod pa la// sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu
47a8: dang rkyen kyis skye bas 'khrul/ / brda dang tha snyad bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul byed pas 'khrul// mtha' bral u mar gnas pa la// rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul// shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// bdag dang bdag/

47b1: gir 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la// dngos por rjes su 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang nyid gnyis su med pa la// bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gdul
47b2: bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi/ / theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la// sgro dang bskur ba 'debs pas 'khrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis/ las kyi rnam smin la sogs la// lta bas skur ba 'debs pas 'khrul// rang rig
47b3: bzod nas 'od gsal la/ / sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na//
47b4: 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang chen po dang // de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// // de bzhin
47b5: gti mug bcom ldan 'das/ / 'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyi// 'di spangs gzhan gyis grol ba min// bdag po lha dang bla ma spun// bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan// skye bo'i
47b6: bems po che dang brgyad/ / de dag rang rig thob pa'i rgyu// de phyir dam tshig gtso bor bsrung // 'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung // kye ma mgon po kyi sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na// de yi po ji ltar lags// ni sdang
47b7: la sogs de dang 'dra/ / rdo rje snying pa snying rje che// legs par nyon la yid la zung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras mi shes gti mug te// lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhe sdang yin to // gsum gyis// kun nas/
47b8: bslang ste nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so// dbang sogs ngo bo gang las shes// 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste// ngo bo sgyu mar gang shes dang //

48a1: dbang po'i sgo bsdus thabs yin no// gong ma skye ba'i sgrar 'gyur ba'i// phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang // de las gzhan dag mos 'gyur dang // mdab mi mos spong ba dang // nyon
48a2: mongs spyi yis zil ma non/ / / bye brag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mi non 'og ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang // nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag spong // gnyen po yin par
48a3: nges pa dang / / nyon mongs skra rtse tsam ma skye// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// bcu yis 'dod chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lta spyod ma rtogs par//
48a4: sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag bla ma dam pa las// man ngag dam pa btsal bya ste// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul bzhi las// sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang // de'i tshe rgyud kyi don
48a5: la dga' zhing rjes su yid rang bar gyur to/ / dpal ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
48a6: rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ka gu h+ya tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs mgon po kye// dbang rnams dam
48a7: pa yod dam ci/ / gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis// de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das
48a8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ / rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes lpags pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges pa kho na ste// lus ngag kun nas

48b1: bzang ba la/ / de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang gtor dang bsreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bur gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rims kyis ma bgrod
48b2: dbang mi thob/ / bskyed pa'i rimal legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang // mngon par rtogs ni
48b3: rim pa dang / / mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go/ 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pas so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems
48b4: kyi rgyal po yin/ / 'di ni rang rig bzhi pa'i dbang // 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang // ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi//
48b5: gzugs brnyan yongasu rdzogs pa la// byin brlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma la sogs de ltar na// phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan
48b6: yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i bzhi// bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin pa lta bu yi// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i sred pas srid par 'ching // 'khrul pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor//
48b7: de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud spangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rigs dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spangs shing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang // mos
48b8: pa'i rje su 'brang byed cing / / che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lha spyod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par thal ba'o// rigs kyi khyad

49a1: par drug pa'i rigs/ / de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo 'khor las khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis//
49a2: rol phyin pa'i ming mi thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong dang grong khyer ji bzhi no// de bzhin dam
49a3: tshig bye brag kyang / / rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig
49a4: dadang 'dra/ / lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra// tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
49a5: ming ni mi thob bzhin/ / bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang // rang sems las su rung ba dang // ma rungs pa dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni/
49a6: ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongasu rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su skad// tha dad par ni mi rtag ste// chu khams gser dang na mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pa
49a7: sems can gdod nas sangs rgya'o/ / rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ dbye ba khyod kyis bdag la gsungs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes ma
49a8: skyes na/ / srog gcod nyams pa chung ngur des// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor bdag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por des// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'brid

49b1: du nges/ / cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos ltung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dag/ brjed ngas la sogs 'bring
49b2: du gsungs/ / gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// ce 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshad dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis g.yas// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba'i ngo bos zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon
49b3: gyi/ / spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po gzhengs// tshul dang 'thun par bshud bar bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shes par bya// gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la// sbyin bsreg
49b4: gis ni sdig sreg phyir/ / nang gi sbyin bsreg chen po brtsam// zab pa'i me ni rgyun bzhag med// thabs kyi rgyun bzhag me yin te// lo bdun dag ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// zla ba bdun
49b5: dang gsum dag ni/ / 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs/ rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdong nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di
49b6: ni rgyun gzhag chen po'i me/ / thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis bsregs byas na/
49b7: nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad gyis legs par zung // thams cad dga'
49b8: zhing mgu bar gyur/ / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// /

50a1: rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+har dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @// rgyu ga skad du/ shrI dz+wa la ag ne grah+ya ya tan d+ha rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpalags ba
50a2: me'abar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo
50a3: b+ha ga la snyoms par bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang na rdo rje phag mos gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang // 'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang// ro ni gang lags ro chen gang // de bzhin shib chen po gapa
50a4: thal ba gang lags thal chen gang / tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs dang shes rab snyoms
50a5: 'jug pa/ / rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dus min lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus tshod nges par shes bya ste// bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad
50a6: par gyi/ 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog gi rtsol ba la thim ste// rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam
50a7: snang thar dbral ba yi/ / skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bdun bar du bzhag/ lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das// de nas shib chen por grags// lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid do zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes/
50a8: dbab dang ye shes brtan// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru// dri yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus

50b1: b+h+yas gnas ni bcu gnyis su/ / dr-i yi thig le bcu gnyis bya// dang 'bom par 'gros byin gyis brlag// gzhan yang brgyan la sogs bkun// dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges// ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste/
50b2: dri yi thig le tha mar nges// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug spangs kyis// he ru ka grags chen por bzhengs// rang gi bdag po gang yin pa// he ru ka drangs pa dang // de la dus drug mchod pas mchod/
50b3: dag ron chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la rten nas// chos sku gzugs brnyan rim bzhin brtsig/
50b4: yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas khang pa brtseg mar brtsig/ mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang // tsan dan gur gum la sogs pa'i// dri'is chu gi zhom man ma ngo sogs pa/ shi ldan mi'i shi um/ nga bas du yod pa'i khung
50b5: shing tshad dang 'thun pa yis/ / tha ba khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig/ bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi mi 'jigs
50b6: seng ge brgyad/ / ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhug pa dang // sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te/
50b7: me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyang // mi yi khang pa mdzes pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// me mched sdig pa bsreg pa yi// sngags dang rdzas
50b8: sogs gzhan dang 'dra/ / me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg par bya// dung la sogs pa byung na

51a1: rag ma byung na yang chog rnams/ / rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams// 'di ni zil ba chen po ste// de 'os gzhan la thal bar gsungs// da nas rus bzhag gsum ni// gur grum la
51a2: sogs dris gtor te/ / rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya rus pa brdung // ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs
51a3: bsgos pa'i nang du ste/ / dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa yi// steng du seng ge'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi brgyan// steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te// gnas der rus pa bzhag byas la// me
51a4: tog byas nas zhag lnga ru/ / bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la// gdung byung sta gon bdun pa la// tsha tsha rab tu gnas par bya// dang por ro sreg dus su yang // shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste//
51a5: drug pa ro yi sta gon no// bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas// dang por snang ba gnyis par ro// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum/ gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman la med cing de rjes med//
51a6: thabs su ma gsungs shes rab kyi// rtsa rgud bshad rgyung phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron mar yi yi// rgyud du khyod lang yis bshad/
51a7: nas tsha tsha'i rim pa yang // snang ba rgyal po la sogs la// 'thun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs blang // mi snangs bdag la sogs la// gtor ma me yis sa sogs blang // de nas sdud pa rnam lnga yang //
51a8: phan pa rdo rje can dang yang // gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs sbyang sogs// cho ga gzhan dang 'thun par bya// dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya//

51b1: zangs su yod gtor ma gtang sbyin pasreg dag gis zhi byas te// gcig gas lnga'am bdun nas ni// nyi shu rtsagacig brgyartsa brkyang // ci nus par ni gang ba par bya// dus nam tshan pa shab// nga ba'an
51b2: la bar rtsag phrag rgya can 'jig+sag+sa pa/ / bsum pa bzhapa gas pa dag/ chos pag la gagags brgyag dag// sa dam ga pa// sa pa dung rdzu 'du// gsas pas
51b3: gdag/ bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang po 'bo bas ma lhung la// gnyis pa rabasreg ma lhung ba'o// gsum patshachas ma ldangan// 'chi ba bas pa dam pa ste// sring ba'i 'chi ba las grol ngas// dman pa'i
51b4: babalasogs pas/ / lhung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te// 'pho ba la sogs gdam dag byung // rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par gzung // nga'i tshe 'jig rten
51b5: gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yos par gyur to/ / mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab bo// dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma dang dur khrod na gnas pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjes su yid rang bar
51b6: gyur to/ / dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a mri ta gu h+ya tan tra
51b7: rA dzA/ / bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
51b8: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// dkyil 'khor dbye ba ji lta bu// sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu// sbyin

52a1: bsreg mchod la sogs ji lta bu/ / khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang // phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ste nang dulus
52a2: kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ / gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te// bzhi parang rig byang chub sems// de rnams lha yi mtshan nyid kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan rags pa'i lam// khro tshul drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i gar dag
52a3: rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu yis// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // lus kyi dri 'khru zhe sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa// de nyid
52a4: kyi ni dkyil 'khor te/ / rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang // pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yi ni// de nas nang
52a5: gi dkyil 'khor yang / / rnam grol steng du gdan khri rlung // rang gi bdag po'i lha yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba dang // zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang // tshig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// las ni rags pa'i las
52a6: 'joms shing / ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa/ mkha' spyong rlung du shes par bya// gang zhig snang ba bsgom pa dang // de bzhin mun pa bsgom pa dag/ nyin dang mtshan mor rab tu grags// gnod mdzes lha
52a7: stangs dman pa ste/ / tshul de de las bzlog pa'o// dang por yod bcing sna rtsor bya// de bzhin sems cing rlung bcing yang // nam mkha' sor bzhi de nas stong // de nas bar du thig le yang // yan lag dang bcas yan lag/
52a8: me/ shin du yan lag med pa ste/ yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyis sbyor ba ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma ning 'dras pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgo tsan Da li// kha sbyor dang ni

52b1: smug po sogs/ / rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang // bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang // gtum mo rang bzhin spar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo zhar la sba rab
52b2: dang / / gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang // spyi bo'i gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol ba'i rong bzhin gtum mo dang // chag pa'i rang bzhin gtum mo ste// nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i
52b3: dkyil 'khor yang / / dbang po gnyis sbyor kun du ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga' ba la sogs sgyu ma yis// phra ba'i lam spong las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i b+ha// de nas
52b4: bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ / chos sku skye med nam mkha' bzhin// rang rig stong pa 'od gsal la// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma sgoms pas kyang nyes pa min// bsgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste// mi sgom pa yang rtog pa nyid//
52b5: bsgom du rdul tsam med pa la// yongs su skad cig med pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes mi bo che// thams cad 'di la gnas pa ste// dper na 'khor los slu ba'i rgyal po
52b6: ngag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad bsdur ba ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i// las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di la sdud par nges// las/
52b7: ni zab pa'i lam spong ste// sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum 'joms// gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// sbyin bsreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// spyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi sbyin bsreg kyang // lte ba snying ka spyi bo mgrin// rigs ni/
52b8: nges pa'i babazang / rba ni su~M ba gsung masrid gting ga thugs te yon tan dang / phrin las gtum mi gnyis su ngas// d+ha dang rgya dang thig me dang/ nga bzhin rnas pa'i seshes me sa dgapas bdag pa na// du mdag byan mtshan nam
52b9: tog dag gardzas bcog nyim mchod gtab zhi basbyin pa dang / rnam tog theg phying sbyin bsreg ste/ nga lus ye shes me yis ni/ rtog pa'i dred shing bsreg bya na bsreg tshad ma ste/ tis sogs rdzig par ma pa'am/ kyi nyid me kyi

53a1: bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci/ / bsreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me// dbang pos spyod yul ma yin te// de phyir las kyi me nyid la// til sogs bsreg pa'i las byas kyang // nges par sdig pa tshig mi 'gyur//
53a2: mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bstan pa tsam du nges pa ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtogs pas bstan pa med// dgang gzang thugs gzar la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ci
53a3: sbyin bsreg kyang / / thab khrang lte ba 'am sA rtse ste// chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang ba yi// gtum mo ye shes me sbar te// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar thugs gzar gyis// shukra rtsa dang drung /
53a4: srogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog pa'i bsreg rdzas bsreg/ bde ba'i me lha mchod par bya// zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang // phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhU~M/ nang du bdud
53a5: rtsi mtshan nyid de/ / gsang bar mchog chad dbus na gnas// mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go// spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste// bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o// gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar thug
53a6: stong pa'i ro yis mchod/ / 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed// a ba d+hU tI'i kA pA la ra// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam rtog bgegs chen zhi bar byed//
53a7: bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phra ba'i gdon chen ni byas pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsungs// rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros// bde chen gdon ni zhi byas pa// 'di ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges// phyag
53a8: 'tshal bskor ba la sogs dang / / sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes// gang gi phyir na sbyin bsreg na// dngos grub dam pa steng ba dang // rnam rtog sreg phyir sbyin bsreg ste// shing sogs sreg pa sbyin bsreg min /

53b1: mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// spos sogs bral bas mnyes pa med// rang sems las su rung ba dag/ mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste// gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // bang chad zhi dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i
53b2: b+hirin gtong ma ste/ / 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te// rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par// gdon mog
53b3: zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir/ / sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yi// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // dam tshig gso dang lha rnams 'go/ dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar
53b4: 'gyur/ / phyi nang gtor mar nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang // lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor lha ma yin// lus dang yan lag tu ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus la/
53b5: ma thu g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po sgo gsum g.yeng ba dgag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung // sgo gsum zhi phyir lha zhes brjod// yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems las su rung ba dang // rnam rton
53b6: gdon rnams las skyob phyir/ / 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs// gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// thams cad bla ma'i zhal nas blang // rjud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams
53b7: cad rgyud kyi don la yid rang bar gyur to/ / dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+hur dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bskur ba'o// /
53b8: rgya gar skad du/ shrI sh+ma shA ni a lang ka ra tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs btud

54a1: nas/ drar khrod gang lags rgyan gang lags// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs rdo rje snying po lags// legs par nyon la legs par bzung // dang por drang khrod bshad
54a2: bya ste/ / dur khrod sbyi da ngadabye brag gnas// gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol te// rdo rjer ba'i nang rol du// 'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas// bye brag shar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang // lcags ri nag po tshun cad/
54a3: rdorje rabs de nyid do// chen po khru ni nyi shu ste// chung ba khru gang ban chad do// de las gzhan pa dkyil 'khor ni// tshad las nges par 'das pa'o// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brgyad// mi mnga'i rtag su dur khrod brgyad/ phyogs
54a4: dang phyogs bral rtag tu dgod/ / tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtagasu shing brgyad rim pas dgod// de bzhin gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i// rtag su klu brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom
54a5: pa'i/ / rtag su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod// de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyud// rnam rtog zil gnon
54a6: brgyad por bshad/ / mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan yin no// de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dang por dur khrod bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru ha har dgod ser che// nub tu mi bzang dmar po ste// byang du
54a7: tshang tshing ljang ku che/ / me ru g.yer ka can yin te// bden bral 'tshamasu 'bar ba 'dzin// rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du ni dbyibs can du// b+hu tsa ri khe tsa sha ni// sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod//
54a8: ba ta li dang bA sa ni// sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnams mtshan nyid kyang // 'bar ba tshig dang ma tshig sogs// keng rus thod pa la sogs dang // ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// lce sbyang sgra yis

54b1: 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / shar drug rig ye shi // mas shwa thA ye shi// rlub tu lang gi seng gi shing / byang dra chu ta'i shing drus// grong dang mtshungs pan kro/ gti stug u0f88u0f90 dag/ nas dbang ldan pasas srung sho/
54b2: ltar grags pa'i gzugasu 'dod// shar du dbang po gnas pa ste// lho rug shin rje gnas pa'o// nub tu klung dbang gnas pa ste// byang du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o// lho nub mtsham su srin po gnas//
54b3: nub byang mtshams rlung dgod de// byang shar mtsham su dbang ldan dgod// nyi zla shar las bdag nub// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugasu dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste// 'jog po lho ste stobs rgyu nug// pad ma byang la bad chen me/
54b4: hu lu hu lu srin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan mtsham su'o// gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugasu dgod// kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// shar du char sprin dkar por dgod// lho ru bu mi ti
54b5: dgod do/ / nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a ba yang dag gnas// sngo nya mir ni yang dag gnas// g+hA nya srin po'i mtsham su dgod// rlung gi mtshamasu par shan// gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad// btsod
54b6: kyi mdog 'dra gur gum mdog/ na mkha'i mdog 'dra ngu ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun sum tshogs// de nA
54b7: ye shes phun sum tshogs/ / rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtag su 'jigs pa 'di dag gnas// de nas nang gi drur khrod sogs// lpags pa rdo rje rab ste// sa rdo gur du nges/ dpung
54b8: banye ba'i dpung pa ste/ / brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i // brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad du nges// rje ngar nye ba'i rje ngar bzhi// lag ngar nye ba'i lag ngar bzhi/ brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs// stang dang /

55a1: 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste// nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil// steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te// bskyed rims rnam rtog mi
55a2: mnga'i rtags/ / dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas// rtswa rlung ngo bo shes pa rgyas// de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// nang na klu brgyad yang dag gnas// bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir
55a3: char sprin brgyad ni nang du gnas/ / de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod kyang // sna rtser rtsa brgyang dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgya do// snying kar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad// mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de// spyi bor
55a4: rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad/ / gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga' rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bar gnas// thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir// gsang bar shing brgyad yang dag gnas// phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/ gdug
55a5: pa'ajoms phyir klu brgyad dgod/ / de bas bdag spyod gzhan sbyor bas// de yi phyir na char sprin dgod// de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyad ni de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de
55a6: nyid shing / lhag ma gsum dang tshor tshogs lnga// brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis// brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag ni// de dag bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad// gzung
55a7: 'dzin nam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ / bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas// rtagasu shing brgyad nges pa'o// rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtag su klu brgyad nges pa'o// gzugs sku
55a8: gnyis kyi sems can gyi/ / don mdzad rtagasu char sprin brgyad// phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags/

55b1: pa'o// gzhan ya nga yis gsungs pa'i bkal// gsung gcig nyid dragasungs gyur kyang / ma nyid dus song snang/ chos tshul du ma'i bri brag dang // ngas pa du ma'i bri brag dpa/ dugs dra ma'i gyi brag gis// theg pa'i mtha' 'thug
55b2: pa med/ / sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab// nga yi rjes 'brang ba yi// bla mas rapa non pa dang // de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes skyes// de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar// rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyad // mkha' 'gro
55b3: ma yi lung bstan pas/ / brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis nges// de lha'i man ngag ma thob par// sngags kyi lha spyod gang spyod pa// rang yang phung la gzhan yang phrang // mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas dngos grub
55b4: 'dod pa yis/ / bla ma dam pa mnyes byas te// man ngag dam pa blang bar bya// nges pa'i lha spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i lha dang spyod pa dang // mos pa'i rjesu gang byed dang // nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag/ gsang sngags lnga
55b5: bur spyad pa spyod/ / 'di dag glan po ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skye// dang po srid pa skye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// si hA'i dang po tha ma dang // 'bras bu sred pa skye ba yi// dus der
55b6: kun dur byed na/ / 'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad bzhi bsdus shing nad bzhi skyed// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung // de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba med dang gtar ka bya// phyi nas rigs kyi bdag
55b7: bos so/ / srid par skye ba'i dus chod kyang // rgyun chang zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgra yi rus rnams spyad// de ltar rgyud mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la gtad kyis legs par bzung // de nas 'khor thams cad
55b8: dga' zhing mgu ste/ rjes su yid rang bar gyur to// dpal drar khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / paN Di ta gA ya d+ha ra dang lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

56a1: rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra rA dza ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di gang bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
56a2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i
56a3: mchod pas mchod nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pas gsol pa// rdo rje gang lags chen po gang// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po/
56a4: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes par bya// rnam rtog 'joms byir rdo rjeste// de la rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis// rtse gsum rtse gcig
56a5: lnga pa/ / rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin no// bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste// rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyis su med pa rtse gcig pas// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin/ rtse gsum sku gsung bugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum//
56a6: 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes// nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags dang // phrag dog gti mug 'jos
56a7: par byed/ / rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khams gsum sa dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye
56a8: sa dgu la ni gang sgrib pa'i/ / sgrib pa spyong par byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur bstan pa yin// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin// ma rig pa las 'du byed de//

56b1: 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes// ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skye dang rga shi ste// de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste// chos kyi ye shes mngon du byas// de las ye shes drug rang ban/
56b2: delas sku gsung thugs de'o// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med rig pa ni// de las nyams myong bde chen po// rang rig de nyid sred pa ste// chos kun ston byed len pa ste// srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin//
56b3: skya basprul pa'i sku ru bshad// rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das// 'od gsal stong chen dang du thim// de phyir rdo rje bcu gnyis pa// rdzas kyi rdo rje bani yin te// 'bigs shing no bzur gsum ste// grub nas rdzas rnams brdang
56b4: byas pas/ / 'jam zhing ngang la 'joms par byed// pa la ma zlum pos nub par joms// zur lngas thams cad cing gar byed// de nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang // btul zhugs brtson 'grus spon
56b5: lal dang / / de bzhin ye shes chen po so// re re la yang bdun bdun sbyar// de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tugs dang gsang ba che// de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la// nA yi nang du
56b6: bstan pa yin/ / de rnams don ni ji bzhin rtogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rgyu ni gnyis su me pa yi// rang rig ye shes mthar thug pa// mthar thug blan med pa'i rgyud// rgyal thal
56b7: yang lnga yin te/ byin gas dang rab tugs pa// shin tu gsang ba chen po ste// de rnams don la dbang bsgyur dang // de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms byir// de bIr rgyal po lnga bstan/ rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom
56b8: ldan 'das ni rdo ltar lags/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// su gsung thugs ni de ltar lags// btsun me'i b+hag di ltar lags/ rdo rngo gang lags snying pogang/ dpa' bo gang lags mkha' 'grog/ dpag rje med pa

57a1: ji ltar lags/ thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// byin gsang ba bya med pa'i/ mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags/ mngon phyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags// zhal 'dzum mdzad pa ji ltar lags/
57a2: gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// phung pa'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa'o// ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir// dbang
57a3: phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang / / dpal dang grags dang bskal pa bzadang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la// drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i tshes ni mya ngan te// de ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
57a4: kun/ / 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya tshes kyi dbyings// de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste// dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad
57a5: rdo rje chos rnams 'jigs pa che/ / snying po ye shes chen po ste// sogs pa mang po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin// mkha' la 'gro bas
57a6: mkha' 'gro ste/ / rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi don la mi dpogs pas// yi phyir ni dpag tu med// thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid
57a7: don dang dbyer med phyir/ / gcig gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de dus su// phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni// phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sil
57a8: snyan dbyangs nyid dang / / sgeg dang dgod dang gar nyid dang // rta dang glang po rin chen sogs// de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsir// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po kham

57b1: dang skye mched rnams/ / de la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig li ste// de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod// de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni// dang po dga'
57b2: dang mchog dga' dang / / dga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dga'// bde ba'i byad par de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod// de nas bla med mchod pa ni// rang rigi stong par rtogs pa yis// 'od gsal de nyid cho
57b3: kyis/ / de nyid bla me mchod pa mchog bcom ldan 'das kyis deskad ces paka'agyul da/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yid rangs par gyur te// g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas so so
57b4: rdzu 'phrul kyis mi snang bar gyur to/ / pal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// / rnal 'byor ma can dram le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // // rgya ga rga dang /
57b5: shrI dz+nyA na A sha ya tan tra rA dzI/ bo skad du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang ma
57b6: 'gro ma'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpa' ba ye shes mkha' 'gre zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lci bos gtugs te/ thal mo sbyang nas gsos
57b7: pa/ bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang // ye shes skye gnas gang dang gang // rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gso'o// bcom ldan
57b8: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / dpa' bo ye shes mkha' 'gre nyon// ye shes zhes bya rnam pa la// de nyid don la shes pa dang // log rtogs shes pas ma bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o// ma long ye shes mnyam nyid /

58a1: so sor tog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyings ye shes lnga po'o// de la me long ye shes ni// dper na g.ya' dag me long la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin// de bzhin sems kyi me long la// nyon
58a2: mongs yis ni dag byas na/ / chos rnams gzugs brnyad sgyu mar mthong // sems kyi me long gang yin la// sgyu matsam du snang ba de// tha dad pa phyid mnyam ye shes// mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob sbrum cam
58a3: nga ni/ / las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes// de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de// de nyid don grub ye shes te// thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin// ye shes skye
58a4: gnas gang yin pa/ / kha sbyor dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med tshul// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gam
58a5: ma long ye shes mnyam nyid dang / / so sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa// bdag po byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug la sogs
58a6: pa'i/ / nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye ba gang lags dang // de yi gnas dang gcu
58a7: ba'i gnas/ / nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang // de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang // rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang ri/
58a8: ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te// gzung ba rig pa'i 'khor lor ste// nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni// go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus

58b1: la khrag zung dang / / ba spu langs dang 'dar ba dang // kha zas dang chung lus yang dang // skra dkar gnyer ma dengs pa dang // le lo mod dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grur// de nas yon tan bshad ba ni// rkang
58b2: mgyogs sa steng ma 'og gi/ 'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das 'thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rigi 'odags la de nyid do// ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te//
58b3: ni 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung bsgom pa brtag/ lus sems tshags su bcug nas ni// rang gi sems kyi de nyid la// de nyid dbyer med bsgom
58b4: par bya/ / de yis thob med 'bras bu theb/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yid rang nas de nas de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas
58b5: mchod de mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // paN Di ti gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sgyur ba'o// // @#// rgya gar skad du/
58b6: shrI rA ga rA dza tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
58b7: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas// he he dpal
58b8: bo 'jigs pa che/ / sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na// mtshan dang dpe byang gang dang gang// stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang // brdzus skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang // drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci// bcom

59a1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / a ning bu yi gtsug gtor te// A ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil// i ni dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste// u ni spyan mig mthon mthing la//
59a2: ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// A tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// ri rI tshems mnyam tshems thags bzang // li lI tshems dkar bro mchog/ e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// e.oM ljags shin tu srab pa ste// o ri tshangs
59a3: pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/ / oM na depung mgo shan du zlu ma// a ni bdun mtho ba ru gsungs// aHni thal gong rgyas pa ste// 'di dag bcu drug g.yas skor ro// de nas g.yor skor mtshams nas kyang // a ni
59a4: lpags srab mdog gser 'dra/ / A ri bzhengs bzhin ma gtud par// phyag gnyis pus mo sleb pa'o// i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra// A na shing n+ya gro lta bur// chu dang zheng ni gab pa'o// u ni mdzod spu g.yas
59a5: su 'khyil/ / U ni spu rnams gyen du phyogs// ri mdoms lba ba sbubs su nub// rI brla legs par zlum pa'o// li ni zhabs long tshigs mi mngon// lI ni phyag zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon// lI na phyag
59a6: mthil zhabs kyi mthil/ / 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// e ni phyog zhabs dra bas 'brel// aM ni sen mo rang ba ste// e ni phyag dang zhabs mthil la// 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ri shin
59a7: tu gnas/ / aM zhabs gting ba yangs pa ste// aHni byin pa ri dgas ni// e na ya yi lta bu ste// spyi bo'i mi shigs snying po haM// ston pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha ni
59a8: sen mo mdog snum pa/ / ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnams zlum pa// nga ni sor mo rnams rgyas pa// tsa ni sor rnams byin gyis tha// cha ni tsa rnams mi mngon pa// dza ni rtsa mdud med pa yin// d+ha

59b1: nilong bu mi mngon pa/ / nyani napas mi mnyam pa med// dza ni seng ge'i skabs su gshegs// Tha ni k+Shang ba'i skabs drug shegs// ni nga pa'i stabs spya ga shegs// ni khru mchog stabs su gshegs/
59b2: ni g.yon phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mangs pa gshegs byaste// than mig yo ba gshegs pa// da ni sbrul khrel ba ga// d+han thaM byas // na su rim pa gams pa'o//
59b3: gtsang ba su 'angs// bsu dam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid// masku khrolag yangs shing bzang // yaM ni gom pa snyoms pa'o// ram+bu shin tu gzhon mdog can// la ni sbrul 'khrul pa ma
59b4: wa nI sU lus rgyas pa ste/ / sha ni shin du grims pa'o// Sha ni yan lag thams cad mdzes// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag/ ta gu zlum pa nyid yin te// kAni su skabs phyed pa'o// ya na nu snyoms
59b5: pa yin te/ / nga ni rgyal byam ma pa yin// la ni lce ba zab pa ste// wan lte ba g.yas sul gyis// d+ha ni kun nas mangs pa ste// na ni kun stong gi tsang ma yin// 'di dag thobs kyi nga bzhin gyis// g.yas nas
59b6: skong ba bzhi cu yin/ / de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcuni// kani u0f88u0f90 sre gnag pag med// kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag/ ga phyug ri ma mongs yod pa// ma byug ri mo ba ba dang // dbyug mo nga ba'o//
59b7: zham nang po ga// tshan la gzugs kyi gzugs pa na snang // dza ljags mnyin sngags srab pa// ni sngags dam bas// glang po 'o jug b+h+yaH// ni gsung stan matan lam ga// rnam
59b8: ro/ / ma mas ma// ba ma kyi byed kyim sa// dag sa shin du ba dang / rgyags shin cags 'o// na su mngornam pa // ba bsgru pa /

60a1: dkar nag phyed pad ma'i// 'dab ma'i mdangs 'dra pad ma'i spyan// b+ha ni de bzhin smin mtshams ring // ma yi smin mtshams sprin spu mnyam// ra ni de bzhin smin ma snum// la ni phyag ring rgyas
60a2: pa'o/ / de bzhin wa ni snyan shal mnyam// snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams sha// dpral ba legs par 'byes pa Sha// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba// ha ni dpu dag shin tu rgyas// dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag k+Sha// dbu skra stug
60a3: pa ya yin te/ / de bzhin dab skra 'jam par// dbu skra mi 'jing ba ni la// dbu skra mi bshor ba ni wa// dbu skra dri zhim d+ha yin te// phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni// bkra shis g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan//
60a4: sdong ris lta bu d+ha yin te// lte ba sprul pa'i snying po aM// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad bcur ldan// a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// A ni stong pa nyid stong pa// i ni chen po stong pa nyid// I ni don dam stong pa nyid/ u ni
60a5: 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ / u ni 'dus ma byas stong pa// ri ni mtha' las 'das stong pa// rI ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// li ni dor ba med pa stong // lI ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid// e ni chos rnams thams cad
60a6: steng / / oM ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong // oM ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid// oM na dngos po mong stong nyid// oM ni ngo bo stong pa nyid// dngos med ngo ba stong nyid aH// mgrin pa longs spyod snying po oM// shes rab
60a7: stong pa bcu drug rtsa/ / gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa dang po a// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin
60a8: no/ / sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa// gzugs kyi 'du shes la 'das pa// sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed// nam mkha' mtha' yas lag

60b1: dpa'a' batha' yas las 'das te/ ba shes mtha' las lagadas shi rnapa shes mtha' yas rdzogs pa te// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das nas// ci yang med pa la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa ba yin no// ci yang med pa
60b2: las 'das te/ / 'du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes med min rdzogs pa ya// 'du shes med min las 'das te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// rnam par
60b3: thar pa brgyad pa sha/ / snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo hUM// gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan// 'dir dasha tsa yi rnam par gnas// 'khor lo'i rgya ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas// de phyir sems ca
60b4: sangs rgyas yin/ / sna tshogs bsdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // ring du 'byung zhing thung ngu gnas// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste/ snyeng 'og kha
60b5: ya bar nas 'byung / / ro mo shar du mngon du phyogs// rkyang ma nub ste 'og gi char// roms rkyang ma la 'khyud cing // g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid// rkyar mas ro ma la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug
60b6: nyid/ / g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku gsung thugs// de sgra sngags su rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs// de nyid las ni byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim pa
60b7: yang / / snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas// 'di dag nang gi nangs skyes tshul// A li kA li nyi zla ste/ sems ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas// nang gi sgong
60b8: skyes yin par 'dod/ / kA dang A las nyi zla ste// rang 'byung thig le drod gsher yin// de dag skad cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba rdzus skyes so// rkyen med sbyor ba sgo sogs las// bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu/

61a1: u0f7f// thams cad dran pa gas ba yi// mang la nas skyes pa'i rdul yir te// yang la sreg dang mang lagaso// gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'gro yid// byen 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis// rba rgyas bdeb
61a2: ster ba dang / / rin po che yi pho brang du// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// nang gi 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis// bde ba skye ba drod gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdong nas bde ba'i sgrar skyes
61a3: la/ / bde ba skyes pa rdzus skye so// gtum mgo bzlog rkyen gyis sbar// gtum mo rkyen kyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rang bzhin spang ba ni// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod
61a4: gsher skyes/ / rdzus skyes rim par sbyar bar bya// du ma'i gzhi bcas gzhi bcas dang // gzhi med shin du gzhi med de// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// rdzus skyes pa'i char rim par sbyar// rgyu
61a5: dang lam ste 'bras bu kun/ / skye ba bzhi yi de bor gcig/ de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// log rtogs sgyu mas gnyis su 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying rje che//
61a6: rang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor bsgom// gsung ni mgrin pa thugs ni snying // yon tan lte ba phrin las ni// sna rtse dag tu bsam pa
61a7: bya/ / 'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang // rdo rje phag mo rab du grags// haM ni bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin par 'dod// bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag/ gsum pa hUM las rab tu grag/ bcu gsum pa
61a8: dang ran+da lnga pa/ / bcu dgu oM las rab tu grags// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu// haM gi ngo bor yang dag gnas// sum bcu bdun dang drug bcu bzhi// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste/

61b1: g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin te// skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhi'i dngas ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa
61b2: phyir na rgyan du bshad/ / gsung mchog bla ma'i zhal nas blang // g.yas g.yon steng 'og slo ba ni ste// mdom gang mnyam pa grubazhi yin// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshen rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te//
61b3: brgyad ni rkang brgyad do// se sen pa sU tAr sogs// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te// rang
61b4: rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni/ / gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bsgom pa min// rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min// spos la sogs pas mchod pa min// rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya// rang bzhin gnas pa'i
61b5: sangs rgyas la/ / rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod// sku ni dgun dus rang bzhin te// 'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsung ni dpyid dus de bo ste// 'jug pa'i sku gsung zla ba gsum// thugs ni
61b6: dbyar dus ngo bo ste/ / gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum// ye shes ston gyi dus yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang po rgyu yi sa pa yin// 'khor lo chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams ni
61b7: dkar pos gnas/ / lam gyi sa pa rnam pa gnyis// ring ba dang ni nye ba'o// de nas 'bras bu'os pa yin// 'khor lo yang dag gnas pa ste// 'khor la de rnams ldarnams kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan
61b8: kun dang bral/ / rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba drim med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can// zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can// phyi ru su mdog phyag mtshan lha// nang gi shin du

62a1: phra ba'i gzugs/ / gsang ba'i bde ba lha ru des// de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha// lus las byung phyir lha zhe'am// rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha// chags pa'i phyir na lha yin te// rgyal po shes
62a2: rab rang bzhin te/ thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs so// de nas sa chen po yang cher g.yos par gyur te// mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po yang babs par gyur to// de nas
62a3: dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yid rang nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rnal 'byor ma tsan dra mA le dang //
62a4: lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI DA ki nI saM ba ra tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal bde ba chen
62a5: po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang // he he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro ma ni ji ltar lags// de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig bsrung ba ji ltar laH//
62a6: rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum
62a7: kun 'khrugs chen po ste/ / rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring // nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang gzhan 'khrugs pa tha ma yang // nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste//
62a8: nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la mnar sems ma skyes kyang // gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi// bdag gi g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang //

62b1: gzhan la nyes pa chung bas na/ 'di yang nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang // 'di ni ltung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// lha spyod gang la gzhan ma mos//
62b2: zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis mnyes gzhan cher 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chu ngur rabashad// re re'i dbya ba gzhan nas shes// de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang //
62b3: phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol la// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur// g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// mdor na rang
62b4: bzhin dam tshig dang / / bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang // de nas mkha' 'gro mtshan nyid kyang // mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag
62b5: mo yungs dkar tsam gyi tshad/ / gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// ka nas g.yas skor ka yi bar// mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi ru nges// ka sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste// phyi
62b6: nas rtsa ra mkha' 'gro re/ / mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi bar// sum bcu rtsa bdun mkha' 'gro ma// lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgyad ni mkha' 'gro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa
62b7: mkha' 'gro bzhi/ / snying kha ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gror// gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas// gzhan ni sgyu
62b8: bor yang dag gnas/ / de nas sdom pa bshad bya ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bded sdom par yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par bsgoms pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje pag

63a1: mo me lang 'bas/ / sdom padam tshig tu ni bshad// mi phyed pas ni phyag brgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags// rgyan ni gang lags dus gang
63a2: lags/ / tshad ni gang lags bsrung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon mongs ldan dang ma gus dang // brjed ngas dran pa mi
63a3: gsal ba/ / 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chad chang gis myos//
63a4: log lta skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon sogs gzha/
63a5: gyis byin rlabs che// bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song na// bag med nyams pa son gnas// gdon sogs rang gis ma mthong na// de
63a6: yang nyams pa chung bar gsungs/ / 'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar chad bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos gzhi mjug dang gsum// gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar
63a7: byin te/ / che 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba lhung ba chung ngu ste// dngos pa ni ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // mjug rdzogs ltung ba chen por nges// rgyan dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag/ 'chang ba sten pa'i dam
63a8: tshig yin/ / sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ sems can dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'o// longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba 'dam tshig ga/ rang bzhin sgyu mar gang shes

63b1: pa/ / shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go/ sgo gsum sku gsung thugs su bsam// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig ga/ nyon mongs drug drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bsgral// bsgral ba'i dam
63b2: tshig chen po yin/ / dam tshig don du dam tshig dag/ rus drug dus gnyis lo bar du// brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig srung // dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung // skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang gi
63b3: lus kyi nyes pa las/ / gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba// 'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyis nyes pa las// gzhan gyi dag gi nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste// gzhan la gsung
63b4: gi nyams par 'gyur/ / gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la rtsa ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang // legs pa las ni nyes 'byung sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste//
63b5: 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par
63b6: dka'/ / mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos slar la dor ba med// ngan skyugs phyir dor slar la za ba med// rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i ro tshor
63b7: na/ / log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol// de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yid rang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma'i
63b8: sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ bI DA ki nI gu h+ya dz+wa la tan tra rA dzA/ bod

64a1: skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye a la la ho// kye a la la ho// mkha' 'gro gang lags ma gang lags//
64a2: gsang dang rgyud dang rgyal po gang // nyon cig byang chub sems dpa' khyod// mkha' 'gro bzhi ste ma ni gsum// gsang ba drug ste rgyud brgyad do// rgyal po bcu dgu dag tu bstan// dang po mkha' 'gro dbye ba yang /
64a3: rags pa'i rtog pa spang ba'i phyir// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel pa yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan dang pa'o// sku mdog phyag mtshan spang ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rlung dang rtsa sogs
64a4: tsaN Da li/ / 'di dag mkha' 'gro gnyis pa ste// dman pa rnams la sku dang phyag/ rlung dang rtsa sogs kha dog dbyi bas// de nyid spang bar bya ba'i phyir// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes
64a5: ba dga' ba'i ro/ / 'di dag gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa las// dman pa rnams la phra ba'i gzugs// lus sems tshor ba bde ba las// 'das pa'i bde ba chen po dag/ spang phyir rang
64a6: rig ye shes ste/ / sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i ro// de nyid mkha' 'gro bzhi pa ste// shes brjod kun gyi yul ma yin// de nyid lnga la sogs pa yi// mkha' 'gro 'di rnams rim pa yang // sku mdog phyag mtshan rigs
64a7: pa'i gnyen/ / rlung dang rtsa sogs bum dbang spong // bde bas rlung dang rtsa sogs spong// rang rig stong pas bde ba spong // gzugs sku gnyis kyis stong pa spong // de phyir grong ma gnyen par bshad// rags pa bang
64a8: sogs bum dbang rgyu/ / bum dbang gsang dbang rgyu yin te/ gsang ba gsum pa'i rgyu ru nges// bde ba rang rig skyed pa yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa ste// 'bras bu bzhi dang mi mthun bzhi// mkha' 'gro rnams

64b1: kyis rim pa'o/ / ma ni rnam pa gsum yin te// 'dod chags chen pos bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang chen pos bcom ldan 'das// gti mug chen pos bcom ldan 'das// nga rgyal la sogs de dang 'dra// thun mong
64b2: ma yin sras 'byung bas/ / ma zhes gsungs pa yin par 'dod// snod min gsang ba sgrogs thos pa// skrag pa thun mong ma yin bskyed// bskyed pa'i phyir ni ma zhes bya// skye ba gcig gis sangs rgyas pas/ sras
64b3: rnams thun mong ma yin skyed/ / de yi phyir ni ma zhes bya// thun mong bla ma'i zhal nas shes// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste// bdud rtsi drug dag gsang ba ste// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya de bzhin chos
64b4: yin te/ / rgyud ni dbang bzhi ngo bo ste// brjod bya rjod byed brgyad du bshad// gsang ba lnga ni rgyal po lnga// lta ba spyod pa zung 'jug lam// rgyu dang 'bras bu sa la sogs// bcu dgu rgyal po yin par gsungs//
64b5: kye bo dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// gnod sbyin gzugs dang srin po gzugs// gzhan yang bdud la sogs pa'i gzugs// sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi// lha 'am klu la sogs pa'i gzugs// sdug pa ston na
64b6: ji ltar bgyi/ / gnod sbyin sgra dang srin po sgra// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra grag na// de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// tshangs pa'i sgra dang ngang ba'i sgra// sgra snyan byung na ji ltar bgyi// bya rgod dri dang bla rtsi dri// ngan skyugs lasag
64b7: dri byung na/ / de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// gur gum tsan dan ga pur sogs// dri zhim byung na ji ltar bgyi// bdud rtsi la sogs drug bcu sogs// bzang po ston na ji ltar bgyi// ngan skyugs la sogs dman pa'i
64b8: ro/ / sna tshogs ston na ji ltar bgyi// reg bya lcags kyi spu gri sogs// rtsub pa byung na ji ltar bgyi// dar men la sogs lus kyis reg/ 'jam pa byung na ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten chos rnams sna tshogs dang //

65a1: 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos rnams ston// de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs ngan khong khro mi bskyed cing // gzugs bzang 'dod par mi bya ste// de la lus kyi
65a2: rgyab tu bstar/ / lan byed dpa' bo mkha' 'gro yi// dngos grub sprul pa yin par nges// brtul zhugs can gyis dngos grub blang // lan med bdud kyi bar chad de// bdud bsal ba yi cho ga brtsam// kun la
65a3: mkhas pas sbyor bar bya/ / sgra snyan 'dod pa mi bskyed cing // 'jigs pa'i sgra la khong mi khro// de la gtang snyoms sems bya ste// rdo rje klu yis brtag par bya// de bzhin dri bzang mi chags shing // dri ngan khong khro mi bya bar//
65a4: mnyam par dmigs la brtag par bya// dri yi phyag rgya de la bstan// lan byed mkha' 'gro'i sprul pa ste// lan med bdud kyi sprul pa'o// ro bzang bza' bar mi bya zhing // ro ngan dor bar mi bya'o// mnyam par bzhag
65a5: la brtag par bya/ / de la ro yi phyag rgya bstan// de bzhin bye brag shes par bya// de bzhin chos la chos phyag rgya// brtags te bdud rnams bsal bar bya// lus la byung ba'i bdud rnams kyang // kha dog dbyibs la
65a6: shes par bya/ / dang po dngos grub blang ba yang // mig gis gzugs la rna bas sgra// sna yis dri dang lce yis ro// lus kyi reg dang yid kyis chos// brtul zhugs can gyi dngos grub blang // de nas bdud ni bsal
65a7: bya ste/ / yang na stong pa'i rdzong la gnas// yang na phrin las bzhi yis bsal// chu yi bde ba 'jam sogs pas// nang gi bdud ni bsal ba'o// pad mkhris steng sgo 'dus pa'i bar// rlung can mgo yi sgo ru ste// rgyud
65a8: 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / / de ltar byas na dngos grub thob// dpal mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

65b1: rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra ba bi dA rat+na tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
65b2: gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang // ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas
65b3: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gang lags 'jigs byed gang // 'joms pa gang lags chung gang lags// rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
65b4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ / rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'jigs par byed// nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms// rgyu yi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud ni gang yin
65b5: la/ rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum
65b6: yin te/ / don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni gsum// de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi byed phyir// don gyi rdo rje bshad pa'o// dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste// rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa
65b7: yin/ / rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// rtse dgu khams gsums dgu'i rtags// don gyi rdo rje bzhi yin/
65b8: te// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// 'jig dang 'joms pas rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa dang rlung dang thig/

66a1: 5// kAr+dz+dza d+ha/ gas gang dgas/ ga nga bangasas papa rdo ga/ shes dpas she ga nga gis da tugs pa// shA N+ya napa gnan/
66a2: 'jig par 'jams pas rdo rdza yin// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'bral ba ste// rang rigasasas slong cing // gtu 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa// 'jig pa 'joms pas rdo rdi / na pa dgas
66a3: ni/ / sde gsum su gsung thugs su bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// nga rgyal la sogs rnam pa lnga// 'jig cing 'joms pas
66a4: rdo rje'o/ / de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa ste// zur gsum rdo la 'bigs pa dang // gru bzhi dag ni gsal bar byed// zlum pas rdzas rnams 'dzums par byed// zur lngas 'dod bsgrub rdzas dza/
66a5: de// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud// mthar brag chud ni rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pas// log lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
66a6: bka' stsal pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgunas rjes su yid rangs te// g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskong nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar
66a7: gyur to/ / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // pa/ r+b+he tA thA sa d+hA ra rA / la na ba dag slong ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
66a8: rgya gar skad du/ shI ag ne mA le tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ha ha~M hi hi he he kye// bdag la khyed la zhub

66b1: mchis/ / shI ni gang lags te gang lags// ru ni gang lags ka gang lags// dbang bzhi he ru ka gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs
66b2: rnam par spangs/ / ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas so// de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi grangs kyis nges pa ste// dang po
66b3: bum dbang he ru ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung ba ste// de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir ni he zhes brjod// las dang nyon mongs tshegs
66b4: dang bral/ / de yi byir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi/ gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i// phyir na kaM zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags
66b5: gnyis su med/ / de yi phyir na shI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/ phag mo la gnas tshogs dang ldan// zag med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla phyag
66b6: mtshan yig 'bru'i tshogs/ / bskyed rims rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs las su rung bas na// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i/
66b7: byi na ru// bskyed pa'i rdo rje phag mo dang // dmigs dang lta spyod gang la yang // mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med pa'i// phyir na shI zhes gsungs pa ste// rgyu rnams lam la
66b8: sogs dang ldan/ / rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs ldan// nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas gsum

67a1: ba'i he ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi// rgyu spangs phyir ni he zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang bral phyir ru zhes brjod// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // tsan
67a2: li yi kha dog dang / / dbyibs la mi gnas phyir na ka/ sems nyid bde bar gnas pas so// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med// de yi phyir na shI ru gsungs// mig ser nad kyis btab pa ltar// rang sems bde bar
67a3: gnas pas so/ / sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la rten tshogs dang ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde ba gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus
67a4: gnas pa/ / gsum pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka/ rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong
67a5: pararo ro gcig pas/ / tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la'ang mi gnas phyir// ka shes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas// stobs sogs phun sum tshogs pas
67a6: na/ / rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// shrI zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// dngos por ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas
67a7: pa/ / bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la tho 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod ro la// mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// snang zhing gsal la rang bzhin med// me long bzhin 'dra chu
67a8: zla bzhin/ / mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang // de ltar don ni ma rtogs par// kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la// he ru ka yi rnam par rtog/ kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod//

67b1: de bzhin rtsa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang rig he ru ka/ za ma ma bsten brtson 'grus med// shes rab mi ldan bzod sogs med// rigs dang rig pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa rnyed dang
67b2: dga'/ / rgyu des log rtog sna tshogs bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa'i// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dad ldan gus bcas pha rol phyin// rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las// man ngag/
67b3: yang dag blang par bya// mamo'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa// he ru ka dpal de ltar na// rdo rje phag mo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsum ste phag ni gnyis// don
67b4: gyi rdo rje de nas rtags/ / tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste// don gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje ste// dbang bzhis rdo rje re re'o// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te//
67b5: rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsums dgu 'joms pa yi// rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu'o// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te/
67b6: zlum po la sogs rnam pa bzhi// mi shes dri mas ches gos pa'i// dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rab char byung phag mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges// bus dbang zhe sdang gci
67b7: bug pag/ gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug pag/ gsum pa chags dga' gti mug pag/ bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag/ 'di nyid khyod la legs par gtang // thams cad rjes su yid rang ngo //
67b8: dpal me'i phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shrI he ru ka'i nges par 'byung ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//

68a1: rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid d+ha dz+wa la saM ba ra ta na tra rA dzA/ bod skad du// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
68a2: pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas rin po che'i khang bzang gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i
68a3: 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su rigs sgyu ma'i dbang du mdzad de/ thams cad kyi lha'i phyi nang gsang ba blan med pa'i mchod
68a4: bas mchod pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid don dam gang yin pa//
68a5: dpal dang rdo rje don dang ni// dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don// nges bstan don ni gang yin pa// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun// phyi rol
68a6: don la g.yeng ba'i sems/ / nang du sdus la rtse gcig nyon// dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la// gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtog
68a7: pas mi phyed phyir/ / rdo rje zhes ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan pa// grangs med
68a8: rgya cher bstan pa ni/ / nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don// nam mkha' dang mtshungs rang rig ni// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'i ro// skad cig de'i rgyun nyid la// rgyud ces bya bar bstan pa yin// dpal rdo rje grub pa

68b1: dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las mtshan gyi sdom pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang nga yis bshad// ye shes skye ba'i rgyu dang gnas// rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul// bye brag ming gi
68b2: nam grangs dang / / don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang // phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang // don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings// de nyid 'dir ni bshad par bya// rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te// rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin can//
68b3: rang rig sgyu mar byung ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la// gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa// grogs
68b4: ni ye shes rlung yin te/ / ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas de nyid 'byung ba yin// grangs ni snga ma ltar shes bya// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te// thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes// de yi phan yon gang yin pa//
68b5: bzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// phyin ci log tu brtags pa yi// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin// 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las ye shes kyi rgyu dang
68b6: gnas la sogs pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// sum bcu rtsa gnyis grangs yin no// de nas longs spyod 'khod
68b7: lo ni/ / 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma ni// drug bcu rtsa bzhi dag yin no// bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste// longs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug/
68b8: chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba ru// haM ni dkar po thur bltas sam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// oM ni dmar po gyen bltas

69a1: bsam/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// hU~M ni sngon pa mthur bltas sa pa// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i ste dbus su// maM ni dpar po gyen bltas sa pa// dang pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dabam la// dbyangs tu
69a2: yi ge bcu drug ni/ / lugs 'byung lugs min dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs yig bcu drug rims bzhin dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// laM ma paM taM// yi ge 'di rnams
69a3: g.yon nas dgod/ / oM traM tri a// mtshams nas g.yas su dgod par bya// sprul pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rtsibs la// gsal byed yig ge sum bcu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul dgod// sku gsung
69a4: thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni/ / dbus nas drang por gnas pa ste// d+hU ni dkar por thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtse la thug par dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te// kA li sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la la nag tu
69a5: bskor byas nas/ / lugs 'byung 'og tu kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la// ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni// gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// rgal tshigs la gnas srog la rten//
69a6: gsum 'dras pa'i gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdud pa ni// dgu por gnas pa bya gdong tshul// chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo
69a7: gnyis/ / gru gsum gnas su yi ge raM// de ni yongs su gyur pa las// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum pa// tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te// lte bar ra ni dmar po bsam// 'dab ma gsum la oM AH
69a8: hUM/ / gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba// rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya// rlung gi gnas su yi ge yaM// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// mdog nag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la// tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no//

69b1: dbus su 'dab ma lnga yin te// lte bar yang ni nag po bsam// 'dabam lnga la d+ha lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gi dam tshig me sbar bas// dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul// 'khor lo gsum bsreg
69b2: rnying pa tsam/ / yi ge ha ni bsros pa yis// haM ba'u bdud rtsi'i char yang bab// lte ba'i gnas su thig ler gyur// rgyun tu 'bar bar gyur pa yis// rin chen dbyibs 'dra'i nang slebs nas// rang bzhin dga'
69b3: banyabs pyod pas/ / rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ruka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos su rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje grub padra ba'i
69b4: sdom pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni nga yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed
69b5: rnams kyis/ / rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor
