69b6: ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa thams cad dga' zhing mgunas rjes su yid rang nas/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam ma khA la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / rgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod
69b7: pa'i rnam pa dang / pa ta Ta la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / mang me dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / btung ba'i mchod pas mchod de// gzhan yang nang dang /
69b8: gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur te// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba

70a1: sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog s+ho/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis sgyur cing zhus pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad
70a2: dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor
70a3: dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs pa'i dus su/ dpa' bo rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su skor ba lan gsum byas nas phyogs gcig
70a4: tu 'khod do/ / dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtugs te/ ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtsa ni gang lags rlung gang lags// thig le gang lags grangs ni du// de la
70a5: sems bzung ji ltar lags/ / 'khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags/ yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni// yi ge
70a6: dgod pa gang dang gang / / gtum po sbar ba ji ltar lags// zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags// gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi// rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang pa'i
70a7: 'khor lo bzhi gang lags/ / de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung // stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // dgos pa'i
70a8: dgongs pa ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod// khyod la bshad kyis legs par zung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' gnyis med thams cad snyed//

70b1: der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni// g.yo ba rnam shes g.yo ba yin// thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong nyid bsam du med pa'o// thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste// rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no// de nas sems gzung bstan
70b2: pa ni/ / rtsa rlung dang ni thig le la// gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te// bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod tshes// de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug
70b3: grangs su shes par bya/ / me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang bskur gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin te// bde skyong 'khor lo dang po ste// rta mgrin longs spyod 'khod/
70b4: lo yin// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs su bstan// rtsa rnams rang bzhin nga yis bshad// / rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung
70b5: dang thig le'i rang bzhin no/ / de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo sum bcu gnyis// gsal byed sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas nas bskor te dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs
70b6: yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod/ / chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon nas dgod// thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// bcu drug rtsa bzhi gang
70b7: yin la/ / gsal byed g.yas bskor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskor// bde chen 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// haM ni dkar po'i thur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su//
70b8: oM ni dkar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// hUM ni sngon po thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// a ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis

71a1: yin te/ / dang po'i gnas su yi ge yaM// gtum po 'bar ba'i ya~M yin te// nag po yongs su gyur pa las// rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs// dbus su d+ha lnga dgod byas nas// bdan lnga ni mdzes pa'o//
71a2: gsum gnas su yi ge raM// ma pi 'khor lo grwa gsum dmar// dbus su oM AHhUM ni dgod// zur la rdo rje gsum gyi mtshan// rkyen gyi 'khor lo de ltar yin// rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig mes// ye shes me ni bskul ba mkhwa/
71a3: 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// bde chen ma rtogs gnyis tsam bsregs// bde chen te ni bsrog byas nas// zhu ba 'chi med/ bdud rtsi ni// zla ba zhu ba'i bdud rtsi yis// srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab// rgyun tu
71a4: 'dub par gyur pa yis/ / 'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te// gzung ba madrang ba'i nang du gzung // go bzlog lugs su bzlog pa ste// mthar thug gnas su gzung ba'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa ni// gsang ba bde skyong 'bor
71a5: le s+ho/ / hUM ni lte bar dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs// gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya// dbyangs yig rim gnyis dag dgod nas// tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong ste// de pyid bde
71a6: skye shes phyir bshad/ / rta dgrin 'khor lo'i 'dab bzung la// dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod// lte bar u ni dgod par bya// bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i phyir// rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad// rig pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma wa//
71a7: lte bar nyini dgo byas nas/ 'dab ma lnga la o hU rdzas// g.yas nas rims kyis dgod par bya// bzhi pa'i don ni rig pa'i phyir// rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim pa drug/ lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dab ma ba cad
71a8: bcu drug sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ / drug bcu rtsa bzhi bshad pa yin// lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// e bi ma ya de rnams ni// 'dab ma bzhi la g.yon nas dgod// 'dab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba// sde brgyad kyi nidang po brgyad// g.yon

71b1: gyi rim pas dgod par bya/ / 'dab ma bcu drug gang yin la// mamo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// 'dab ma sum bcu gnyis sogs la// dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgo// 'a ba ma drug
71b2: rtsa bzhi la/ / g.yas nas kA li lugs bzhin dgod// A li rim gnyis g.yon nas dgod// gsang ba'i dbang skur pa yi phyir// gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// de nas ro ma'i 'khor lo ni// la ba ma gnyis la lte bar ba/
71b3: ma ning bzhi yi mad pa gnyis la// lte bar de nyid thung la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// b+ha ni gyen la dgod par bya// yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su ni/ byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro// nyam su myong bar bya ba'i phyir// nyams myong ro ma
71b4: 'khor lor bshad/ / de nas dbang skur 'khor lo ni// steng gi tshangs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad// lte bar aM ni dgod pa ste// daM laM khaM ruM// g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod// hUM traM hri a// g.yas nas mtsham su rim par dgod/
71b5: byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang skur ste// de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus bsgom pa bshad par bya// gong du bstan pa gang yin
71b6: pa/ / sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// rang rig sems las gzhan min te// rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du// ci yang mi rtog shes 'gyur na// ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa nyid// de ltar sems la legs
71b7: par thu / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dpa' ba rdo rje la sogs pa'i dang 'bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo lasags pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rjes su la nga bar gyur te/ byinang gsang ba'i mchod pas/
71b8: mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po gA ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//

72a1: rgya gar skad du/ shI tsakra sa~M ba ra tan tra rA dza ad b+hU ta shwA sA ni a la~M ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'khor sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la
72a2: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos bI dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje
72a3: snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dpal zhes
72a4: bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ / 'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi// sdom pa nyid kyang ji lta bu// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal ni gnyis
72a5: med ye shes te/ / 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid do// dang po phyi yi 'khor lo ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan lha yi sku// drug bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste// ye shes dam tshig
72a6: sku gsung thugs/ / dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// tha mal gcod pas phyi ru bshad// gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo ni// gnas sog
72a7: sa bcu'i rim pa rnams/ / mtho ris sa steng sa 'og dang // 'khor lo sgol dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o// gsum pa gsum pa'i 'khor lo ni// sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang /
72a8: de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' dang // rnam pa'i dga' ba'i gnyen po ni// bde ba stod pa mi

72b1: rtog gsum/ / dbyer med rtogs pas lhar skyes la// de kho na yi 'khor lor brjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang ba nyid// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs pa// gnyen pos
72b2: ye shes dang du sdom/ / bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang // tha mal ba yi rngam rtog kyang // dag pa'i lha yi 'khor lor sdom// gzod nas lus la grub pa yi// rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems dang // a ba
72b3: dU tI'i nang du sdom/ / bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos med ye shes kyang // dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang //
72b4: 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'og ma'i yon tan ldan
72b5: pa dang / / nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang // gnyen po ye shes che ba dang // gnas la khyab pas rgyal po yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags// de yi dgongs pa ji
72b6: ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam// yang na phyi rol grA
72b7: rnams su/ / lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang // 'barabs 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang / 'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs kyi// phyogs su g.yon nas
72b8: bskor te gnas/ / ha har dgod pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags tshal byin zer ro// 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du// rlung mtshams ki li ki lir sgrogs// sha ra du ha ri ba skye la// gtum drag dkar po glang

73a1: po'i gdod/ / byang du byang chub shing bul// g+har ser po me yi gdong // nub tu mya ngan med shing la// 'bar 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong // g+ho ru tsu ta'i shing bu la// 'jigs sde na ga po ma
73a2: he'i gdong/ / me ru ka ran tsan te// dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar// bden bral a rdzu'i shing bu la// 'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong// rlung du srid grub shing bu la// ki li sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdod//
73a3: dbang ldan n+ya gro d+ha shing la// ha har dgod pa ba lang gdong // g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon// shing lo'i steng na stong phyung ngo // shar du brgya byin dkar po la// rdo rje sdigs 'dzub glang po zhon// byang du
73a4: lus ngan ser po la/ / dbyug pa 'dzin cing gter la zho na// nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni// chu srin zhon nas zhags pa thogs// lho ru gshin rje nag po la// ma he zhon nas be con thogs// shar lho me lha dmar
73a5: ser la/ / ra la zhon nas mi thab 'dzin// lho nub srin po smag nag la// ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon// nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po// ri dgas zhon nas 'phan ni 'phyar// byang shar dbang ldan dkar/
73a6: po ni// khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs// thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud// nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma dag/ shar nas brtsams te g.yon du dgod// pad ma che
73a7: dang mtha' yas dang / / rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ni// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o// sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang // mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil// shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod// 'khrigs
73a8: pa gang ba 'bab pa dang / / drag po sprin tshegs mtshams la dgod// rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang // las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// sna tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs

73b1: kyis ni/ / ro la spyod cing mkha' la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang // chu dang me sogs rim pa ste// gza' dang bar du grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang rol dra
73b2: dang / / stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang // wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // phyed tshig pa dang rnam par dbyangs// mgo bo lus po rus rkang rnams// a la pe nag sgra sgrogs pa// de nas nang gi dur khrid ni// lus kyi sgra sen
73b3: spu la sogs/ / skye zhing 'jig par byed pas na// dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs
73b4: rgyu zhes pa dur khrod do/ / rnam par shes pa'i chags brgyad dang // dngos po'i rtogs pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dur du 'chi// gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas dur khrod dgos pa
73b5: ni/ / rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la// phyogs skyod mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // thugs rje'i rtags su shing brgyad la// zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa bsrung //
73b6: gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chu ni brjod bya zab pa la// me sogs rtogs pa bral ba'o// rdo rje snying
73b7: bos yang gsol ba/ / bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji lta bu// bzhugs pa'i dor ni
73b8: ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom pa la// ldan pa yon tan

74a1: drag nyid de/ / dbang phyug dang na gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pan// drug pa de la ldan zhes gsungs// 'khor ba
74a2: ches ni mya ngan te/ / de dang bral phyer 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus
74a3: gsam sangs rgyas kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas// btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyangs// de la yod phyir b+hag ste// mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje'i snying pos yang gsol pa/
74a4: dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel
74a5: ba yi/ / lha yis rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// tha mal pa ye rnam rtog spong // des na phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thig le bsgoms pa yis// mtshan ma'i
74a6: nam rtog 'joms pa ni/ / nang gi dpa' bar bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms// de ni gsang
74a7: ba'i dpa' ro yin/ / bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir// de kho na yi dpa' bor bshad// dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bzhi//
74a8: ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong nas spos bral lhan grub la// lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyi yi dpa' mor bshad// nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin med par byed pas ma//

74b1: gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan ci skyes bas// rang rig sems kyis ngo bo ni// nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgom pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi// phyi nang gsang
74b2: bde kho na/ / dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo
74b3: rin chen glang po rta/ / btsun mo dmag dpon blon po rnams// phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo // rang gi lus las 'byung ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang // sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang skye mched
74b4: kyi/ / 'khor lo rnams la mchod pa dang // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang sdang thabs kyi rig ma yis// skra bzung b+ha ga ku tsa btsir// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le sogs// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral
74b5: dang / / lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba mchod// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos sku la// zhen pa rnams dang bral ba ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa'o// rdo rje'i snying pos yang gsol pa// gtor ma zhes
74b6: pa gang la bgyi/ / de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni// / thun mtshams lha
74b7: yi mdun nyid du/ / raM las me dang yaM las rlung // skyed gsum a las du ma gcig pa'i// nang du bdud rtsi sha lnga la// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed
74b8: pa'o/ / gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lus ni lha yi 'khor lo la// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gas pa'i gtor bani// khod ma chen

75a1: ya~M ka pA lar/ / rlung dang thig le bdud rtsil// dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// byi na dngos pa'i gtor makun// chos
75a2: dbyings kyi bad sdod du/ / don dam sems kyi gsum sngags kyis// bde ba chen po'i dpal mchod// phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang // phyi rang bar chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // khams dang
75a3: skye mched rtas pa dang / / rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang // 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// sems kyi rang
75a4: bzhin ji lta bu/ / de las 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar bzhag/ de las yon tan ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems
75a5: las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing // ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum
75a6: brtan dang g.yor bcas pa/ / snang ba myong zhing grub pa med// de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ glo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ma yin//
75a7: kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang bzhin reg pa 'od gsal sogs// smrar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pa ro myong 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i rang bzhin la// log rtogs rtsi sogs rnam par 'bru//
75a8: khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang // de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng dang rnam rtog ste// rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching // rang gis gsod cing rang

75b1: gis za/ / rang gis lhung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang rig ye nas spros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad 'jug na 'khrul// rang rig rang gis 'od gsal la// ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos po stong par
75b2: ro mnyam la/ / blang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon dang gis 'gag pa la// de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul// rang rig ye nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul// dman dang gya nom med pa la/
75b3: spro dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// de dag gnyis su 'dzin na 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis
75b4: med la/ / bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// stong nyid rol mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan mar gnas na 'khrul// sems kyi
75b5: glang chen mi 'dul bar/ / g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul// rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la// rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar// che ba'i nga rgyal smran 'khrul//
75b6: rang rig nyams sum myong bar// dkar po'i chos rnams spong na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khrul// sems nyid ma 'khrul bag chags 'khrul//
75b7: sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de// rang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig sdang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na rang sems 'khrul pa dag/ don du snang ba rab tu skye// skye ba med//
75b8: bzhin skye bas 'khrul// lcags bsregs sa gzhi rang gi sems// me sogs byed pa gzhan na med// bkres skom sdug bsngal rang gi sems// zas skom skyes pa gzhan na med// brdeg gtsog lcags

76a1: ba'us rang gi sems/ / srog gcod shan pa gzhanan med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun// rang gi sems su pa shes na// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// bla ma dam pa rtag tu
76a2: bsten/ / theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud ba lta// bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms na// ma bsgoms na yang bsgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med// de la mya
76a3: ngan 'das pa 'byung / / sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung / de dag sems kyi phan yon no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs
76a4: du zhig mchis/ / gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol bko lpags mkhan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod
76a5: pa'i don gnyer ba/ / theg pa 'di las 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa dang // gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang // dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rims spros dang bcas
76a6: pa'i lam/ / rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi// lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang/
76a7: sems dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin brten pa med// dmigs pa thams cad rnam gsal te/
76a8: lhan cig skyes pa'i don bsgom pa// phyag rgya chen por rang byin brlab// de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// mchog la yang ni phyin gnyis/

76b1: dbang ba'i bathong pa'i rdul 'byor gyis// snyen gnas dge ba snyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// 'di rjes rgyu rnams 'grub par 'gyur// rta ba'i rlu nI rnam pa gsas// sha
76b2: chud sum bcurtsa gnyis te/ / yan lag rgyad ni grangs las 'das// rtsab chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar bkrus pa yin// blam ze rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // dpeng rigs gangal pa gdul don du/
76b3: rgud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni gtso bo bsgom// thabs ni rnam pa du zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las byung
76b4: btso/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri tsi dur khrod ro steng du// gcer bu smra ba shig lhor bltas te// A li kA lis lus bsrungs la// dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa
76b5: dbang bzhi la/ / grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam// lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrung // gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khyung // gsum
76b6: pas sems kyi drim ste/ / de ni kun du brtags pa la// lhan cig gyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad// gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byin gyis
76b7: brta dang dbang bdU dang / 'dzin ma med pa bskyed nges la// nye bar bsgrub rdzogs pa'i rim// rim gnyis mnyam pa gnas smras// rdo rjecan gyi pa 'ar // nga pa mngon gyur chos sbru la/
76b8: mched de/ bde ba med sa spyod su// dam pa'i mdzadzod pa sprul yul// mug sus dbyer med pa de chen dang // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// gangs

77a1: bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor bas skyo nas sdom gsum ldan// thos tshe dang ldan mtshan nyid babang // dben par dkyil 'khor bris sgru bcapa/
77a2: chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal 'byor la// bsgom pa'i bar chod
77a3: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan
77a4: 'das/ / rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
77a5: la/ / rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa rgyal bsgrub pa'am// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// thog mar gsungs brtsa ba'i rgyud// phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// don rnams ston pas
77a6: rtsa ba la/ / gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan dus bzhi'i rim pa yis// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya rgyud rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos
77a7: gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sa// ji lta bu la sbyin par bya// ster na lung nod ji ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gang ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying
77a8: rje med cing khro la gdug khengs shing chags pa tshul khrims med/ / dang mod rigs ngan bla mas skyo// thos chung snying ring rnams la sba// dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang lagayo chu

77b1: med/ / dang ldan rigs bzangs gtong brod che// thos med dam tshig ldan la sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu la// dpa' bo
77b2: nab 'byor tshogs kyis mchod/ / ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams la rgyud gtad ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// zung la sgrub pa ched du gyis// lan gsum brjod la rgyud rnams sbyin// phyi rabs
77b3: dus kyi stongs mal/ / chags sems gyod pa'i slob ma ni// gus pas mi 'ag yo smras mdo// thos nas 'angs su pa rang tsho 'byin// de la bstan na da mchig nyams// nges par dad nas zhu ba yi// gcig nas gnyis lam
77b4: grol na/ / rdo rje dzin pa'i rigs rgyun 'chad// bcom ldan 'das kyis den ces paka' phrul pa dang // le shes mkha' 'khrim ma chogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis chud kyi dngan rtogs nas rjes su yi rang // dpa
77b5: 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs so/ / /
77b6: baN Di ta gA ya d+ha rA dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAHye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgyagar skad du/ An be la~M tan trarAdz+nyA nAm/
77b7: bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pa// rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi
77b8: yul las rnam par 'das/ / zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan med mtshan bzhi rnam par spangs// rang gi sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul// mtshan nyid mtshan bzhi rnam par spangs// khyad par du yang mdo

78a1: bsdus pas/ / bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig stong par 'dod pa dang // kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang /
78a2: kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyi ni// blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed// de nyid nges par yang dag par// rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod yul nyid// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// sgom pa med cing byang chub med// rgyu yi yid ches
78a3: spangs pa 'di/ / thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed// kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du// kha cig zhi ba chen po che// kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// kha cig/
78a4: 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang // gru gar de bzhin sil snyan dang // lha yi sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags na yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung las
78a5: gyur pa'i lus/ / de ltar la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de bzhin 'gyur ba ni//
78a6: phan 'dod rnams ni shes par bya// phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ gang zhig khyang par gyis bcos pa// lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// phung sogs
78a7: gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir/ / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste// rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya// me long lta bu gcig nyid de// dang po grur ni rtog
78a8: par bya/ / so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pa// shar gyi grur ni rnam par brgyan// bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa// byang gi grwar ni rnam par spros// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags med gra

78b1: rjes rtogs byang / / gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa// grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du// de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhir bya ba//
78b2: de bzhin gru bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyin pa 'i ni ni rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs ni// mi bskyod pa yi rnam par brgyan// zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'gug/
78b3: ba dra bye zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang // rta babs la sogs thams cad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs// gang zhi
78b4: sems kyi rab 'phel ba/ / ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas// de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs// dra ba byed pa byed du ste// dril bu do shal brtags pa ni// rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed// sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bu
78b5: ni/ chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs// chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mtshan phreng bar gsungs// bla ra las sogs gang zos pa// dngos po las sogs drang por des// sems ni tha
78b6: re zhes byar bshad/ / dam pa'i don ma gsungs pa'o// gos phreng de dag thams cad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems// dga' ba' ye shes kyis ni mtshan//
78b7: 'og tun gtugasungs// grwa yi mtshams nani thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs par byer// rdo rje rin po che yis smras// zla ba nyi gang spangs pa// thabs dang shes rabadon yod phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyi
78b8: sems/ ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de nyid dkyil 'khor du ni gsungs// sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// la grobam rnam/

79a1: gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin bsreg yang ni bshad pa yang // lha rnams tshim pa yis brjod// rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni// thab khung sgra yis mtshan pa nyid// bye brag byed pas mi
79a2: nang du gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams/ / sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyi ni bsre gzugs bya// gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar sbyin bsreg bshad nas ni/ 5
79a3: tuganas pa brjod par bya/ / sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa// de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po ci// gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de ni gsal bar
79a4: brjod par bya/ / yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang // gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod// skye ba med cing snang med par// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni nga yis/
79a5: sngagasu gsungs// sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni// lha rnams yang ni brjod par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags
79a6: shing / / gal te sems kyi nyer brtags gang // lha zhes bya bar yang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya// de na
79a7: dkyil krung bcas nas ni/ / sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid mthong ba gzhag par bya// snying kha'i gnasu lag pa gnyis// 'bad pas mnyam par sbyar nas su// mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin
79a8: du/ / gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/

79b1: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'gyur// nga yis bsal bar brjod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don
79b2: thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don/ / sems can don du snying rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// sA rje'i dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so// res 'ag
79b3: dam tshig 'khor lo yang / / de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so// rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang 'grub do na res 'ga' yang // gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa yin// rnam rtog med par lhag mos pas// sgrub po dam pas
79b4: bsgrub par bya/ / khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/ bshad pa dang ni gci ba nyid// dam tshig zhes bya rab 'bad par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig gsungs pa// de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas
79b5: gang tsho dam tshig 'dod chags sems/ / des ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems ni chags gyur pa// de ni sems can yod ma yin// de la kun du rtog pa yi// khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o// khrag ni chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpag
79b6: med pa'ang bza' bar bya/ / gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa// khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya// de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// sha chen
79b7: du ni rab tu dbye/ / mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjed// gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las// phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis// de yang gci pa'i sgra yis
79b8: brjod/ / chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i char ni gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'o// bshad pa za bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di rnams thams cad gsal

80a1: par bshad/ / 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po
80a2: mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / ye d+harmA he tra prab+ha bA he tun teShAn ta thA ga toH bdut+ta/ teSh+Thany+tsa yon rod a ba b+ha dI mad+hA shra ma NaH/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga Na
80a3: ya d+hA ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shri saM ba ra kha sa ma tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du// dpal bde mchog nam mkha'
80a4: dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
80a5: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bas kyang ches
80a6: gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig/ srog dang lnga pa de bzhin du// lam dang 'bras bu nyid yin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
80a7: bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga pa gang
80a8: lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/

80b1: kyis bka' stsam pa/ pa da po lo// rje ni mos gso pa/ sprin palapa lags/ bcom ldan das kyis paga'aphrul pa/ bus gas ba shes dpa nga / bzhi pa'i ba zhi po// de ben ba gnas/ rdo po gsolapa/ bcwa
80b2: ldan 'das gro ba'i lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa// snying chen po las gyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par thub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog/ bde ba chen po la ma yin no// rdorje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje
80b3: chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / shes rab ni gang / gnyis su med pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mcho// dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che// thabs ni ni rug dpal nyid// shes
80b4: rab rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ / gnyis su med pa zung 'jug mchog/ rdo rje stong pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang ni
80b5: he ru ka/ khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te// rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid do// skye mched de yang de bzhin du// lha yi ngo bor shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gar lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
80b6: gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dngos// dri ma med pa'i kha dog can// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis brgyan cang dgu dang ldan// zla tshe sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rigs kyi bdag
80b7: pos rnam par brgyan/ / spun gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste// chags pa med pa'i sham thabs can// shes rab dang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// ban du dmar po'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lnga brgyan cing // dag balnga bcu'i phreng
80b8: bas mdzes/ / rdo rje pad ma'i snod bsdams pa// yab la 'a lhud cing brgyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa// chu nyes nyi ma'i dbus na bgyis// khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde

81a1: mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o/ / / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
81a2: pa ni gang lags/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun// shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsapa nyid/
81a3: ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku// brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab// rtog pa med pa nam mkha'i dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med// gnyis su med pa bde ba'i
81a4: mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
81a5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang sbyin bsreg gtor ma dang // dbang gi rnam par dag pa dang // maN Da la dang ni de bzhin du/
81a6: bum pa'i ngo bo ltar shes pa// sngags kyi de bzhin gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / sbyin bsreg ni gang / gtor ma ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+DaDa la ni gang /
81a7: bum pa ni gang / sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po ste// oM shrI badz+ra he he ra ga hUM hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/
81a8: oM hrI ha ha hU hUM phaT/ oM sarba bud d+ha TI ka nI ye badz+ra war+N+Na ni ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bi ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis// bskal pa steng la sogs pa yaM// sdig pa ma

81b1: lus dgu byed na/ / gru bani pa la sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes// a shwad+tha dang na gron// dU ba la sngags de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i bor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang bdud rtsin+ta/
81b2: gyen du po gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rdal 'byor ma kun dgyes// dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid do// bdud rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// rin cheni sdong bzangs bruM gyis
81b3: mdzes/ / dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu// zhal bzhi sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye
81b4: mched kyi mkha' 'gro ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos
81b5: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM dz+wa la mu khi DA ki nI kaM ka ni hUM phaT/ oM ba ri nA ya ni DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM maH
81b6: DA ki ni hUM phaT/ oM ba ra mu khi DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM hu luka ti DA ki nI hU~M phaT/ oM a ra na tsan TI ki nI hU~M phaT/ chu skyes dag gis rnam brgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpe'i mo drug ni mnyes
81b7: par 'gyur/ / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i lam ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas/
81b8: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang / sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de// sprul pa tshegs kyi bdag

82a1: pa ba shA/ rdorje sring pos gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang gi ba ga dmar po ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag pan
82a2: pa/ / sprul pa 'khor lolo rtsi gas laganas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnan pa'o// rdo rje snyeng pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
82a3: par bya ba sngags nyid de/ oM gan pa ta ye swA hA/ nag po'i bruM yi ri lu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kying bor shes par bya// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las
82a4: las tshogs kyi dum bu te/ le'u gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa rdo rje sring po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo
82a5: gang gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// tsho'i mkhan po rnyan bangs rang
82a6: 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / ye na mA rba bra ga pa de can te ldan zhag phyob da// te nyam yon do// me thaM ba drim lnga thams// mi ga sa b+ha raH/ kr-i d+ham sus
82a7: dza gta/ shub+h+yAM//
82a8: rgyag mang nga/ DA'i nis chen ma ma a cin kyang dag dza 'ad 'i ya hriH tan mnas/ bod ga dadu/ mkhara' 'grom thams cad kyi zugs gnyis su med pa bamam kyis mi byu N+DI ye shes

82b1: rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos bI dus gcig na/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i drar
82b2: khrod chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / gti mug 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / 'dod chags 'joms pa'i he ru ka
82b3: dang / phrag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / yum sangs rgyas spyan dang / yum mA ma ki dang / yum gos dkar mo dang / yum dam tshig sgrol ma dang / yum kun du bzang mo dang / de rnams kyi b+ha ga la lhan cig skyes/
82b4: pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / khros ma nag mo dang / bde chen dkar mo dang / ser mo don grub ma dang / dmar mo sgra sgrog ma//
82b5: dang / sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang / las kyi gtso mo la sogs pa'i ye shes dang / las la grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang badz+ra DA ki nI dang / rad na DA ki nI dang / pad ma DA ki ni dang / karba DA ki nI/
82b6: dang / sa ma ya DA ki nI dang / bi Sha DA ki nI dang / sarba DA ki nI dang / lo ka DA ki nI la sogs pa drar khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' me'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mes po tshangs pa
82b7: dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs
82b8: gcig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ / yang de'i tshe na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dur khrod kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye

83a1: mgon po bdag la gson/ / khyed kyi 'khor du 'dus pa yi// skal dang ldan pa 'di rnams la// lam log mu stegs ma lags pa'i// dman pa nyan thos ma lags pa'i// ma smin mtshan nyid ma lags
83a2: pa'i/ / bsam gyis mi khyab chos gcig zhu// phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// bar chod/
83a3: sel ba ba de yi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan
83a4: de/ / bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsel// rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga// bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa
83a5: phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas mgon po des spyan phyogs mtshams kun la gzigs nas zhal rdo rje'i mgur 'dzum
83a6: pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa ni/ e ma ho/ nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// dus 'dir tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la// mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud bshad kyis// kha sbub zhabs rdol dri ma can// snod skyon
83a7: gsum po spang byas la/ / rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par gyis// phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba de// gnyug ma'i sems kyis lnga bar gyis// dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa ni// gnyug ma'i yid
83a8: kyis skom par bya/ / dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ gnyug ma'i yid kyis spang bar bya// bar chod sel ba brda yi chos// gnyug ma'i yid kyis gsal bar bya// smin par byed pa dbang

83b1: gi mchog/ gnyug ma'i sems kyis bskur bar bya// tshe gcig 'bras bu sangs rgyas de// gnyug ma'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de// ma bcos sems kyis bsgrub
83b2: par bya/ / rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga// ma bcos sems kyis bcad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa las phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i
83b3: rgyud las ston pas zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ tshe gcig sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas// dang po gdeng
83b4: chen lta ba gces/ / des na lta ba dang por bstan// phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis// thams cad 'degs pa lta ba'i mchog/ sa gzhi lta bur shes par gyis// thams
83b5: cad bsdud pa lta ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba chu ltar shes por gyis// nyon mongs bsreg palta ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba me ltar shes par gyis// ngos bzung med palta ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyis//
83b6: de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/ 'pho 'gyur med pa lta ba'i mchog/ ri bo lta bur shes par gyis// g.yo 'gul med pa lta ba'i mchog/ rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya// gsal ba ma 'dres lta
83b7: ba'i mchog/ 'ja' tshon lta bur shes par gyis// gnyis su med blta ba'i mchog/ ga bur lta bur shes par bya// de nas yang gas rabs tshig 'di gsungs te/ zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog
83b8: seng ge lta bur shes par bya/ / nyam nga med pa lta ba'i mchog/ glang chen lta bur shes par bya// stobs dang ldan pa lta ba'i mchog/ rta mchog lta bur shes par bya// kun du rgyug pa lta

84a1: pa'i mchog/ stag mo lta bur shes par bya// 'jigs pa med pa lta ba'i mchog/ dom bu lta bur shes par bya// de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te/ skyon gyis/
84a2: mgos lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems de dkar por snang // dus gsum mi 'gyur lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems de nag por snang // yon tan rgyas pa lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems
84a3: de ser por snang / / kun la khyab pa lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems de dmar por snang // phrin las rdzogs pa lta ba'i mchog/ byang chub sems de ljang khur shar// de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig
84a4: gsungs te/ dus gsum snang ba lta ba'i mchog/ rnam par snang mdzad lta bur shar// chos nyid don la rtag sems pas// rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur shar// thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs
84a5: pas/ / rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur shar// chos can so sor ma 'dres pas// snang ba mtha' yas lta bur shar// sna tshogs snang la ma 'dres pas// don yod grub pa lta bur shar zhes pa
84a6: gsungs so/ / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
84a7: de nas dur khrod padag mo des// ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus// rtogs pa lta ba'i rjes thogs pa// bsgom
84a8: nga'i go rims ji lta bu/ / zhes zhus pas/ de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa yis// rtogs pa'i don go bsgoms las byung // gzhan du 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// sna

84b1: tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ / ye nas spros dang bral ba la// rtag par 'dzin pa sgom pa'i skyon// phyi dang nang gi chos nyid la// chad par 'dzin pa sgom pa'i sbyor// 'on ji ltar bsgom zhes na// lam med
84b2: lam go la dman pa'i lam/ / 'di rnams spangs te bsgom par bya// dang po byang chub sems bskyed do// smon 'jug gnyis po sngon dugaces// gzung ba yul med bsgom pa'i mchog/ chos kyi bdag med rtogs
84b3: bar bya/ / 'dzin pa'i sems med bsgom pa'i mchog/ gang zag bdag med rtogs par bya// chos rnams gang yin mi 'gegs pas// thabs kyi lam du shes par bya// ngo bo ci yang ma grub pas// shes rab
84b4: lam du shes par bya/ / chos rnams rgyu med bsgom pa'i mchog/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar yin// 'bras bu stong pa bsgom pa'i mchog/ mtshan med pa yi rnam thar yin// rgyu 'bras dbyer med bsgom pa'i mchog/
84b5: smon pa med pa'i rnam thar yin// kun la byams pa bsgom pa'i mchog/ byams pa tshad med rang bzhin yin// kun la brtse ba bsgom pa'i mchog/ snying rje tshad med ngo bo nyid// kun la phan pa bsgom pa'i mchog/
84b6: dga' ba tshad med ngo bo nyid// kun la khyab pa bsgom pa'i mchog/ btang snyoms tshad med ngo bo nyid// bsod nams tshogs sog bsgom pa'i mchog/ bzhi gsum bcu gnyis bdag nyid can// lam la bsgoms
84b7: ba bsgom pa'i mchog/ nges 'byed bzhi'i bdag nyid can// ye shes mthong ba bsgom pa'i mchog/ byang chub yan lag rnam bdun yin// goms par byed pa bsgom pa'i lam// 'phags lam brgyad kyi
84b8: bdag nyid can/ / goms pa mthar phyin pasgom pa'i mchog bcu pa la ni yongs su grol// sangs rgyas pa yi rnam thar yin/ chags sems bral ba bsgom pa'i mchog sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/ rang sems dag pa bsgom pa'i mchog

85a1: rdul khribs par la byin pa yin/ / dza ma snyas pa pasgom pa'i mchog/ babang pa'i bar byon pa yad// ga sbyor babaskam pa mchog/ brtson 'grus pa ma sbyan pa // gsang me pa sgom pa na/
85a2: babs pan pa ris byin pa yi// 'khor 'ad shes pa bsgos par 'chog/ shes rapa par ma byin pa yin// na mongs mi spong brnas pa'i cog/ thabs kyi pa ma byed pa yin// mam kyil gnod pasgrum /
85a3: kyi pha ros phyin pa yin// ci bsams 'grub pa bsgom pa'i mchog/ smon lam pha rol phyin pa yin// ji snyed mkhyen bya ba sgom pa'i mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa yin// sa dbyings ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog/ spros pa med pa'i
85a4: rang bzhin yin/ / me long ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog/ thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes yin// mnyam nyid ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog/ kun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid yin// kun rtogs ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog
85a5: ma 'dres gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid/ / bya grub ye shes bsgom pa'i mchog/ phrin las thams cad dus gcig rdzogs// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon
85a6: par 'byung ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las bsgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// he ru ka la 'di skad gsol// ge mos par bya ba'i rjes thob la// spyod pa'i go rims ji ltar bgyi// de nas ston pas
85a7: gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / cung zad drod ni thob pa dang // de tshe spyod pa spyad par bya// dang po gsang pa'i spyod pabya// byang chub sems ni dro pob nas// rigapa brtul zhugs spyod par bya// lhan cig rgyas
85a8: drod thob nas/ / ma dang zlog pa'i spyod pa bya// chu tshod lta bu'i drod thob nas// tshogs kyi spyod pa ci bder spyad// smyon pa lta bu'i sems thob nas// phyogs med rnam rgyal spyod pa bya// de yi dbye ba gzhan na gsal// gnas

85b1: dang thob pa dang dus dang zas/ / le 'u gzhan nas shes par bya// kun gyis bskur bapyod pa'i mchog/ rgal ba sa bu'i stod pab+ha// de tshogs pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rde gas / nga'i snod pa bya// nags byung lar+tha
85b2: bskyed pa'i mchog/ bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa bya// srid dang bral ba spyod pa'i mchog/ dmangs rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya// dmasas 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog/ gdol palta bu'i spyod pa bya// de nas gan yang bgang bya stes thos pa'i
85b3: baspyod pa'i mchog/ seng ge lta bu'i spyod pa bya// nyam nga med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa bya// shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ta mchog lta bu'i spyod pa bya// rnam rtog gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog
85b4: spyang ki lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ / drag shul lta byed spyod pa'i mchog/ dreng mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// gza' gtad med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ri dgas lta bu'i spyod pa bya// ngo tsha thal ba spyod pa'i mchog/
85b5: langs lta bu'i spyod pa bya// ro dang 'grogs pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rigs ngan lta bu'i spyod pa bya// dur khrod gnas pa spyod pa'i mchog/ lce spyang lta ba'i spyod pa bya// bag yo rdzam pa spyod pa'i mchog/ wa mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya// de wa
85b6: gzhan yang bshad par bya/ / zung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog/ ngur ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya// gzhan gyis mi mthong spyod pa'i mchog/ khwa ta lta bur spyod pa bya// dug lnga spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rma byalta bu'i spyod pa bya// dus
85b7: tshod 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog/ khu zug lnga bri'i spyod pa bya// nyes pas mgos spyod pa'i mchog/ bya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad byaste// ris kyis 'jig pa spyod pa'i mchog/ spe'u lta bu'i sri
85b8: 'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog/ dom bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya// mtshan ma grub spyod pa'i mchog/ zhag migacan gyi spyod pa bya// gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog/ bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya// snang ba lta ba spyod par

86a1: mchog/ 'bar blta ba'i spyod bubya// de las gzhad yang bshang bye// dgos 'dod 'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog no bus pa spyod pabya// sman drug gnyis med spyod pa'i mchog/ ga bur lta bur shes par bya// cis
86a2: kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje lta bur shes par bya// mi mthun gcod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ ral gri lta bur shes par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad byaste// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i mchog/ mda' ga'u lta bur shes par
86a3: bya/ / stong pa'i kha 'byed/ spyod pa'i mchog/ shaka ti lta bur shes par bya// 'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog/ mdung thung lta bur shes par bya// ra bdag gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog/ sA ri lta bur shes par bya// gdul bya
86a4: 'dren pa spyod pa'i mchog/ lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya// dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang // grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe// de 'dra'i skyes bus phyag rgya cher rtogs byed// de nyid sems kyi khyad par mthong gyur na//
86a5: brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sal 'gro// sems nyid gnyis kyi gnang dang ma bral na// brtul zhugs spyad kyang sdug bsngal sna tshogs skye// bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi sde
86a6: dbang bskur ltar/ / thogs pa med pa phyag rgya chen po de// skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas sa la reg ces gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon
86a7: bapar 'thung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas dur khrod bdag medes// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// yang dag brda ni brda' chen po// kun gyis mi tog smras pa'i don// bar chad
86a8: sel ba brda'i chos/ / bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// de na sa ston pas bka' stsal pa// snang ba thams cad lus kyi brda// tshig ni ji snyed dag gi brda// de la bsam gyis mi khyab gnas// don gyi brda ru shes par bya/

86b1: de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa// gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang // dpa' bo brtag pa'i rim pa dang // phyag rgya mo yi brtag pa dang // mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang //
86b2: rnal 'byor pag me rdzogs byed dang // badz+ra yi bye brag ji snyed pa// 'gro mgon khyed kyis bshad du gsol// mgon po dpa' bos bka' stsal pa// thams cad kun gyi brda chen po// sbas pa'i brda ni bshad bya ba// g.yas
86b3: pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / / g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin dang // lus kyis brda rnams rdzogs par bya// mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la// lag pa g.yon pa brtan pa ni// sa ro zhes ni brjod par bya// rkang pa grong khyer sa
86b4: bgrod pas/ / spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba// go ba'i phyir nas brkang bstan te// a g+na la zhes brjod par bya// srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi na// de yi phyir na de bstan te// shes rab chen por go bya'i phyir// b+ha ta ri zhes
86b5: brjod par bya/ / lce yis zas kyi ro myong ltar// stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir// lce bstan tsar+ya g+ha zhes brjod// skal par ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni// yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir// lto ba zas kyi snod bstan pa/ an
86b6: d+ha li nyes brjod par bya/ / lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir// de bzhin snod ni bstan par bya// bla ma'i brgyad pa go cha'i phyir// paM ka ta zhes brjod par bya// sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar// lnga yi rtsa ba e baM ru// bsdus
86b7: phyir sor mo lnga bsta do la/ / tshan dron zhes brjod par bya// so'i stobs kyis zas 'dul ltar// e bi ji bzhin rtogs par byed// gang gis so ni bstan byas pas// tsi la ni zhes brjod par bya// byin pas lus kyi stobs/
86b8: skyed ltar// goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir// go phyin pa ni bstan byas la// mig ba zhes brjod par bya// sa bzhi 'gro ba kun 'degs ltar// 'bras bu dam tshig gis bsten ltar// sa ba'i gru bi nang

87a1: bstan byas la/ / maN Dal zhes su brjod par bya// sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir// phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas// g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga bstan pa// sba ra na zhes brjod par bya// mi
87a2: bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang / / rgyas gdab gnyis na go bya'i phyir// dbugs ni lini dbyung bar bya// dpal kun sham zhes brjod par bya// so 'cha' ba'i zhe sdang gis// 'bras bu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir// ga
87a3: sdang gcod phyir so 'cha' bas/ / ma ta khwa zhes brjod par bya// sha ni srog chags thams cad las// 'byung zhing chos rnams thams cad ni// sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas// ra tsan zhes brjod par bya// zla
87a4: gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas/ / bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi// rtags yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan// ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya// bsdums pas dbye ba med palhur// 'khor 'das dbyer mi byed pa lta
87a5: b+ha ga ni zhes brjod par bya/ / dpe yis mtshon pa'i don du ni// dri ma kun las grol ba'i phyir// bsdams pa bkrol nas kren na brjod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin// thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar//
87a6: sna tshogs snang ba'i chos kun la// bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir// gtor ma gtang la hi ki ka brjod// lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar// sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas// don du lte ba bstan nas ni//
87a7: ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya// de rnams phan yon dpag med pas// snying po rgyud du gsal bar bstan// brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po la// longs spyod pa ni thabs kyi mchog/ byin gyis brlabs
87a8: dang sa bon dang / / rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad bas// dpag med rims kyis phan yon 'byung // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni// bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda// mtheb srin e'i drang ro

87b1: gcig/ gsang ba'i dbang ste lus kyi brda// byang chub mchog gi phyag brgya ni// gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin// skyes dang ma skyes gnyis med pas// bzhi pa yin ste lus kyi brda// de yi ngag gi brda smras pa// ka la sha
87b2: yi bum pa'i dbang / / ya ra la wa gsang ba'i brda'o// e ba ma ya gsum pa'i brda'o// e hAM oM a bzhi pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon
87b3: par 'byung ba'i rgyud las brda'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa de la phyi'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'i
87b4: tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang // de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad zhus so// bla med ston pa he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren mdzad pa//
87b5: thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa khyod// nad pa lta bu'i sems can la/ chos kyi sman mchog bstan du gsol// long ba lta bu'i sems can la// chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsol// rgyal po lta bu'i ston pa
87b6: khyod/ / kun la byams pa mdzad du gsol// blon po lta bu'i ston pa khyod// kun la phan par mdzad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas ston pa 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/ skra'i sgo nas
87b7: mdzes gar rnam pa gsum mdzad/ / gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzad// thugs kyi sgo nas khyad par gyi ye shes rnam pa gsum bskyed nas// 'khor rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs pa'i gsu
87b8: gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ / nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la// ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ltung // nyon mongs 'dam du bying ba sri/

88a1: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kun// nyon mongs pa yi gnyen por bstan// dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas// thun mong
88a2: theg pa rim gyis bstan/ / mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum// bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// bde gshegs thugs rje bsam mi khyab// sems can rnams la de ltar bstan// de nas dur khrod bdag
88a3: des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bla med ston pa he ru ka/ thun mong theg pa de ltar bstan// khyad par gsang sngags ji ltar lags// rgyud sde rnams kyi dbye ba zhu// smin pa'i lam ni ji ltar lags// grol ba'i lam
88a4: ni gang la bgyi/ / dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas ston pa he ru kas// nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag la// gsang sngags rgyud sde ngas bshad kyis// snod
88a5: skyon gsum po spongs la nyon/ / bya ba gtso bor byed pa la// ki ma'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan// spyod pa gtso bor byed pa la// gnyis pa'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan// sems nyid gtso bor byed pa la// rnal 'byor rgyud snga
88a6: rnam lnga bstan/ / bde stong gtso bor byed pa la// bla na med pa'i rgyud lnga bsten// yid la byed pa med rnams la// gong na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan// de'i phyir rgyud sde rnam pa lnga// gsang sngags rgyud ces bya bar grags/
88a7: ri de la yang lnga lnga ste// skad chen nyi shu rtsa ldan// mthung 'thung bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dur khrod bdag me nges yang zhus pa// rgyud kyi dbye ba ji ltar na// sprin zhes 'gyi ba ji ltar lags/ lam
88a8: zhes bgyi ba gang la bgyi/ / de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la// de nyid yod de smin lam med// des na 'bras bu

88b1: thob mi 'gyur/ / lam log mu stegs byed rnams la// de nyid yod de smid lam med// des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// dman pa nyan thos rang rgyal la// de nyid yod de sprin lam med// de phyir skal ba grangs med du// dka'
88b2: thub spyod pa nyon ri mongs/ / ma smin mdo sder zhugs rnams la// de nyid yod de sprin lam med// des na tshe gcig sangs rgyas dka' zhes so// de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa// sprin zhes bya ba gang la bgyi//
88b3: lam zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// smin zhes bya ba ni sad d+ha'i sgra las shes par bya'o// lam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni a tha mi thi'i sgra las shes
88b4: bar bya/ / 'jig rten pa'i lam dang sbyar ro// lus dang ngag dang sems dang gsum// ma smin smin par byed pa'i thabs// dbang bskur cho ga ji snyed bstan// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba gces// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen pa rnam// sum
88b5: rdzogs byas nas/ / sa cho ga sta gon tshul bzhin bya// dang po sa gzhi yongs su bzung // gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste// nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya// rgyud rnams gzhan du shes par bya//
88b6: de nas dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgor// ba'i rnam lnga'i maN Da la bri// skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la// bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// dkyil 'khor de yi lha'i sgo ru// bdud rtsi lnga yi maN Da la bya//
88b7: skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la// gsang ba'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// dkyil 'khor de yi nubasgo ru// dal gyi chos 'byung e dbyibs bri// skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la// shes rab ye shes
88b8: dbang bskur te/ / gsum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur// dkyil 'khor de yi byang sgo ru// phrin las rnam bzhi'i maN/ la bri// skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la// bzhi pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par

89a1: bsku dkyil 'khor de yi pho brang du/ / seng chen bsnol ba'i khri stengs su// bskal ldan slob ma der bzhag la// rdo rje slob dpon byed pa'i dbang // cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bskur// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang gsum po// thog ma
89a2: nyid du bskur bar bya/ / de nas dur khrod brgyad rnams kyis// dbang ni rnam pa brgyad po bskur// de nas zas rnams bdud rtsi'i dbang // ji lta bar ni bskur bar bya// de nas phyag mtshan rnams kyi dbang // go rims bzhin du bskur bar bya// de nas
89a3: nyan pa'i dbang rnams bskur/ / de nas bshad pa'i dbang rnams bskur// de nas skal ldan gang zag la// mda' gsol sum bcu rtsa lnga bya// de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis// dbang rnams ma lus rdzogs par bskur// de nas dbang
89a4: rdzogs gang zag de/ / bder gshegs rnams kyi sras yin te// mkhyen rabs bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam// mthu stobs khro rgyal rnams dang mnyam// tshe tshad nyi zla gnyis dang mnyam// dang po las can sbyor ba yis// sa
89a5: brgyad pa la rab tu gnas/ / dbang skur gnang ba ma thob na// rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang // slob dpon bya ba yod mi nus// dbang bskur gnang ba ma mthong na// gzhan gyi yon tan kun 'chad yang // 'khor lo srog shing med
89a6: pa 'dra/ / dbang ma thob par las brtsem dang / sgyid ma ma rtas khal 'gel ba// 'di dag phung ba'i rgyu yin no// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa ni// 'bras bu med cing
89a7: brlag par 'gyur/ / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas dur khrod phag mo des
89a8: he ru ka la 'di skad zhus/ / sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu chos// bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// gang dang gang gis grol ba lags// dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga// gang dang gang gis 'joms par

89b1: byed de nas sten pas bka' stsal te/ / nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyed// dbang po rab kyi gang zag la// rang bzhin rnam dag pag mo bstan// dbang po 'bring gi gang zag la// brjod pa sA yi phag mo bstan// dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la//
89b2: mtshan pa brda yi phag mo bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// ston pa la ni tshig 'di gsol// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yi// rdo rje phag mo dzal bu// sgra yi phag mo ji lta bu// dbyibs kyi phag mo
89b3: lta bu/ / zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so// nyon gcig dur khrod bdag mo khyad// rang bzhin nyid nas dag pa ste// chos kyi sku la ba nyid// skad cig drug gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rjo
89b4: bsgra la bag sod/ / longs spyad sgra yo ngo ba nyid// longs spyod rdzogs su 'ang bo nyid// zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la khri tsham med// mtshon pa brda yi phag me de// sprul pa sku mang za nyid//
89b5: na drug gams pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsam med// ces bka' stsal te// de nas dur khrod bdag ma des// dpa' ba chel yang zhus pa// gang zag rigs la lnga yod de// gti mug cin gyi gang zag dang // zhe
89b6: da kyi gang zag dang / / dod pa gtsor byed gang zag dang / rgyal can gyi gang zag dang // brag dag can gyi gang zag sa// de rnams gang dang gang gis grol// zhes thus so// de nas na pas bka 'dul te/ ti mug can gyi gang zan
89b7: sa~M pags dkaras bstan/ / gti mug rgyal gyis gti mug 'jams// 'dod pa gca byed skyes bul// gsung gi pag mo dmar mo bstan / 'odag/ tshul gyis 'did chags 'joms// na rdza can gyi gang zag la//
89b8: thugs pag sa dag pa brtan// drang tshus gyis nga 'joms// rgyal can ci gang thugapa// na tad na kya gam partan/ rgyam chus kyis kya 'joms/ gdog can cigang gal/ l+r-i sa pag rjong chub na/

90a1: phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms// de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// he ru ka la rig 'di gsol// dug lnga shas che gang zag lnga// 'bras bu sku lnga ji ltar thob// ye shes ldini ji ltar snang // rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi//
90a2: khrol ldan ji ltar bsgom// 'khor lo lnga ni ji ltar gnas// snying po ldani ji ltar bzlas// dam tshig ldan ji ltar bsrung // nyams myong ldani ji ltar 'byung // nyin mongs ljin ji ltar 'byung // ye shes ldani ji ltar 'phel// grangs kyi tshad ni
90a3: ji ltar bzlas/ / mtshan ma'i rtags ni ji ltar 'byung // dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags// las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub// ces zhus so// de nas dpa' bo he ru kas// thugs rab tu dgyes te/ brda'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to// nyon
90a4: cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ / dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga// 'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste// kun la khyab pa chos sku dang // theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang // gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang // cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// ngo bo nyid kyi
90a5: sku mchog dang / / skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur// rtogs pa'i don la goms par byed// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'thob// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud tu bshad// thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang // spros bral chos dbyings
90a6: ye shes dang / / me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar// bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid// gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog/ phrin las mthar phyin bya ba grub// ye shes lnga ni de ltar skye// gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid
90a7: la'o/ / dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga// rigs ni rnam pa lnga thob ste// spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen rigs// skyon gyis ma gos pad ma'i rigs// sems can don grub las kyi rigs// gzhan
90a8: nas ma yin rang nyid la/ / dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag de// ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas// bde ba skye ba sku yin pas// bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya// nus pa 'byung ba gsung yin pas// dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya// rtogs tshad

90b1: 'char ba thugs yin pas/ / khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya// brtan par byed pa yon tan te// ser mo dor grub bsgom par bya// bar chad sel ba 'phrin las ste// sna tshogs mthar phyin bsgom par bya// rims kyis ma yin cig car yin// rgya dang
90b2: 'bur gyi tshul du bya/ / yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugasi na// spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo na// bde byed sku'i yi ge bzhi// rang bzhin rtsa'i gzugs can no// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lon// gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni// rang
90b3: bzhin rtsa yi tshul du gnas/ / snying kha chos kyi 'khor lon// thugs mchog yi ge rnam bzhin// rtsa yi dbyibs dang 'thun par gnas// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na// brtan byed yon tan yi ge bzhi// de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs// phrin
90b4: las yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ / 'i rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi// las dang rjes 'thun gzugs su gnas// snying po lnga'i bzlas thabs ni// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // 'phrin las bzhi yi tshul du bzlas// dam tshig lnga'i bsrung tshul ni// bde chen
90b5: dkar mo'i dam tshig tu/ / sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms// khros ma nag po'i dam tshig tu// drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa bya// ser mo don grub dam tshig tu// dngos po kun la chags med bya// dmar mo sgra sgrog dam tshig tu// smra zhing
90b6: bud med brten par bya/ / sna tshogs mthar phyin dam tshig tu// rgyug cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya// mkha' 'gro spyi'i dam tshig tu// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni// bza' ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga ste// gsang sngags
90b7: spyod pas bsten par bya/ / de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni// go rims skye tshul 'di lta ste// dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin// chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gre'i nyams myong
90b8: yin/ / thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba// rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin// chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal// pad ma mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin// dngos po gang la'ang thogs med ma// las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin// nyon mongs

91a1: lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni/ gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur// zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur// rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur// 'dod chags so sor rtog par 'gyur// phrag dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur// de nas 'gyur ba lam du
91a2: byed/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// sku yaM yige rnam bzhi yis// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel// gsung g.yo ga rnam pazhi yis// sa sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel// thugs kyi yi ga rnam bzhi yis// me ling lta bu'i ye shes 'phel//
91a3: yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'phel// phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi yis// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel// A li ding ni kA li yis// sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur zhes so// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste// grangs kyi tshad ni
91a4: 'di lta ste/ / 'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs rnams sprod// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer slod// 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal po 'joms// 'bum phrag bzhi pas bud med 'gugs// 'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg/ 'bum
91a5: phrag drug gis 'byung ba bzlog/ 'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas khang ga yo// 'bum phrag brgyad kyis mngon shes 'char// 'bum phrag dgu yis zas nor 'dra// 'bum phrag bcu yis gang 'dod 'grub// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste//
91a6: mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma gsum// skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la// ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga// mngon sum dag tu mthong bar 'gyur// dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste// las 'gro can gyi snang ba yin// skal pa 'bring gi gang zag la// ye shes khro
91a7: mornam pa lnga/ / rang gi las dang gang 'thun par// rmi lam dag tu mcho ga dugs la// skal pa 'bring gi mtshan lhas yin// skal pa dman pa'i gang zag la// tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste// 'od dang sgra dang 'dzum pa dang // mkha' 'gro'i lung
91a8: bstan 'byung ba dang / / skye ba 'di la nges par 'grub// sbyor ba dman pa'i gang zag la// bar mdo nas lam sna 'dren// mkhas spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum te// rab la skad cig rnam drug yin// 'bring la zla ba

91b1: drug gis grol/ / tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba ni// rgyas dang bsdus pa shin tu rgyas// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes
91b2: gzung gnyis/ / rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa bzhi// shin tu rgyas pa thun mong brgyad// de las 'phros pa nyi shu lnga// bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis// zhi ba'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub// ser mo dan grub ting 'dzin gyis// rgyas
91b3: pa'i las chags rnam lnga 'grub/ / dmar mo sgra sgrags ting 'dzin gyis// dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub// khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis// drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub// sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 'dzin gyis// phrin
91b4: las bzhi yi yis rnams 'grub/ / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des
91b5: ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la/ / phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad zhus te/ skal par ldan pa'i gang zag gis// bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir// sku dang mchod rten ji ltar bgyi// de yi ge rims bshad du gsol//
91b6: zhes zhus pa'o// de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod// rigs can lnga'i gang zag des// bdag don gzhan don byed 'dod pas// sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga// rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rims lnga// lnga tshan lnga ru
91b7: shes par bya/ / de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni// de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya// dang ba bdag gi de nyid dang // nyis bcu yi de nyid dang // gsum pa 'bras bu 'di nyid do// dang po bdag gi de nyid ni// de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de// deng dang rjen
91b8: 'grus rab ldan pas/ / sku dang mchod rten 'dabs dus su// 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya// gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// sa bzhi dkar zhing snum pa la// rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i// lnga tshan lnga ni les

92a1: b+hu / / lus dag ying gsum sbyor ba yis// klu dang mchod rten na rigs gdapa// 'ogacin gnas nas sma dngas la// rab tu gnas pa gzung bzhin bya// de nas mang gsol na bza' gsol// del mdza dang bkod pa // ga
92a2: su gsol ba'i rim pa ni/ / dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya// zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des// dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas// sku 'am mchod rten 'debs dus su//
92a3: 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya// gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// sa bzhi sar la mtsher ba la// gong du bstan pa ji lta bar// sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas// rab tu gnas pa
92a4: gzhung bzhin bya/ / de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol// mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams// dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya// rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dang po bdag gi de nyid ni// pad ma rigs kyi gang zag de// dad
92a5: dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ / sku dang mchod rten byed dus su// 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya// gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// sa gzhi dmar la gtang ba la// lnga tshan lnga dang legs sbyar te// lus ngag yid gsum//
92a6: sbyor ba yis// skra dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab// 'og mini gnas nas spyan drangs la// rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya// de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol// mchod dang bstod dang bzhugs pa kun// dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya// dbang
92a7: ge las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ / dang po bdag gi de nyid ni// rdo rje rigs kyi gang zag de// dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas// sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su// 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya// gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni// rnam pa
92a8: lnga ru shes par bya/ / sa gzhi gnag cing rtsub pa la// khrag dang dug dang tsher ma dang // yungs dkar nyungs nag skye tshe dang // lnga tshan lnga dang bcas pa la// lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis// sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab// 'og ma ni gnas

92b1: nas spyar drangs la/ / rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya// de la mda' gsol na bza' gsol// mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa kun// dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya// drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed// dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/
92b2: las kyi rigs kyi gang zag de dang dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas// sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su// 'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya// gnyis brgyu yi de nyid ni// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya// sa ga'i ldang zhing kha dog ser// gong
92b3: du lnga tshan lnga dang sbyar/ / de la skra dang mchod rten rnams// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du gdab// 'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la// rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya// de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol// mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs/
92b4: pa rnams// dam chos gzhan dang 'thun par bya// drag po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa lnga ni so sor bstod// mkha' 'gre ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon
92b5: par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / // de nas dur khrod bdag mo des// ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so// kye kye
92b6: mgon po bdag la gson/ / khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nyon mongs brgyad khri ba'i stong dang // rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis// dus gsum kun du sdug bsngal bskyed// deyi gnyen po bshad du
92b7: gsol/ / khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed// rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste// de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar gsal// phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe// de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu// legs nyes
92b8: kun gyis stang ma gcod pa'i/ / mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa la// de yi rtog pa gcad par bu// nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la// de las thar pa'i thabs gcig 'u// bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su// de las rgyal ba'i thibs gcig tu/

93a1: lus sems gnyis po 'brel dus der// de las thar pa'i thabs gcig zhu// de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyu 'bras kun du sdug bsngal ba// ma lus dbyer med shes gyur na// sdug bsngal ma/
93a2: lus bde bar 'gyur// gzhan yang thun mong 'di lta ste// phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe// phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bya// nyes legs kun gyi sta ma gcod pa// mna' 'am gal gyis 'jig pa la// mna' las rnam par rgyal bar
93a3: bya/ / nad dang gdon gyis nyes pa la// bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya// bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la// ngag las rnam par rgyal bar bya// lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der// rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya// mkha' 'gro ma
93a4: thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bag mo mngon par 'thung ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ / // de nas mgon po ho ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa
