184b8: spyod/ / rnal 'byor ma rmongs snying chos tshegs la 'dud// rnal 'byor ma yi chos grol nges pa'i gcol 'dud// sems can grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal// thams cad bdag skyes gcig

185a1: dongos de la bstod phyag 'tshal/ / 'khor ba rgya mtsho rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal// de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag 'dud bstod phyag 'tshal// zhes bya bas kyang byar du bstod cing // glu dang bstod pas nye ba
185a2: mchong bar bya'o/ / khar bar du hUM gi s+yA dang dril bu bsgrags la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o// rdo rje bal mo dam bcings nas/ sIng ka'i phyogs su bci bar bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+has rba d+ham swa b+hA ba shung
185a3: oM badz+ra shud d+ho sarba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho ha~M/ / oM yo ga shud d+ho sarba d+harma yo ga shud d+ho ha~M// g.yas pa pad ma bsams nas su// g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang // pad ma'i bskor bas bskor nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bstan
185a4: par bya/ / oM ha ho hriHswA hA// phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs pa ru// lha rnams thams cad bsam par bya// 'jig rten la sogs ye shes can// byi yi
185a5: dkyil 'khor ba rtag par bya/ / so sor dri yis mchod pa dang // so sor me tog gtor ba dang // so sor bdug pas bdug pa sogs// so sor sbyor bar dbul bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni bsres nas su// nya phyis la sogs
185a6: dbul bar bya/ / ha zhes bya bas kha dog dbrog/ he zhes bya bas dri gzhom ste// hri zhes bya bas nus pa gzhom// go rims de ltar mngon par brjod// rnam gsum lan gsum brjod nas su// lha gsum du ni bsam par bya//
185a7: pad ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes gser gyi mdog/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snar mdzad// myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phyag rdo rje// lha gsum dbang phyug ni bsgom par bya// g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi// zla ba'i dbus
185a8: su bdud rtsi yi/ / yi ge kun rig gug skyed bcas// mthe bong sor mo sa nyid de// srin lag dag ni ri rab bo// bsrungs pa'i stobs kyis bdud bci yi// chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la//

185b1: mthe bor thor ma so sor dbul// de 'og rang gi dngos po yis// bdag nyid la ni bsam bya ba// rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten ni// rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya// lce rtse thig le steng du yang // blo dang ldan pas gnas gsum
185b2: mchod/ / ltos shig shin tu mdzes pa'i chos// 'di la rtog pa yod min thong // bram ze khyi dang rdol pa gsum// rang bzhin cig pas lhan cig bza'// rnal 'byor pho mo'i 'khor lo la// tshigs bcad 'di yis sbyin
185b3: par bya/ / pad ma'i bskor ba sngon 'gro bas// sems ni shel ltar bsams nas su// g.yas pa pad ma'i gdan la ni// rdo rje rtse gsum bsgred par bya// 'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i// rin zang med las legs /
185b4: chos// 'dzin dang 'dzin med rnam spangs pa// de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal// tshogs spyad 'di yis blar byas te// sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni// kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis kun tu sbyar//
185b5: ji ltar bde bas kun zhes brjod// dmar po yi ni rdzas rnams kyis// maN/ Dal gru gsum gsum du b+ha// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// mthe chung gnyis ni bsgreng nas su// 'dzub
185b6: mo gnyis ni bsgrer bar bya/ / g.yas pa cung zad ba kum nas su// sbyar bas phyag rnams spyan drang ngo // oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi ba ti hU dza swA hA// spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me tog dmar po bdug pa
185b7: rang/ dri dang mar me la sogs dbul// rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i snod la ni// nye ba'i longs spyod gtor mar ldan// sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs// bza' ba'i rjes rnams thams cad la// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas par dgod
185b8: g.yon gyi cha ru snod bzhag la/ / g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul dang // grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khang stong dang // gdol ma snod pang dang ni//

186a1: khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang // nag po gtsigs dang mi bdug dang // rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang //
186a2: misdug ma dang dbu ma dang // rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo//
186a3: 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jeb byed grong nas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang zod chen ma// thod phreng can dang kha T+wAM ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can// rdo rje
186a4: bzhin gzhu can ma/ / lha yi dbang phyug ma rnams ni// de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga// las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor thal chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa/
186a5: sku chen te// rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ oM ka ka kad na/ b+ha b+ha b+ha na na// kha kha kha da na/ sarba duSh+TA na ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a
186a6: oM ka s+ya shAn taM ku ru hUM hUM phaT dza swA hA/ / bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang nas// las kyi go 'phang mngon par bas mo// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms te// las rnams thams cad rjes su 'grub// rdo rje khu tshur
186a7: gnyis bcings nas/ / rgya ba dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya// oM tiSh+Tha hUM bka bkadz+ra phaT swA hA// ji bzhin las sbyor sngags sbyar nas// gtor ma'i las la sogs pa sbyar// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // gsang
186a8: bsrang dbye dang bcing ba la/ / phyi rol gtor ma de nyid kyis// gtor ma'i las la sogs pas bslub// de nas mchod pa'i khyad par las// rung dang mi rung rnam par spang // lcags kyu la sags rnam pa lnga// de nyid lnga

186b1: ru bya ba ste/ / lugs kyu che la dgod pa ni// ye shes lhar ni 'dod pa ste// rdo rje lugs kyu mi bskyod pa// gnas kyi lcags kyu ni chen dbang // rgyal po'i lcags kyu don yod grub// g.yo ba'i lcags kyur 'od dpag med//
186b2: lugs kyu lnga la sogs pa la// de nyid thams cad sbyar bar bya// gang zhig 'dod na l-I kun dang // rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya// 'dod la dga' ba ma yin 'ang // longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya// rang 'dod
186b3: thams cad de nyid de/ / mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya// de yi dbus su dga' bo rnams// A li kA li sbyar bar bya// A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis// lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// do la dbus nas byung ba yi/
186b4: bdung brtsi'i ro kun myang bar bya// rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag mdag/ phyi yid dkyil 'khor du na brtag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i grwa yis na// bkra shis dag mis da par bya// lus can den phyir shes rab gsol gtapa ga// kun
186b5: 'khyung la sogs gnyis kyis gnyis spyod cing / / sbram lta bur sbyor bas shin tu brgyan// srid pa las sbrel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rang 'dod bkra shis sgra dang ni// hUM hUM brjod cing dril bu gsil/ rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ni//
186b6: snyi ka'i gnas su rab bzhag la// ma lus sems can kun gyi phyo'o// smon lam dag na gdab par bya// sems can thams cad da med cing // sems can thams cad bde gyur cog/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas
186b7: nyid dang 'phrad par shog/ margal ba rnams bskal ba dang // ma grol ba rnams bdag gis sgrol// de lta nyid du rjes brtse bas// rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// g.yon pa'i snying
186b8: kar bzhag par bya/ / g.yas pas la brkyang nas ni// de yi rog tu gshegs su gsol// oM ad ma tiSh+Tha hUM swA hA// de nas rang gis dbugs kyis ni// bdag gi lus la bstim par bya// skad cig tshul gyi rnal 'byor

187a1: gyis/ / bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya// oM sarba duSh+Ta gri h+Na gats+tsha hUM phaT/ se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yi// phyi rol lha rnams gshegs su gsol// gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye/
187a2: pa gsum pa'o// / bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis ljags kyu lnga pa brlab// dngos dang dngos med rnam par rtog/ gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos// gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar spang // A li kA li ji ltar lag
187a3: rnal 'byor bsta nu bcos tshul rnams ni/ / phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po'i rdo rje bdud ci'i chu// lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug/
187a4: reg na dro ba me yin te// du ba ltar snang rlung yin no// sla ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya// gzugs su snang bas yin no// ye shes byin brlabs rdo rje'o// lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya// ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni// zang
187a5: par bya ba me nyid dang / / de bzhin rtag tu rlung dang ni// ngang ba mtshungs don sa dbang po// ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga// sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya// de yi dbus su zla ba yi// dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o// lnga po lnga ru brjod
187a6: par bya/ / dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i// rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis// des ni gti mug bsrings pa yin// phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas bzang po// me yis btsos nas sbyangs pa ltar// lha sogs me yis btsos nas ni//
187a7: lhag ma bshang dang gci ba yin// me yis bcos nas sbyang me yi// dbus su sbyin bsreg rtag tu dbul// rdo rje chu yi sa bon ni// sabon babs pas bzlas nas kyang // de yi dbus su nyi ma la// dur khrod yi ge bsams nas bsreg/
187a8: dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir mongs las ring du 'gyur// pad ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug/ dri chu'i dbo shin tu rnam snang mdzad// byang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdiH// lha gsum rnam

187b1: gsus du ni shes par bya/ / ta zhes pa'i ba dag dbrog/ hanas pa yis dri gnom // sa yus nan la de lda pa gas nga dus rtse khya ba ste// mA ni rnam pa gsum du thags// dngos dang dngos med las rtsom
187b2: bab/ / de byer mongs pa ring du spongs/ A li bung ba zhes brjod de// bungadra ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin// A li nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te/ rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can/ lus ni ma
187b3: lus bskyed pa'o/ / bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa rnams nas// dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams// de yi dbus nas drangs nas su// A lali'i dbus su bim par 'gyur// 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis te// sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams
187b4: skye ba pan/ rlung dang me yi bdun don la// rdo rje ma yis pan sbyar// sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan// char ba'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod/ dbyangs yig dang po mchogs bon// de yi dbus su bzung bar bya// dngos dang das
187b5: maud las grol ba/ / de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// kA li me tog kun tu mnan// rdo rje can gyi lus me tog/ 'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste// sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya// ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir// de bzhin shes
187b6: rab chu srin la/ / gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus su ni// thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te// ban drug lhur kha bye ba// sbrang gi bdud rtsi yi ni gnas// kA li bdud ci de nyid ni// me ldog chu yi de bzhin bskor// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig
187b7: le dang / rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar// yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni// lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum// zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba// de phyir mongs/
187b8: ba kun tu spong // A li bung ba zhes byar brjod// kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// lus gnyis po las skyes pa dag/ bdud rtsi yi ni chog mchog/ sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa bzung ba

188a1: pa/ / dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// lu gu rgyud kyis bkri bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis// lus can bdag nyid dkru bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur// 'gro ba
188a2: sgon mthong 'gyur zhing / / dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par// bdud rtsi sbyor ba kun shes pas// rang dgar bdud rtsi myang bar bya// bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis// byung
188a3: du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ / blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni// rigs la 'dren dang reg 'gro dang // lcags kyu chen po rnal 'byor pas// shel dang 'dra bas longs spyod bya// rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni// de yis 'on gzung
188a4: bar bya/ / shel gyi sems kyis longs spyod na// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur// dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te// de yi yan lag la sbyar ba// hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis
188a5: ljags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya/ / gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni// gri zhes bya ba'i sa bon nyid// rab tu sbyang nas bsams nas su// rnam par rtog pa ring du spad // rta yi lugs kyu'i dbus gnas pa// thams cad rig pas
188a6: dged byag/ / rnal 'byor pa yis rje zhes pa// dag pa'i shel ltar bsam par bya// rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas// rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste// sri zhes bya ba bkod de bza'// rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo // bcu
188a7: bzhi pa dang bcwa lnga dang / / khyad par du ni ches brgyad la// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ rab tu'abang de gtor ma sbyin// sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bces la// rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas te/ spyod dang grol bag
188a8: 'dod dang / / las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang // myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar// mtheng brtsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbul po nor gyis

188b1: bongs pa yang/ khyim ni 'byor shing rgyas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i tshe narnal 'byor ba// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// dri zhim dang ni sbyor ba yi// rdzas bcupo dag ldan pa la// yi ge bcu yi sngags dag ni// phyag 'tshal bsreg
188b2: nga'i mtha' dang ldan/ / rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te// mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin rlabs la// sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug/ 'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// gur kum dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bdud
188b3: phan tshun ldan pa yi/ / rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya// skyes bu 'gro ba skal bzangs 'gyur// tsan dan dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdza bcud dag ni ldan pa yi// yan lag dag ni byugs nas su// reg na shi yang mi gtong ngo // dbang po
188b4: lag dang sbyar ba yi/ / rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru// bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na// dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas nas kyang // mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas// de dag las sa
188b5: sbyar bar bya/ / ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// gnyis med ded dpon gnas su ni// thig le byas na go char 'gyur// de nyid theg pa'i snying po 'dir// 'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzangs ma// sems
188b6: can rnams la sdug par lha/ / bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed ma// de bzhin sgeg pa'i nyams kyis mdzes// thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma// mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can// skal bzangs lha kun rmongs byed ma// kun nas 'dzer/
188b7: pa nyid dang ni/ blo ngan srid pa'i ngo bo 'joms// lha mo byams ma nyid dang ni// yid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grags ma// yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid// lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni// spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol// de ltar yon tan
188b8: ldan lnga mo/ / mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// po nya'i las kyi bya ba yis// grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni// bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal// pho nya'i las su sbyar ba yis// de nyid

189a1: ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/ / las rnams kun gyi snying po bas// rab tu 'bad de po nya bsgrub/ shing gcig gi ni drung dag tu// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas// khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi// thang ka la ni bri bya ste// 'theb sod/
189a2: bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis mgo bor thal sbyar ba'i// 'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri// sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas su// 'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam// dri dang me tog dmar po dang //
189a3: skam gyi ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha cod la sogs// nye bar sbyang ba'i gtor ma sbyin// rdzas lnga dag ni dngos po lnga// mchod nas de bzhin 'bum du bzlas// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nya dri ba snam// gsum par
189a4: shing ni mgul 'gyur te/ / bzhi pa la ni bdun du gnas// de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang // dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM d+he be sha ri hUM phu// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// spyi bor bzhag te brjod par bya// dam tshig
189a5: sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ / bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med par// byin gyis rlobs la bdag bsgrubs
189a6: shig/ de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas// bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang // gseng la sogs pa ci yang rung // bka' bzhin myur du ster bar 'gyur// thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad// 'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la
189a7: gal te grub par ma gyur na/ / de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla// sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis// 'bar byed ma yi spyi bo 'gems// sems can don 'bad sgrub pa pos// 'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya// grub pa'i mkha' 'gro
189a8: ma gzhan gyi/ / de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// thang ga khru gnyis dman pa la// mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te// de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya// dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs

189b1: shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ / phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// mig g.yo ha ha ra bzhad pa bri/ dur khrod kyi nis phyogs su/
189b2: bsgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram// kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni// me tig dmar la sogs pas mchod// me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ nye bar spyod pa'i tor
189b3: sbyin cing / / rnal 'byor sgom pas bzlas nas ni// 'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su// kha ru bcug nas band par bya// oM DA ki nI hUM phreM pu// sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//
189b4: dang pos ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa mdun du gad rgyangs sgrogs// gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas// bzhi pa la ni bka' lung nod// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni sgrub
189b5: pa yis/ / ci 'dod bka' ni bgo bar bya// dgra rnams gsad cing btse ba dang // yan lag gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i// las la sogs pa thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya// gal te 'bum gyis gnonaH
189b6: na/ / rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla// ra dag gi ni pags pa la// 'bad de zang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// lus
189b7: brgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / mdzes pa'i gas ni gyon pa bri// gson pa sdig mdzu bzhags pa dang // gams su dgrasta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi ma do med 'ong bar/ khas pa yi ni bsdub bya ste// snyi ba yis ni drug rgyas /
189b8: metag sa chags dgrab par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nyadang sha dang cang // bca' bdag dang sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin// 'bad de gnas pas

190a1: 'bras gagasas/ o ts+tsha shin ma kapa lam phu ba Ta// lagaganyis mnyas par sa nas de// sgrim pa'i tshul gyi gar baspyod bya// snying 'bregs dang byug bya'o// la byor pa yipa 'brang gas papa/
190a2: 'dib byed pa ni 'grub 'gyur te// nga ba khyi ni drang ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshan thogs nas// sdig pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bkye ba
190a3: stsol smra/ bdud ci lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so// de nas nyi ma re re bzhin// gser srang byed byed ster bar 'gyur// gal te/
190a4: 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying po gzir te zla// sa bon 'di yis gzingar tsam gyis// 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so// chu 'gram gyi nas phyogs su// kas po coni bsgrub par bya// ba la nga la sogs ko ba no// brkyang ste
190a5: 'phrog byed 'bri ru gzhug/ lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan pa te// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bsgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha ha bzhad cing rnam/
190a6: gtsigs pa// khrag gis maN Da la byugs nas ni// dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya// sha dang nya dang cor la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha
190a7: yi gtor ma sbyin/ / rnal 'byor pa ni bsgom zhing bzlas// 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs// ma nu rdo'i sgra byin cing/ gsum par thog ni 'ab 'gyur te/ zhi ba la ni dun du gnas//
190a8: bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM kaM kr-I truM pra phaT/ lag gnyis la tshung bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni/ ci zhig

190b1: bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur/ te se gangs kyi rtse ni// phyir khyod kyis khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'od ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang drung / 'dod pa de khrid de shog/ gsar dang dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang
190b2: bcung dang bgob ni/ / de ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te'od/ lha ma'i chung ma gang yang rung // ti se gangs kyi rtse rba ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma gruban// las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag
190b3: nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mnan te lnga brgya bzlas nas ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te nges kyang ma 'grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su
190b4: bkug nas ni/ / dum bur dram bu ragatub par bya// kre zhes bya dang bsod pa mtha'// hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma 'ang // gal te
190b5: ma 'grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ / bstan pa'i las kyis mgrub na// b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing // me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi ma phyed na hU~M zhes ni// brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad ba sreg sa // mkha'
190b6: 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ba'am/ / tshengs 'debs shing 'ongs nas su// nges par las rnams sgrub byed par// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste// khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen gces bcings bI/
190b7: dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste// bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir// dpa' bos gnang gi gtang du gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi tshigs dbus su// bzang po sgo 'di phye ste thod// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che// gsang
190b8: dang gsang bas shes bya ba/ / gang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de//

191a1: sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// g+ho g+hA/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yi// gu g+hu mthe bong 'chir bar byed pa yi// 'jig byed ma yi mtshan ma'o//
191a2: mo g+ha/ lag pa rna bar rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu g+hA/ sna rtser skyur mo rdebs pa ni// thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// DaSh+Ta/ sha ba'i mgo ltar stod byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// 16
191a3: d+he de/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa// da yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'chir byed pa// lus nad gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// bak+Sha so// lag pa sma la 'ju byed pa// khyod kyi khyim du ngas byin pa'o//
191a4: dwer ti/ lag pa snying kar reg byed na// da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o// ru rtsa ba ta ba/ sna cer bu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shun+na ta/ lag pa brkyang te lhor rdebs na// phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o// bab+hU Shi sha lte ba
191a5: dra ni nyid byed na/ / kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o// tsan da li ka mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na// zhe gnag gtum la drag pa yin// ni la tan ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni nga la ston// a neg pa dang /
191a6: lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag/ de ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o// dur ka ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// tshe grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ha ra ga na/ tshes cig nas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yi ge la
191a7: sogs pa/ / sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du reg/ gi ri to// steng du lta bar byed pa ni// nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o// sa mtsha ya/ 'dzum dang bcas pas lta byed cing // lag pa lag pas bzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston
191a8: byed pa/ / nor bzangs byin zhes bya ba'o// dz+r-i na ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// sa ba ta ba ta/ mthe bong gi ni srin lag la// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// so ma// mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs// su ra ba da/ rnal

191b1: 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya dang brda'i mtshan nyid do/ / gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // mtshon cha'i mtshan nyid gzhan dag ni// bcom ldan 'das
191b2: lanyan par mtshal/ / de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu// shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// 'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dang po de nyid rdo rje ni// dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o// bsgyur ba'i 'phreng
191b3: ba gsum pa ste/ / ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// de nyid bzhi yirba rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol sgrol// dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad// thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa// lce yi rtse mor rin chen
191b4: 'byung/ / nub du snang ba mtha' yas dgod// byang gi phyogs su don yod grub// rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so// pad ma byang chub yan lag brgyad// ji bzhin sa ru bzhag par bya// phyag na pa dam byams pa dang // nam mkha'
191b5: dang ni kun tu bzang / / gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid// shar la sogs par de bzhin bsam// dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru// ye shes lnga ni thim pas
191b6: bya/ / pad ma brgyad pa lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin du// zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste// de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag/ de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin// mtshams/
191b7: kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir// mkhas pa yis ni bas ma bya ba// skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang // rdo rje lcags srog ming chen de// gzhan gyis ma thub zhes bya ste// mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod// rtse mo lngalda na maN+Da
191b8: 'gro ma/ / snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ste// nub du de bzhin ro langs ma/ lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de kho na yi

192a1: lha/ / mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// cha gsum gsal bar bzung ba la// ske rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan// ud dpal ku mu da ltar mdzes// rin chen pad ma yang dag gnas// phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang /
192a2: ni// dbu ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgra// rtse mo dgu yi lha nyid de// lha dgra yis ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las ni byung ba ni// rtse mo 'od zer zla bar gnas// rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba// ye shes rdo rje 'gro bsgol// rdo rje
192a3: nyid gang yin pas/ / bdag nyid rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsam// rdo rje snying po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje yi na sems su bya// rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas// chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med// thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin// rdo rje las
192a4: kyi snying po'o/ / rdo rje 'phro ba sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje 'khor bsgrol bar byed// rdo rje 'gugs pa sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje bcis pa'i sbyor bar ldan// bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan// rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni// ye shes
192a5: rdo rjes bcom nas su/ / phyogs kun du ni snang bar byed// rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun// rdo rje'i bdag nyid lta bar bya// chos kyi 'ching ba rdo rje ste// thar pa mchog 'bang rdo rje'o// rdo rje pad ma gzung nas ni// de nyid thams cad
192a6: bsgrub par bya/ / rdo rje pang mor zhugs pa ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dril bu yin mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// shes rab sgra yi de nyid ni// thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i// nam mkha'
192a7: khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ / byang chu rtsa rting par rnam par gan/ thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu// gnas pa'i 'jig rten khams mthar thug/ phyogs brgyad ces ni bya ba rnams// lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags// yi ge brgyad kyis
192a8: bon ni/ / phyags brgyad du ni dgod par bya// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// byang gi phyogs su gos dkar mo// nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/ lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan// mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang // bzhi pa rdo rje

192b1: 'breng ba mo/ / dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes// pad ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung // gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni// shes rab dud rtsi bum pa 'dra// shes rab bdud rtsi gan
192b2: dgal/ / de yi dbus kyi stan dag la// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas// steng gi pad ma rdo rje rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste// thams cad
192b3: dang srung pa po'o/ / A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis// phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya// A li kA la'i rab sbyar bar/ 'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste// rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin te/ thabs kyis rdo rje'i dbus gnas so// g.yas par nyim
192b4: bsams nas su/ / g.yon pa ru ni zla ba dgad// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// pad ma'i rnam pa lag tu bskor// lus rnams lini thabs dang sbyar// rang 'dod lha rnams bsam par bya// rdo rje gso rabs sgrol ba ste//
192b5: 'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung // hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya// rdo rje gsor bas mdzes pa yis// sems can thams cad mdzes par bya// rna mthar chos su bya ba ste// rdo rje shin tu snying
192b6: po mchog/ oM badz+ra gan d+he he hUM/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha ra ni ta pra hiHsarba bud d+ha pra tsa li te// pra dz+nyA ba ra mi tan da swa b+ha be na badz+ra d+ha ra hri da ya a bsan d+ho Sha ni// hUM hUM hUM/ gaho ho/ a a a swA hA// shes rab thabs kyi gzug
192b7: brnyan gyis/ / shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya// shes rab thabs kyi chos kyi ni// 'gro ba rnams kyis rtogs bya'am// mi shes 'dam du bying ba 'i/ sams can den phyir dkrol bar bya// rdo rje de kho na yis bzung /
192b8: kyi dril bu dgrol bar bya// sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas// shes rab thabs su lta bar bya// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// glang chen dril bu'i sgra dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi// dngos grub ring bar

193a1: shes par bya/ / de nas gsang dang pra ba yi// rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung ba ste// yang dag chog gang gis ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa// dbu ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la// gsang ba'i rdo rje cha gsum bya// de nyid kyis
193a2: nicha cig gis/ / phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag/ spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa// rtag tu dag byed khu tshur bcad// slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog/ bgrang 'phreng la sogs bzung
193a3: ba ni/ yang dag ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med// shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang // gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs// zhi sogs las la khyad par bgyi// bgrang phreng gi ni
193a4: khyad nyid ni/ / gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // pad ma sa bon khyad par du// rgyas pa yi ni bgrang phreng ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya// gur kum la sogs dri zhim pa'i// dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las// ril bung
193a5: byas te dmar por btsos/ / dbang du bdud par rab tu grags// ru nA ga shag dang lung tang dang // mi yi rus pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la// bo taM tse ni wa
193a6: kun byed/ / sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste// dbang la de yi byed du bya// zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te// rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o// mngon spyod la ni drug bcu'o// las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar// las kyi bye brag ji bzhin du/
193a7: bgrang phreng dag ni rtag par bya// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad du ni// dbu ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// lha dgu yi ni skud pa la// lha dgus byin gyis brlab par bya// gzugs rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang // gtsang
193a8: shing dang ldan snyan par smra/ / de yis bkal ba'i bgrang phreng gis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// skud pa rnams ni sangs rgyas tshul// ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom yin// 'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan// steng ma

193b1: chos kyi dbyings yin no/ / mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o// lag par nyi ma bsams nas su// dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni// lag pa yi ni dbus dag tu// dmar po la ni dmar por bsgom// g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni// bdud rtsi'i
193b2: yi ge bsam bya ba/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// g.yas pa'i ser mo rdo rjer bsam// g.yon pa pad ma'i 'dab mar bsgom// rdo rje pad ma sbyor ba yis// kha sbyor dbus su phreng bzhag
193b3: 2/ / de nyid thams cad bsgoms pa yis// bgrang phreng byin gyis brlab par bya// sor mo dag gi bye brag gis// de nas sngags pas bzlas par bya// rdo rje ma dngos g.yon pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o// dkar po dung pa dung dang ni/
193b4: pad ma g.yas kyi sor me ste// gi wang dri gsum 'jib pa dang // sa gdugs g.yon par dgod pa dang // ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis// lag la sogs pa'i las can ma// zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang // rgyas pa la ni gung ma
193b5: ste/ srin lag la ni dbang du bstun// mtha' mar mngon par spyod pa ste// mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni// lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas bsgoms na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nyid
193b6: med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ / de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang // de nyid med pa'i rdo ji dri la// phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba// rnal 'byor pa yis grub pa med// rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni// de nyid thams cad kun bya'o// yi ge rgyal
193b7: byung ba'i dngos/ / sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzlas na// rnal 'byor ma yi snying po 'grub// bram ze rgyal rigs dmar rigs gcig/ rnal 'byor ma yi drab 'grub// oM pa de pa de ma hA da dz+nyA na
193b8: sarba bud d+ha ma hA b+ha ge hUM hU hA/ he he ho// a swA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas nas// bgrang phreng gi ni lha rnams 'grub// las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/ mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur// ye shes de da

194a1: brag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon// ye shes bye brag ring du gnas// thun mong ye shes brjod pa ste// dman dang rab dman dman pa can// gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lto 'phye
194a2: dang ni mi 'am ci/ / mi dang yi dgas mkha' 'gro ma// dmyal bar 'tshod pa'i sems can dang // byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste// phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin du ni sa yi khams// bstan
194a3: pa de nyid thams cad dang / / rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang // bod pa rdo dang brag la sogs// thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs// ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur// ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o// ye shes thar par gang
194a4: gis ni/ / ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu// lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha yi gnas// gong nas gong du nyis 'gyur te// 'dod pa lnga yi ye shes
194a5: dag/ gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel// gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste// lha min ye shes khro ba'o// yi dgas ye shes zhen pa ste// dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing du// byol song ye shes glen pa ste// brtan pa
194a6: rnams ni sems med pa'o/ / mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga// bye brag du ni shes par bya// glen pas sgribs dang lkugs pa dang // bud med ye shes slu brid do// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ rnal
194a7: 'byor bstan bcos kyis sbyangs pa/ / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas// 'bad de dad pas bskyed par bya// sgra sgrogs phyi rol bstan bcos ni// gang
194a8: gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa ste/ / blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob// snying po snying po bstan bcos te// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye

194b1: bdang po'o/ / // 'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang // bsrung dang mngon par spyod pa dang // re mig dgu sogs 'khor lo ni// phyi rol mu khyud bskor/
194b2: bar bya// 'khor los las kyi kha dog gis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ sa bon de dag thams cad ni// phyag 'tshal tha ma dbus su bya// dbus bu ming dang bsrung ba yis// tshig
194b3: kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ / mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus// bdag gi lus ni bkru bar bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas// bsrung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// ye shes can gyis bsrung bsgom
194b4: 'jigs pa kun las ring bar 'gyur/ / sems can dngos po med pa ru// sbyor ba'i dngos pos 'jigs pa la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya// sgrol ma'i rgyud du
194b5: bsgoms pa yis/ / bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul// oM tA re swA hA// mgo la'o// oM tut+tA re swA hA// mig la'o// oM tu re swA hA/ sA la'o// oM tu swA hA/ rna ba la'o// oM re swA hA/ lce la'o// oM tA re ni swA hA/
194b6: snying khang // yan lagadrug tu rtag tu dgod// 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bya ba// zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni klubs// kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang //
194b7: gzhan gyi sna drang ud pal bsdams// thams cad 'od zer rnams bsgoms nas// khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya// thams cad yon tan can du bsgom// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// bsrung ba'i las thams cad
194b8: kyi sngags so/ / rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang // nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang // yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni// chu dang dug gis mchi la sogs// gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas// de dang der ni bsam

195a1: bar bya/ / shes zhan dang lel sogs// 'khar la bris nas bcad par bya/ bsrung ba zang ba 'di yis ni// 'jigs pa kun las thol bar 'gyur/ srung ba 'di dag thams cad na/ de nyid sbyor bas sgrub par ga/ ba sa
195a2: 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ / phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su// dbus su thog ma tha ma ste// bzlas pa thams cad bzhag par bya// mu khyur dbyangs kyis bskor nas su// 'khor lo dkar po bsam par bya// yan lag thams cad bye ba yis// mnyam
195a3: nyid stong par bsams nas su/ / sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgoms pa yis// las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur// oM pra dz+nyA pra dz+nye ma hA pra dz+nye hUM swA hA// 'od zeras
195a4: tshogs 'bar bas su/ / dngos po bsgom pas bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab bdag nyid bsgoms nas su// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
195a5: klubs/ / kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar// shes rab dngos po bsgoms nas su// sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// glen dang snyoms las blun po yang // sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel//
195a6: snying po re'u mig dgu ru bya// de bzhin bar ma bcu gnyis te// phyi rol re'u mig bcu drug go/ mthar thug mu khyud de bzhin ste// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i// dbus su bdag gi sems bzhag la// sgra dang thig le ldan pa/
195a7: yi yi ge brgyad po snying por bgod// bcu gnyis po la dbyangs sa bon// ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya// sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams// yi ge lhag ma gcig dang bcas// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag/ bcu drug gnas su bzhag par bya//
195a8: gsod pa'i yi ge mu khyud la// thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor// dang po dkar por bsam bya ste// gnyis pa ser por bsgom par bya// gsum pa dag ni dmar po ste// de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po'o// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa

195b1: yig/ / mnyam nyid stong par yang dag gnas// mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su// 'khor lo 'di ni bsgom par bya// mnyam bzhag dngos po bsgoms pa yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste//
195b2: le ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad bsreg par byed// ye shes 'khor lo bsgom pa yis// kun nas nyon mongs g.yog pa la// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su
195b3: bdag nyid mamapa' gos byas pa/ / da per sna tshogs 'bar ba gi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba skasam par bya// de nyid dbus sus bon ni// sakhas pa yis ni gzung b+hU ste// sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i// mi ga dang po gdung nas su/
195b4: lcags kyu yi ni gzir bya ba// rtsa bar reb sbyar bya ba// bdud rtsi'i thig le'i steng du dgod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od zer sna tshogs 'gro ba ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal po rgyal po'i bcwa
195b5: dang / / yid can gyis ni bsam par bya// yi ge gnyi sa 'gyur thigs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du sdang // bu mo rnams kyis gang bsams pa// ming dang bcas nas
195b6: bsgrubs nas ni/ / bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad ni// sngar bzhin du ni stong pa nyid// thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
195b7: gnas par/ / bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mor bcas// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro// 'od zer ser po shin tu mdzes// gzugs sdug 'od zer 'gro bar rabasam// rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa// thams cad rang gi dbus
195b8: kyis dgug/ sgrub pa po yi lus la ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya// kha dog la sogs dmar bsam zhing // gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por

196a1: bsgom/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni//
196a2: yid ni 'gugs pa bsgom par bya// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgoms pa yis// mdzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thigs pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag
196a3: gcag gis dbang du 'grub/ / de lhur bsgom zhing zlas nas su// sor mo yang ni bskyod byas na// bsgrub byo'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo 'dab ma med pa la// mu khyud kyis
196a4: ni bskor bar bya/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// mu khyud mkhas pas bskor bar bya// sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa gzung nas su// i dang re pha sbyar nas su// 'bad pas dbus su bzhag nas bya// ye shes can
196a5: gyi sa bon 'di/ / sgra yi bdun pa dang sbyar la// 'dab ma rnams la de nyid bya// 'dab mar 'di nyid bzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub 'dod pas// 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// sngon
196a6: bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru/ / sngar bstan bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi// gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/
196a7: thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yon pa 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' sbyar ste// de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas pa yis// rgyas pa'i sgor ba 'grub par
196a8: 'gyur/ / lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor gyis// rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu// rnam bzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong pa'i de nyid bsgoms nas su//

196b1: kyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa bdakyil 'khor bzhes par bzlab dpal 'a'ang pas gnas papa// legs rnam zhes dngangos pa sgo// 'a la brgyad pa'i 'kha la te// dbus sus pan bsgoms nas su//
196b2: rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya// phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi ba zhi// gug bskyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la yang // sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// ba'i
196b3: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus lo bsgom par bya// gang 'dod yid ni rtogs bya'i phyir// de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya// 'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med
196b4: pas/ / dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// rmugs dang glen dang snyom las dang // shes rab zhan cing lta ngan rnams// rnal 'byor pa yi skad cig la// snyom las la sogs ring du spong // mnyam gzhag cung rnga bltas nas su//
196b5: rdul bran dkar po spro bar bya// phyogs bcur song ste khyab nas ni// thams cad rim pas kun snang bya// ye shes sems las bltas nas ni// rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su//
196b6: mnyam bzhag 'khor lor lta bar bya// mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bsgrol bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sa bon gyis bsgral te// pad ma'i gdan la babum/
196b7: ba yis// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// snying ka'i phyogs su 'char ba mdzad// kha dog dgas
196b8: po mdzes pa yi/ / 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro// spro ba sna tshogs mi zad pas// sems can khams ni sgrol bar mdzad// shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba// dbyangs yig

197a1: dang po mtshogs pan/ / mtha' du che gdag sbyar bar ma/ ga 'tshal bsreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan/ sa bon 'di ni skams nas su// mnyam bzhag dang sa ba sra sa nas ni/ byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur/ sbyor ba'i
197a2: gdan gyis rab tu byed pa las rim par bye ba gnyis pa'o/ / / byin parlabs sbyor ba'i dbo dag/ gang gis sems can rnams la bstan// byin rlabs rim pa ji lta bu/ lha las gzigs monyan par 'tshal// sems can
197a3: nonos pa gso ba'i phyir/ / byin gyis brlob pa'i chos bstan pa// yang dag 'khor bsgrol ba yi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// snying dkar zla ba bsams nas su// hU~M gis bon dbus su bsam// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal/
197a4: nyi ma'i dbus su bzhag par bya// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// me'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis// kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid bstan
197a5: ba yi/ / rang gi stong pa nyid du bya// ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// gya gyu phyag na rdo rje ste// lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no// mgo dang bum pa byas/
197a6: paste// steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni// 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba po// 'jig rten gsum gyi grub 'dod na// sa bon de ni bsgom par bya// pad ma'i gdan la gnas pa yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su// ye shes
197a7: mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du/ / bdag nyid ye shes kyis bsrung ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// steng gi rdo rje cod pan la// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan//
197a8: kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// rdo rje dbyug pa gug bskyed bcas//

197b1: rnam gas pas // b+hag sa sa ma pa nga / dus / gags pa thasanams sa sa ga 'i mas kyi lagadums rnams / du lnga dang ldan pa la/ bcad brgya
197b2: bzlas par bya/ / cho gar ldan pas sbyin par bya// de yi modo la 'bab par 'gyur// babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rdo rje gru ni blang bar bya// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// zhan dang drag pa sbyor ba yis// thams cad kun nas
197b3: khyed kyis gsol/ / skad cig 'khor las bdag mnyam bsgral// glu 'di yis zhi gar byed de// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// oM tiSh+Tha yi ge ma hA kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA// 'di ni tshim bya thams cad bya// rnal 'byor ma kun bstan
197b4: bar bya/ / dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la// de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya// a yo ga a be sha ya// shin du mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// 'di yi sngon du bsnyen par bya// gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa yis
197b5: yungs dkar dang / / hU~M gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis// sgrub pa po yis 'dis gdab bya// sngar gyi spros pa'i sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed// oM man g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+histi tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yis
197b6: 'bum zlas na/ / bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur// mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi// mthong bar byas te gar byed do// oM ma la ma la hU~M phaT// 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur te// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs
197b7: bar 'gyur/ / oM ma hA tsi li tsi li hU~M hU~M bru~M phaT// bus phrag cig ni bzlas pa yis// skyes sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs/ oM ba ta li ba ti la~M hUM bkra/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du na// bzlas pas sngon du bstan pa bya/
197b8: yi dgas 'byung po gsang ba sogs// lha rnams thams cad 'bebs par byed// oM pa ta na pa ta ni hUM phaT// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig/ bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// chu dang bong brngo dang ni// shing

198a1: rnams kun la 'bebs par byed/ / dkyil 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis// sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// shin tu dul zhing brtags pa yis// de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam// lha ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag /
198a2: nyid la ni tse'i dri yin// oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M g+h+raM pra thA phaT// thal bar lan bdun par du ni// mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor// nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang// cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro// oM phu ru pA ru/ ma~M tre dzaHhU~M phu phaT/
198a3: skud pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru// yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yi// gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na// lce sbyar shin tu 'khyam par 'gyur// skud pa dang ni bral gyur na// bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin du byed// byin brlabs rim pa'i
198a4: rnal 'byor gyis/ / mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom zhing bzlas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// 'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// rlung gi dkyil
198a5: 'khor dbus gnas par/ / mngon du bsgrub par bya bar bsam// rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni// sa bon stan tu bsgom par bya// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni// rlung gi sa bon dbus gnas par// rlung gis bskor ba snying khar bzhag/ tham
198a6: cad kha dog sngon por bsam/ / rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi// rlung gi brda ru sbar bar bya// oM yu pre ta b+ha yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT// rnal 'byor pa'i gsang sngags 'di// brgyad brgyar bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro ba la sogs
198a7: bzung nas sa/ / dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya// rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas su// thams cad gnas nas bri bar bya// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yis// skud pa dmar pos dkris nas ni// shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya//
198a8: rlung gis spur bar bsgom pa ste// gang du rlung ni gzhol 'gyur ba// de yi phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis bskrad pas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje /

198b1: kha' thos bsams te// bdag gi lus ni noms nas su/ blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas pa// gnyis me dag pa'i gter mni// de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra nA ki ni shas A ka la ya A ka la ma d+hi bri zang/
198b2: a la dmang por dbugs nas ni// seng ldeng pur bab rgyad kyis gdag/ dbus su meng ni bris nas sa// gtor ma yongs su gang par ldan// da pa dmang la bzlas nas kyang // lan bdun paskor bas drang bar bya// rdo rje lpags rnas
198b3: drangs nas su/ / gsang sngags 'dis ni bzlas byas na// dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas// las 'dis zlogs nas 'gugs par 'gyur// maN+Da Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu// las 'das 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// nyi ma'i
198b4: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / mkha' 'gro drog sor bsam bya ba// rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// nya mo gcig ni bzung nas su// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlag/ sngagra
198b5: dang bcas pa'i ming bris la/ / nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni// rka pas mgo ni rab gnan la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// oM prA pru a mu ka s+ya/ mu kha~M b+han d+ha ban d+ha/ hri hri hri/ praM phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// bya ba thams cad/
198b6: bcing bar 'gyur// thams cad chu la bya ba ste// las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya// sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni// bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya// gang du nya ni gnas pa yi// nya yi kha ru gzhug par bya// mkha' 'gre'i gtor ma
198b7: byin brlabs te/ / ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni// lan re bzlas te zar bcug na// bya ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag nyid tsan+d+ra li yi gzugs// gzugs rnams tham
198b8: cad yongs rdzogs shing / / me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// de yi dbus su rab tu bya// lcibs pad ma'i gzugs byas pa// ming dang sngags kyis bzhag par bya// oM stam b+ha ya

199a1: stam b+ha ya trAM/ / b+ha ga nag mu trabru phruM paT// gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas su// lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// chung ma shin tu
199a2: g.yon can rnams/ / las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya// mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis// bkrus nas bcings pa las grol 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes//
199a3: 'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar// yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhugs// ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma
199a4: las ni de ru byas nas kyang / / 'bras phye la sogs khyad par las// pad ma'i dbyibs ni byas nas su// khyi yi spu yis dgang ba drabya// ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// las der byin
199a5: gyis brlab par bya/ / oM kr-i d+he shA ri pu phuM phaT// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// rdo rje gsang bar gzhug par bya// las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis// b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur// las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste//
199a6: byung na de las thar bar 'gyur// chung ma shin tu gdul dka' ba// las ni de ltar sbyang bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom// rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su// bdud rtsi'i chu ni
199a7: 'dzeg par bya/ / ban d+ha'i mi tog rgyas pa yi/ dbus su lpags kyu yi ge ste// kha dog dmar mo shin tu 'bar// gas zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya// khro bo'i sa rim rtse mor// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// songs
199a8: 'di las bskyod par bya/ / skyong ba gsum ni bsams pa pa'i// de yid bus kyi gnas rnams su/ bdud rtsi'i tshuni 'dzag par bya// rdung sa shin du gdul dka'a'// 'di yis b+hag brtag par bya// 'ad zer can dang bla ma ngag/

199b1: smyo byed yan lag lnga dang bcas// gu gul chen po'i cha dang bsre// mar nag chen pos bskor bar bya// sngags pas bdud rtsi'i chu dang ni// lce yi dbang pos myang bar bya// 'dir ni spro 'gyur the tshom med// mar zos pas ni grol ba
199b2: 'gyur/ / yi dgas gos ni ma lhung bas// mar me yi ni sdong bu bya// klu dbang gi ni gong du bzung // rkang gis mar gyis spar bar bya// gtor ma yi ni gnas dag tu// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying sngags kyis// du ba dag ni dbab par bya//
199b3: dur khrod du ni gtor byin la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung // kang la du babyugs pa des// mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar 'gyur// lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis gzung la// dur khrod kyi
199b4: ni sol ba yis/ / tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni// bya rog sgro rtswa sa pra bir bya// oM ki ri ki ri kri d+h+ye a mu she phruM bruM phaT// snod na gnyis la so so ru// gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bri la// gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni//
199b5: khro bos bkar te drung par bya// oM ka li bar ta li ba ra tA la kro d+ha mu khe a mu ka s+ya hi li hi li badz+ra tiSh+Tha mu khi buM phreM br-i phaT// brgya phrag gcig tu zlas nas ni// myur du 'thab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis med gtor mar
199b6: ldan pa yi/ / dbang bsku rab ni zhi bar 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyis rab tu dbye ba las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste// gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin// sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi
199b7: pa/ / rol mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal// gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ so sor gzung ba'i de kho na// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang // chos kyi dril bu lha mo go'i sbyor sbyor ba
199b8: phyag rgya ste/ / thabs ni de ru thim pa'o// dang po re re shig rnal 'byor bas/ rdo rje thal mo dam bcings nas// mes can kun la rjes rtse bas// dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud d+ho ha// oM badz+ra

200a1: shud d+ha sarba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho ha/ / oM yo ga shud d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga shud d+ho ha// gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas// sbyin pa'i rabs sbyid par bya// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// thams cad rtsa
200a2: bzhin lta bar bya/ / sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 'gro rnams brtse bar mi bya sogs// sems can don ni dgag mi bya// steng du tshul khrims dra ba'o// gzhan la gnod pa 'gog la sogs// bzod pa'i phur bu'og/
200a3: tu gdab// phur bu rab dra ba yis// sdang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad// bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur// rang gi sems ni bsdams pa'o// rang gi rang sems btul ba na// bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur// mnyam nyid sems
200a4: kyi dri yis ni/ / gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya// lus la ste 'jog tsan dan 'jug/ sems ni mnyam par bzhag pa ste// bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas// 'bang dang ldan pas dgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis// rang
200a5: bzhin dag pas bdug par bya/ / shes rab mar me'i snang ba ste// khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// par me 'di yis bcom nas su// ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis// dbugs ma phyin pa
200a6: dbugs dbyung bya/ / mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du// gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su// bdag nyid rdo rjer skyed nas ni// shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul// bar du khru gang
200a7: bzhag nas su/ / mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya// snying kar hUM ni bsgom byas la// thams cad rig pas kun stong bya// khams gsum zad par byas nas ni// thams cad nam mkhar yang dag gnas// sngon bzhin po tshan nyid yang dag
200a8: ldan/ / mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// pho brang yangs par ci 'dod pa// ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya// lhani nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// rdo rje sngon du bstan pa bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// hUM gi thig le las byung ba//

200b1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi g.ye rdo rje bsgoms nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du// bdag gi lus ni sprul pa bya// yi ge'i dgod pas bkod nas su// mkhas pas go cha byas nas hUM// sangs rgyas lnga yis
200b2: brgyan pa ste/ / gangs dang kun zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// brgyad rnams kun gyis klubs paste// phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna
200b3: tshogs 'bar ba la/ / sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro// dngos po bsgom pa bsgoms nas su// hUM gi sgra yis dgang bar bya// rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis// ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya// gtso ma'i gser ltar shin/
200b4: tu 'bar// sems can kun gyi don la chags// de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag nyid can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams/
200b5: kyis// dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par spro// de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung
200b6: bcas/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog cung zad 'dres pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni// yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya// phyag gnyis phyag rgya
200b7: chen po ste/ / go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// A li kA li las byung ba'i// de yi sa bon bzlas par bya// 'dod chags sems ni stobs kyis ni// gtsom gser gyi 'od dang bcas// sems can sgral phyir kun tu 'byud//
200b8: ru ma mkhyud cing zhal gnyis 'jig/ rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni// bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni// kun nas bdud

201a1: rtsi gang gnas pa/ / mdzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur// gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su// shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyed// rol pa'i stobs kyis lha ma ni//
201a2: rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs kyis mnan// dril bu g.yon gyi rlung gnon pa// nus lag pa gnyis kyis gzir// sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can de// 'og mas gnon po gtsi bar ba// dril bu lag gnyis gsang bar sbreb/
201a3: bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas// shar phyogasu ni skyong ba yis// sems can pha rol sgrol ba yis// lha mo g.yon pa bskyong nas su// lho ru kha ni blta bar ba// rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su// rkang mthil gnyis ni de bzhin brtsi//
201a4: dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis ni// rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang // de bzhin gsang bar rtse bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni// yang dang yang du sprad par bya// sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis// lho
201a5: phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur/ / rub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis// lha mo nub du blta bar bya// rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis// g.yas kyi brlab ni mnan par bya// 'grin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis 'khyud de// dril
201a6: bu'i lcen bskyod nas su/ / rdo rje lce la reg par bya// de bzhin sbyar nas gnyi ga bzlas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bsdam pa'o// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang // rna ba'i drung bar gzugs par bya/
201a7: gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas// de'i bdud rtsi btung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// sems can thams cad bde gyur gcig/ kun kyang mtshe ba med par shog/ gang gi lam nas
201a8: 'gro ba yis/ / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang // skad cig tshul gyis phyag brgya can// kun nas kun tu skad cig te// skad cig gis ni gsang sngags 'don// dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis//

201b1: mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de// rang nyid lha mor bsam par bya// slar yang 'di nyid rab tu bya// rang gi rjes su chags pa'i sems// de nas rdo rjes kun tu mthu/
201b2: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru// ka ra nar bcas bsam par bya// rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag ces brjod// chu las byung ba'i me tog ni// bsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las// rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste// ban duka/
201b3: ni rgyas pa 'dra// thod ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams// sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no// 'og tu chu yi rang bzhin la// myu gu me yi sa bon no// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje
201b4: can/ / lcags kyu la sogs pa yi bkri// lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su// sa yi nang du thim par bya// dus me'i yi dgas mer sbyor cing // yi dgas me dang dus me basbyor// lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba// mtheb chung mthe
201b5: bos mnan nas su/ / gsum po dag ni rtse mor sbyor// phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsugs nas// bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// gnon pos 'og ma btsir bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas// dril bu'i bdud
201b6: brtsi bskul bar bya/ / g.yon gyi cha na ban du ka/ chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can// chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la// der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni// rang bzhin
201b7: mnyam pa'i tshul du bya/ / thod ka la sogs gnas kun tu// de nas sor mo gdab par bya// de nas rdo rje'i rtse mo ni// phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya// gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni// rdo rje pad mo bskul bar bya// hUM gi sgra yis bkang
201b8: nas su/ / lha mo thams cad tshim par bya// dril bu yi ni dngos po yisi// A li sa bon kun tu sbyin// ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse// bdag nyid lha ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje dril bu lus yin te// phyag rgya kha sbyor sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dril

202a1: phyag tu yang / / de 'on mam nas sa gcu// rdo rje de lanas bskyed pa/ dril bur dag la bar bya/ dza rje dris par basbyor te// phyag rgya 'di nyid stong ba yin/ lus ni gnyis ga mnyes pa yis/ ma
202a2: can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur/ / gnyi ga yo ni bdag nyid sems// chung byin gyis porlab par bya// sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste// bde ba'i sman la 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rol pa'i rkang paste// dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis
202a3: rolo/ / lag g.yon 'khyud cing num bzung // g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor bar bya// bzhad cing khro dang bgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// dril bu skyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// brla'i stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa gay+ra
202a4: pas dkris nas ni/ / dgu yi gnas su bzhag par bya// mgrin par gcig gis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon pas dril bu gsil bar bya// ngo tshar bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spang bar bya// de nas rdo rjeg
202a5: blang zhing / / sna tshogs hUM zhes bya bar 'dod// bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su// slar yang glu ni byung bar bya// 'khor lo stong pa snying po med pa ni// snying po dag ni shin tu bsags pa ste// rnam par thar pas rab tu bsngal
202a6: ba/ ngas las rnam par thal bar btu 'grug/ can byud bar myur byas pa// de la ba dan ni yang dag byed par 'gyur/ 'bar ba'i snying ba dgan med pa la// rnal 'byur ma yi dbus su rung po bcug
202a7: dril bu'i sbyar bcas pas/ / de nas de ltar klu thang bya// mnyam bzhig skom zhing bzlas pa yis// 'thub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// las ni gang zhig bsams pa rnams// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
202a8: sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams// bskyed pa'i sbyor bar ldan pa / khur kum dang ni gI wang dang / kar sbrang rtsib la sha/ yung ba ru ta cha mnyam pa/ sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya// rdzas de dag ni bskams nas su/

202b1: rtag tu thig le byas gyur na// rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas// thams cad du ni dga' bar 'gyur// dbang po lag dang ru rta dang // rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma// bdag gi lnga dang yan lag lnga// lnga po thams cad cha mnyams la// bza' dang
202b2: btung dang so rtsi dang / / zhin du btags te sbyar la sbyin// thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te// 'chi ba na yang stong mi 'gyur// khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub// sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis//
202b3: 'gro ba thams cad mongs par 'gyur// bdag gi lus la gshegs gsol ba// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya// sems can don phyir blo ldan pas// thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos
202b4: zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur/ / rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos// rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar bar bya// rje rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis// dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya// lham mkhan shan pa nyab mos// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags
202b5: klo gdol po tshon mkhan pas/ / skyer ba'i dngos grub pashad pa yin// de bas ba pa thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya// gzhan yang rkang stabs bci bya// sems can bskal pa'i gnas yin te/
202b6: gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bstod// de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya sa pa// mnyam pa'i rkang skabs dang // dbye ba'i skabs dang // zlum pa'i skabs dang / gsum gnan pa'i skabs dang / ru sbrul gyi skabs dang / g.yas btung ba dang /
202b7: g.yon brkyang dang // gnas gcig pa dang // 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang / rgya mtsho rlob pa dang / ri bo dpung pa dang / sa rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang / mnyam du
202b8: gnas pa dang / / dus kyi me dang snying po dang // dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu sdu ba'o// rkang stabs bskyod pa bcwa brgyad ni// mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor pa yis/

203a1: hA// shi 'a pa dang / kA bA r+b+ha ga d+hA we ba'i tshul dang / rna ma'i tshul dang / gnyig bza' ba dang / byed kyis 'byung pa dang / ga da ga 'ashegs sus da/
203a2: ga mas di lud ni// na ni pand cing theg pa dag gan nyi sdogs ldan pa yis/ de 'is las rnams 'grub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ de kho na yis so sor bzung // gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na// dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'grub/
203a3: rdo rje'ang dril bu dang bral na// rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // nyin me zla bas ci zhig nus// de bas rdo rje dril bu dag/ mnyam pa
203a4: de nyid gsal bar byed/ / A li kI li mnyam bsgoms nas// rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub pa pos// A li rdo rje zhes byar brjod// kA li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dgos pa thams cad
203a5: sgrub par byed/ / sems can don rnams ma lus pa// lha yi gzugs kyis bri bar bya// phyi rol shes rab thabs rnams kyis// ji ltar 'khor ba bsgrol bar 'gyur// mongs pa phyi ril sems ldan pas// de yi dam tshig bstan//
203a6: pa yin// gsang ba'i gsang ba gsang ba che// rtag tu gab cing gsang ba yin// gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa// de'i rnal 'byor ba ru grags// shel ltar dag pa'i sems la ni// de yi tshes ni bstan par bya// gal te samra
203a7: nithe tshom na/ / sa cig gis ni dmyal bar lhung // 'dod la dga' ba ma yin cing // longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya// sems can den bya'i phyir du ni// rab tu 'bad pa 'di nyid dmigs// gal te 'did dga' rnal 'byor ga/
203a8: thabs kyi mtshan nyid cig yin to// rang dag bskad cig yang dag 'byung // rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba'o// skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas pa pa/

203b1: A li'i sa bon bzung bar bya// bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni/ dAM zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla// gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag/ lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya// thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor rnal
203b2: 'byor ma dbang gson/ / dgyes shing thugs ni tshim pa yis// 'gro bathar pa de ring thob// e ma chos kyi mchog gi lam// e ma'o 'khor ba bcod pa po// e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas// e ma'o ngom
203b3: rnal 'byor lam/ / ches grangs med cing rgyu dkar med// bsnang ba med par bstan pa ste// 'di ni bden pa'i bsgrub par mdzod// bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed// las kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams// sgrub pa po yin
203b4: tshogs 'dod/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par bya// de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni// sngon bzhin de nyid sgom par bya// sngags pas gsum 'bum bzlas nas su// phyi nas las
203b5: ni bsgrub par bya/ / yi ge gnyis 'gyur theg le dang // rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal bsreg pa'i mthar bzhag pa// rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni// de nyid las rnams 'bad
203b6: de bsgrub/ / yi dgas gos la sogs bzung la// lha mo ser mo mtshon cis bris/ phyag gnyis rol ba'i rkang stabs can// dkar dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus// ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste// sgra ni lkug pas rnam par/
203b7: brgya ni// yi dgas kyi ni bstan la bzhugs// skyes bu'i lpags pa'i na bza' man pas// don yod grub pa'i dbu brgyan can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// glang po'i lpags pa'i sham thabs can// kha T+wA~M mchog
203b8: gi brgyan pa ste/ / g.yon pa chang gi thod pa rnams// hUM gi sgra yis 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsol// lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya// sa yi dbus sogs sbyor bar bya// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub

204a1: bar bya/ / sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// gnyis med gtor mas dgod par bya// gal te sbyor na yi dgas so// tham la me 'bar dbus su ni// lam shing thang shing las byas pa'am// zho can lnga yi shi las bya/
204a2: mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang // sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya// sbrang rtsi khrag la sbags pa dag/ brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya// de ltar bsregs pa tsam gyis ni// des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur// oM s+phu pr-i phu
204a3: phaT sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so/ / thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya// dang pos ni 'gul 'gyur te// gnyis pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul// gsum pa li ni dra chen 'byung // bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te// 3
204a4: pabar bsgrub pa'i grogs por ni/ / seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par brtsigs// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par byed// dam tshig phyag rgya sogs byin nas// gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes pa
204a5: bya/ / ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang // bstan ni bdag gis mdzad du gsol// de nas lha mo'i dngos bstan nas// bdag gi bu yi ci zhig bsgrub// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas su// de la phyag rgya bstan par bya// dpa' bos
204a6: de ltar byin nas su/ / de ltar bdag gis 'dir mdzod cig/ bdag nyid la ni lha mo 'grub// oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hAM hAM hUM dza dza dza/ swA hA// spyi bor log pa bzhag nas ni// gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya// sha dang khrag dang /
204a7: sran chan bcas// gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyin// yi dgas bskyod par gnas nas su// rtag pa'i dus su byon gyis brlab// lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo// dri za mi 'am ci dang ni// yi dgas mi mo gang 'dod pa// bka'
204a8: bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na/ / phran tshegs mi mo smos ci dgos// bka' ni bsgo btsam gyis su// lha min klu'i gnas nas kyang // gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams// myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra

204b1: rnams gsang ba dang / / bka' bzhin du ni skrod par 'gyur// las rnams kun byed lha mo ste// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// stag mo lde spyar 'ug pa mo// las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub de ltar shes
204b2: byas la/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin nyid kyis so sor bzung // rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing // dril bu chos kyi lha mo'o// phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin// kun rig pas ni tham
204b3: cad bsgrub/ / sbyor ba'i gdan zhes bya ba rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// / rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i// slob dpon dag ni bzung bya ba// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor sogs ldan// 'khor ba las sgrol
204b4: mnyam nyid kyi/ / ji bzhin lam gyi 'khor ba las// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon// slob dpon yon tan ji 'dra zhing // bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// bcom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi//
204b5: thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid phyag na rdo rje nyon// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang // lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// cha shes byang chub yan lag gnas// dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de//
204b6: spu rnams ni dgra bcom mo// 'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs// de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur// rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu blta// ye shes can ni shes bya ba// mtshan nyid gang yin
204b7: bstan par bya/ / shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs// sems can kun la ma 'jigs sbyin// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas// rnal 'byor bzo dang bstan bcos rig/ thams cad du ni snyan par na// sems
204b8: can kun la bu bzhin lta/ / sbyin pa la sogs rtag tu dga'// rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson// snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed// mnyam nyid sems ni bskrad pas na/

205a1: sems can rnams kyi mgon skyob yin// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa// 'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod// gzhan yang slob mas spyod pa yi// de nyid mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta//
205a2: dam tshig spyod pa dang lha nyid// gtor ma gsang ba la sogs ldan// slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya// smad na myur du mnar med 'gro// kun tu dam tshig med pa dang // stan dang mal dang lham sogs dang // gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod
205a3: rnams/ / grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya// bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min// 'das na de ni dus kun tu// gdon gyis mche bar 'gyur ba dang // nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed// de ye
205a4: thib ma 'goms gyur na/ / mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod// slob dpon smod par gang byed pa// rmi lam na yang dngos grub med// slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yi// skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min// sngags dang phyag rgya'i
205a5: sbyor las sogs/ / de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro// bslab pa sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas// de nas maN Da la la sogs bya// sngar bstan yi ge gcig pa yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru snyan par bya// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// las rnams 'dod
205a6: bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ / sngags kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis// yi ge brgyad po bsgom par bya// gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur ba'i// de yis chos ni shes par bya// sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la// ye shes rnam shes
205a7: gan par / ba nga sa/ ma sa gas pa la sogs pa sa/ yang slobasas byab // thags thag pa kra/ bus sogs pa'i ga/ sa la legs par bcugs sa / ma
205a8: kar gyur bar bya/ bla ma ldan la 'dug nas ni// rang gi su ru sa bsgoms la// lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni// mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni stab sa su mi/ theg pagasu

205b1: thams dang / rnal 'byor gsang sogs mapa 'gro ma/ pa bod pa yo da sto byang chubase mas pa bdag nyid me/ khyad par du yang slob dpon pa// rtag tu sgrubs sumatsha bar bgyi/ rnam snang mang dang maskyed pa/ ran can macan
205b2: dang 'jig rten dang / / don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes pagyi ba ni// dum tshor 'di nas gzung nas su// byang chub snying por ma
205b3: ba / ma bsngal ba rnams bsngal bgyi ning // mgrol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// bdag gis chos khrims 'di bgyi'o// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du// mnam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan/
205b4: brjod/ oM srA b+hA ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud d+hod+ha// oM badz+ra shud d+ha sarba d+ha rma badz+ra shud d+ho// ma yog shud d+hasarba d+harma yog shud d+he d+he// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / ngag gi las ni dam pa bani// yid kyirnam pa
205b5: gsum dag ni/ / lus sngams pas ni dam tshig srung // sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su// ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya// de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas// gtor ma'i gnas su gzhug par bya// lag pas lag pa bzung nas/
205b6: slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bsku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo yi/ sbyor ba'i gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal// don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnams shes
205b7: nas/ / rnal 'byor ldan pas sgribs g.yogs rnams su dral ba'i phyir// srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bcom nas su// rnal 'byor don ngam grub byed de nyid rgyal por 'gyur// AHni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung
205b8: rdo rjer dbyin gyis brlab/ / hUM ni nyon mongs bsreg pa ste// thugs kyis rdo rje byin gyis brlab// oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste// sku yi rdo rje byin gyis brlab// de nas mig phye mthong ma thag/ kun la yan lag lngas btud nas//

206a1: bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid// sbyor ba'i gdan dragading bar bya// de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar// lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// mkhas pa yis ni sbyi bar bya// ji ltar bstan bzhin mtshon byas la// denapa
206a2: bslab sogs yang byaste/ / ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis brtag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin/ ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog/ ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed// hri yis nub pa gzhom bya ste// la lar
206a3: sngags ni bzlas par bya/ / bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni// mgo bos btung de dbul bar bya// oM ban tsaDA ki ni bu co u pa ta na ya a da ma naM nir+ya ta ya mi// oM a tsar+ya bu tse ba ta na ya/ a da ma na ma nir+yA ta ya mi/ oM sarba sa twa ya ba
206a4: ri tran arA ya ad ma da~M nir+yA ta ya mi/ / nga rgyal dang ni khro bo dang // brlang dang tshig rtsub spang bar bya// sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste// srog gcod tu ba de bzhin do// longs spyod kun la mi chags shing // bdag nyid nges par
206a5: cho ga shes bya/ / gar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i// phyi rol stan bcos zhen mi bya// sa ma ya s+thAm// sa ma ya ho// a A aM aHhUM dza/ rdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis// yan lag drug gis bon gzung // gzhan yang chos rnams
206a6: thams cad kyi/ / rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas// rtag tu bla ma yon dbul bya// rang gi bu dang chung ma dang / gnyen 'dun bran khol bcas pa dang // glang chen rta dang ba glang khyud// rin chen khyim
206a7: dang zhing yul bcas/ / gser dang dngul dang zangs dang ni// gos dang 'bru la sogs pa'i nor// stan dang mal cha lham las sogs// gdugs sogs nye ba'i longs spyod dbul// mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang // bla ma'i yon
206a8: du phul nas su/ / chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa nyid// dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// sngon du bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can rnams la gzir mi bya// gzhan la tshig rngub/

206b1: sgra mi bya// thams cad mi dkar bya ba min// tshul khrims sdom pa bsrung ba dang // skye bo rnams la gdod mi bya// srog chags bsad par mi byas// de bas shi bar 'gyur kyang bya// rabaca 'bar ma mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi ro
206b2: la rags bya/ / dngos la sred pa'i thun po rnams// bdag nyid srid pa ma bzang skyong // rags dang pra mo tsam la yang // rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung ngo // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// de la brdzun sna yong ma yin/
206b3: spyod pa legs par bsdams pa dang // bza' bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam// dga' dang rtse la'ang legs par bsdam// gtor ma'i dus su'ang legs par bsdam// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams
206b4: sems can dga' bas 'grub par 'gyur/ / gang zhig kun shes slob ma la// sems can spro ba bstan par bya// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni// thams cad mnyam par blta bar bya// rtag tu mnyam par spyod
206b5: bar bya/ / rnal 'byor bsam gtan 'bad par bya// sems can smin pa sred pa'i gzhis// chod byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te// de yi myu gu ljon shing gis// 'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gos par byed// mtho ris longs spyod
206b6: 'dod pa yis/ / lus can rnams ni byams pas na// dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis// bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur// mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing // glegs bam klag par mi bya'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi
206b7: bcing zhing / / sngags kyi ye shes bzla mi bya// bstan bcom dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa dka'// sleb dpon dag gi lam gyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// bdag gi lha dang gzhan las ni// bdag gi
206b8: lha ni lha yi mchog/ bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas// gzugs brnyan las sogs bri bar bya// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu phye ba las rim par phye ba dang po'o// // der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal

207a1: bogaco/ nyid med pa'i sngags pa rnams// srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung // lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas// de nyid chos ni bstan du gsol// rnal 'byor gyi ni tshad ma ci// sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu// chu dang med
